listJob.name: Remote Fullstack Developer (Django (Python) , ReactJS)
listJob.location: Remote, Kh√°c, H√† N·ªôi
listJob.description:
We are seeking a skilled Full-Stack Django Developer to join our team in Vietnam. You will be responsible for the backend development of a unified system integrating customer management, lesson scheduling, and invoice processing. While your primary focus will be  development, having experience in MySQL, Next.js (React), and API development will be a significant advantage.
The ideal candidate should be a self-driven engineer who can work independently while effectively communicating with a remote team. As our development and business teams operate internationally, English proficiency is required for communication, and knowledge of Japanese is a plus.
Responsibilities
Develop and maintain Django-based backend services for our unified system.
Design and optimize MySQL database structures to ensure scalability and performance.
Develop RESTful APIs using Django Rest Framework (DRF) to connect frontend applications and external services.
Integrate with Google Calendar API, Stripe, and other third-party services as needed.
Implement authentication and role-based access control (RBAC) for different user types.
Work closely with frontend developers to build and maintain Next.js (React) applications.
Ensure high-performance, scalable, and secure application architecture.
Participate in code reviews, unit testing, and system debugging.
Collaborate with international team members using Slack, Jira, and GitHub.
listJob.jobExperience:
3+ years of experience in Django (Python) development.
Strong expertise in MySQL database design and optimization.
Experience in Django Rest Framework (DRF) for API development.
Familiarity with Next.js (React) for frontend development is a plus.
Proficiency in Docker and deployment on Google Cloud Platform (GCP) (or other cloud services).
Experience with Redis for caching and scalable system architectures.
Strong understanding of version control (Git/GitHub) and CI/CD workflows.
Fluent in English (both written and spoken) for communication with the international team.
Japanese language skills are a plus but not required.
Preferred Qualifications
Experience with Google Calendar API integration.
Knowledge of Stripe API for payment processing.
Familiarity with modern frontend development practices (React/TypeScript).
Experience working in an Agile development environment.
Past experience in a startup or fast-growing company.
listJob.privilege:
Location: Vietnam (Remote)
Job Type: Full-time
Work Hours: Flexible, aligned with international collaboration needs
Compensation: Competitive salary based on experience
Benefits: Paid leave, professional development opportunities, and the possibility of travel for team collaboration

listJob.name: Senior QA/QC Engineer (Manual, English)
listJob.location: Viettel Tower, 285 CMT8, Qu·∫≠n 10, TP H·ªì Ch√≠ Minh
listJob.description:
SMG Swiss Marketplace Group (based in Switzerland) is a pioneering network of online marketplaces and a leading European digital company that simplifies people‚Äôs lives with forward-looking products.
 Our four business areas include Automotive, Real Estate, General Marketplaces, and Finance and Insurance.
 SMG Swiss Marketplace Group Vietnam is an innovation center of SMG Group in Vietnam. We are officially named as one of the 2023 Asia & Vietnam Best Workplaces by the Great Place to Work Institute, the world's most well-known organization for work culture assessment.
 We hire the best digital talents to meet the highest demands of our users and customers in Switzerland. In return, we offer an attractive, innovative, friendly, and stimulating work environment where you can reach your full potential, achieve your goals, and celebrate your successes.
 About the role
This job refers to our Automotive brands, Autoscout24 and Motoscout24. We are journeying to simplify our products and strengthen our technology stack through a large-scale rewrite. We‚Äôre building on a modern technology stack with Java, following best practices, and striving to build/measure/learn at a high cadence. Here‚Äôs your chance to join a great product team that collaborates with designers, product managers, researchers, and engineers from other fields.
 What you will do:
Work as part of an agile team:
Be the voice of QA during agile ceremonies. Autonomously drive the testing life cycle to ensure quality from medium to large-size features while reducing the system's tech debt or legacy issues in assigned projects
Collaborate with agile teams to ship valuable product increments.
Actively participate in ticket refinement/grooming by bringing up unforeseen scenarios and use cases.
Perform thorough functionality tests:
Review acceptance criteria, developer notes, and design documents to formulate test cases.
Test domain-driven web referencing database-heavy back-end systems and check the consistency across devices, browsers, and operating systems.
Conduct periodic exploratory testing in test environments.
Be responsible for product quality:
Work with the engineering teams to derive testing requirements throughout the development cycle.
Provide inputs on high-level test scenarios, challenges, risks, resources, test estimates, etc., during test planning meetings.
Support Bug Triage process:
Reproduces debugs, isolates problems, and verifies fixes.
Report any bugs/defects found in a clear, friendly, and easily reproducible manner.
Keep track of incidents and do deep root cause analysis followed by recommended action items.
Track defects and help troubleshoot errors.
listJob.jobExperience:
What you should bring to start working with us:
Proficient in English communication for both written and spoken skills.
4+ years' experience in the same role.
Good hands-on experience in tests with:
API BE testing with Postman
UI responsive web application
DB testing
Knowledge of automation testing or the ability to do automation testing is a plus.
Pragmatic and proactive approach to problem-solving.
Strong sense of ownership and accountability for the product's quality.
Familiarity with Agile methodologies and an Agile mindset.

listJob.name: Product Manager (Travel Tech)
listJob.location: Anna building, Quang Trung software city, Qu·∫≠n 12, TP H·ªì Ch√≠ Minh
listJob.description:
BUSINESS UNIT
HRS' Product Management department is a critical function in driving the success of the company's Lodging-as-a-Service (LaaS), Meeting-as-a-Service (MaaS) and Workforce-as-a-Service (WaaS) platform offerings. The department collaborates with cross-functional teams to define the product vision, roadmap, and strategy, and prioritizes features using analytics and data to meet business goals and deliver an exceptional experience for stakeholders. The teams in the Product Management department at HRS own the program backlog, define product increments and releases, and are responsible for the product vision, roadmap, pricing, licensing, and ROI.
 As a Product Manager on the travel tech team, you will play a central role in shaping the future of corporate travel. The travel tech team is responsible for the end-to-end customer experience of travelers, agents, and meeting planners through various online tools and APIs. You will work closely with design, engineering, sales, and marketing to define and build comprehensive solutions that enable corporate travelers at scale and unlock revenue opportunities.
CHALLENGE:
Build consumer-grade products that ensure friction-free experiences for our travelers throughout their entire trip, from searching to post-booking.  
Work with our ecosystem partners to help them understand how our solutions create impact for their business, demonstrate that value through key business metrics, and show them how to improve that value over time.  
Identify new product opportunities and drive a comprehensive roadmap informed by data analysis, qualitative research, customer feedback, and market/technology trends.  
Collaborate externally with other ecosystem partners to develop custom, scalable integrations that align with their unique needs while supporting our mission and objectives.  
Demonstrate a strong familiarity with developing external APIs and the ability to build within a partner's existing ecosystem, enhancing their overall experience.  
Work in a dynamic, fast-paced environment where ambiguity is constant, exercising autonomy to drive product innovation and make strategic decisions.  
Apply common decision-making frameworks to evaluate opportunities and risks, drafting proposals through narrative/PRQs to communicate and guide these decisions.  
Develop a long-term vision and product strategy aligned with our objectives, communicating effectively with senior leaders internally and externally to get buy-in and align teams towards executing the strategy.
listJob.jobExperience:
Outcomes-driven with a bias for action and undaunted by multiple dependencies, both internal and external. 
At least 4+ years of product management experience in a software product, preferably within SaaS, marketplace, or e-commerce industry. 
An analytical, metrics-based approach to identifying, sizing, and solving problems, with excellent skills in identifying and prioritizing high-impact initiatives. 
Strong written and verbal communication skills with the ability to articulate customer problems and drive alignment with cross-functional teams and leadership. 
An experimentation mindset to come up with hypotheses, test them quickly, and ship features globally. 
Equally comfortable diving into technical details with an engineer, iterating on a Figma with a designer, or breaking down a funnel with a data analyst. 
A scrappy, get-things-done attitude to make your product and team successful, whether that means writing a QA plan or investigating the root cause of a customer support ticket. 
Familiarity with SQL, and data visualization tools such as MicroStrategy/Tableau for product analysis

listJob.description:
We are seeking a Senior Backend Engineer to join our team, responsible for building and maintaining the backend infrastructure for our AI-powered photo editing and education applications. You will design and optimize scalable, high-performance APIs and services, ensuring reliability and efficiency across our platforms.
This role focuses on backend development, but experience with AI services, computer vision, or LLMs is a plus. You will work with a modern tech stack, leveraging Python, Node.js, serverless architectures, and cloud technologies (GCP, Cloudflare, Firestore, MongoDB) to build robust, scalable backend systems.
listJob.jobExperience:
Tech Stack
Languages: Python, Node.js
Infrastructure: Serverless, Cloudflare, GCP
Databases: MongoDB, Firestore, Cloudflare Workers
API Development: RESTful & GraphQL APIs
Message Queues: Google Cloud Pub/Sub
Monitoring & Observability: Prometheus, Grafana
Key Responsibilities
Design, develop, and maintain backend services for AI-powered applications.
Build scalable APIs and microservices with a focus on performance and security.
Work with serverless architectures to ensure high availability and cost efficiency.
Optimize database performance and design efficient data models for MongoDB, Firestore, and Cloudflare Workers.
Implement CI/CD pipelines, containerization (Docker, Kubernetes), and cloud deployment strategies.
Collaborate with AI engineers to integrate AI models into production, ensuring low-latency inference.
Monitor system performance and optimize backend services for scalability and reliability.
Stay updated on industry trends and bring best practices into the backend architecture.
Your Skills & Experience
5+ years of experience in backend development with Python and/or Node.js.
Strong expertise in API development, microservices architecture, and cloud-based applications.
Experience with serverless computing (Cloudflare Workers, AWS Lambda, or GCP Cloud Functions).
Proficiency in NoSQL databases (MongoDB, Firestore) and performance optimization techniques.
Hands-on experience with message queues (Google Cloud Pub/Sub) and real-time data processing.
Familiarity with authentication, authorization, and security best practices for backend services.
Experience with Docker, Kubernetes, and CI/CD pipelines for production deployments.
Strong problem-solving skills and the ability to work in a fast-paced, collaborative environment.
listJob.privilege:

Additional perks tailored for long-term employees. 
Hybrid work environment offering flexibility. 
Annual company-sponsored trips and events.

listJob.location: 88 kirribilli Avenue, kirribilli, nsw, Australia., Qu·∫≠n Ba ƒê√¨nh, H√† N·ªôi
listJob.description:
What We Are Looking For?
You are a seasoned developer based out of Vietnam looking to work in a 100% remote role for an international client.
About Our Client
Our client is a dynamic Australian FinTech startup revolutionizing payments. Their innovative platform empowers businesses with cutting-edge payment solutions, enhancing efficiency while offering valuable rewards. Launched in 2019, they've quickly become one of Australia's fastest-growing fintech companies.
Role Overview
We're seeking skilled and passionate full-stack developers to join our client's distributed team. This is a remote contract position based in Vietnam, working with an Australian development team.
*IMPORTANT NOTE:* This role is specifically with our client (Australian FinTech) and NOT with Automation Consulting. The scope of work is focused on payment platform development and does NOT include any GenAI development work.
Tech Stack
* Frontend: React, TypeScript, MaterialUI
* Backend: Node.js, GraphQL, Express
* Infrastructure: AWS, Terraform, Docker
* Databases: PostgreSQL, MongoDB
Key Responsibilities
* Design and implement scalable microservices
* Build and maintain responsive web applications
* Bug fixes and production support
* Platform maintenance and feature enhancements
* Mentor junior developers and provide technical guidance
* Conduct code reviews and promote best practices
* Collaborate with product and design teams
listJob.jobExperience:
* 5+ years of full-stack web application experience or 4+ years in one or more of the key technologies
* Strong proficiency in Node.js, TypeScript, and React
* Experience with AWS cloud services and Terraform
* Knowledge of PostgreSQL and/or MongoDB
* Excellent problem-solving and analytical thinking skills
* Strong English communication skills (both written and verbal)
* Proven ability to work effectively in distributed teams
* Strong organizational skills and attention to detail
listJob.privilege:
Engagement Structure
* Flexible working hours for work-life balance
* Competitive compensation
* Contractors responsible for their own taxes and business expenses
Team Environment
* Work with a global team of 20 people
* Collaborative and nurturing environment
* Knowledge sharing and skill enhancement opportunities
* Respectful and inclusive team culture
Application Process
1. Initial discussion (5-10 minutes)
2. Coding challenges (self-completed):
* Frontend React challenge
* Backend Node.js challenge
3. Technical interview (Live Coding Assessment)
4. Cultural fit interview

listJob.description:
The Senior DevOps Engineer will be responsible for ensuring the reliability, scalability, and efficiency of our infrastructure and applications. You will lead the DevOps team in designing, implementing, and optimizing infrastructure while maintaining cost efficiency within a defined budget. Your role includes automating processes, enhancing CI/CD pipelines, and ensuring high availability and performance for our engineering teams. 
Design and set up scalable, high-availability infrastructure in collaboration with Technical Leaders.  
Optimize infrastructure costs within a defined budget of less than 1% of company revenue. 
Build up the CI/CD for all current Gearment projects. ÔÇ∑ Setup the Release/Deployment process 
Build up the Logging and Monitoring system for our infrastructures, and applications to support Developers and Management. 
Enhance development tools to improve engineering productivity. 
Ensure high SLA and SLO standards for the DevOps team.
listJob.jobExperience:
4-5 years in a DevOps role with experience leading or mentoring teams. 
Strong expertise in AWS, Digital Ocean, and GCP; AWS certification is a plus. 
Experience with Docker, Kubernetes, AWS ECS, and AWS EKS. 
Experience operating and maintaining RDBMS/NoSQL databases (Postgres, Elasticsearch, etc.). 
Proficiency with Git, Gitflow, branches, and tagging. 
Experience with monitoring tools (Telegraform, InfluxDB, Grafana, AWS CloudWatch, Prometheus) and logging solutions (ELK/EFK Stack, Graylog). 
Familiarity with tools like Sentry, NewRelic APM, Datadog APM, Elasticsearch APM. 
Strong experience in setting up and maintaining CI/CD pipelines using tools like Jenkins, CircleCI. ÔÇ∑ Strong problem-solving skills, collaboration, and a results-driven approach. 
Strategic thinking and planning. ÔÇ∑ Decision-making and problem-solving. 
Innovation and continuous improvement mindset. 
Cross-functional collaboration and conflict resolution. 
Stakeholder management and influence. 
Ability to stay calm under pressure and adapt to changes.

About The Role 
We are looking for Automation Test Engineer to join our Software Development team in Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam, and support building our billing system and data management for the‚ÄØEnergy and Utility industry in the‚ÄØNordic.  
As part of the team, you will have an opportunity to working on Hansen cloud products from implementing to deploying based on Robot Framework.‚ÄØ 
If you are an Automation Test Engineer with a good background in technical, experience in cloud AWS product development, and love to dive into the world of cutting-edge technologies, you will be the best fit for our team. 
 Key Responsibilities  
Work within an agile environment, actively contributing to daily stand-ups, iteration/sprint testing, sprint showcases and retrospectives. 
Actively contribute to feature refinement sessions to gain knowledge about functional details. 
Test planning for new features. 
Implementing and verifying automated test cases using internal tool. 
Maintaining our regression test system. 
Seek knowledge on emerging technologies required in testing for current and future projects.
listJob.jobExperience:

Bachelor's degree in IT, Software, Computer Science, or a related field, or equivalent experience 
1-2+ years in Python & C# programming language (count experience in university) 
2-3+ years in Robot testing framework 
Familiar with Gitlab/ GitHub, CI/CD pipeline  
Effective English communication for global collaboration Knowledge in AWS development techniques/solutions such as Lambda (must have), Eventbridge, Athena, SQS are nice to have 
Have knowledges in:‚ÄØ‚ÄØ 
Relational Databases 
Experience with developing REST API‚ÄØ 
Serverless architecture 
Docker‚ÄØ

listJob.description:
BUSINESS UNIT
BPATech provides a platform for our corporate customers to automate their crew and workforce accommodation workflows. It connects both to customer and the internal HRS systems to heavily drive process automation. The BPA platform is offered as SaaS and built upon a modern tech stack (Dotnet, React, Azure, Kubernetes, SOA). 
 We are looking for a Team Lead who loves to build top notch SAAS application delivering an outstanding user experience for Travelers, Meeting Planners and Hotel Partners.
  Lead an engineering team of 9 members to develop and maintain excellent software products. 
Proactively discuss and consult the Product Managers and other stakeholders at Head Quarter to ensure that the technical point of view is brought into consideration while planning and growing the products. 
Collaborate with other people responsible for the relevant products to ensure that the technical solution is optimum and best fit to the latest cloud architecture. 
Manage and support team members to become a highly performing engineering team. 
Coach engineers to adopt best practices in software development lifecycle, such as Infrastructure as Code, Automated testing, Continuous Integration - Continuous Delivery/Deployment, etc. 
Coach engineers to leverage generative Al tools such as GitHub Copilot, Amazon Code Whisperer, etc., to accelerate software delivery.
Collaborate across teams with regards to overarching technical concepts and practices.
Participate in the full development cycle: design, development, QA, experimentation, analysis, and launch. You'll be reviewing code, writing design documents, giving feedback on product specs and mocks, and generally helping out wherever is needed.
listJob.jobExperience:
Experience: 5+ years of experience in programming software using C#, modern cloud software architecture, and related technologies. 
 Technology and Management Expertise: 
2+ years experience in technical leadership over high performing engineering teams. 
Solid understanding of core software engineering concepts and API designs 
Experience implementing and running high-performing containerized applications at scale on Azure 
Significant experience in one or more general purpose programming languages (C#, Java, Go, Python,‚Ä¶) 
Knowledge of and experience in working with agile methodologies 
Vision and Execution: 
Ability to implement and achieve a compelling vision for the future, with actionable plans to achieve long term objectives. 
Strong accountability for meeting tactical objectives and commitments within the established methodological framework. 
Experience in developing concepts and leading development execution of market-leading Saas product offerings. 
Leadership and Communication: 
Excellent leadership and coaching skills to guide and inspire the team. 
Effective presentation and speaking skills and the ability to communicate with a wide range of different stakeholders 
Adaptability and Innovation: 
Ability to work within a fast-paced, evolving environment where products and solutions evolve quickly and need to be accurately integrated into customer/sales story lines as the solutions evolve. Embrace changes and drive innovation. Skilled in working within a matrix organization and in forwarding, building momentum for and successfully driving the competition of strategic initiatives that impact a total organization and company. 
Problem-solving and Creativity: 
Strong problem-solving skills and creativity to develop new possibilities and processes. 
Personal Attributes: 
Empathy, authenticity, integrity, commitment, resilience, and respect in dealing with all stakeholders. 
Language Skills: 
Fluency in English, spoken and written.

We're seeking a Senior Backend Engineer to join our fast-growing team in Ho Chi Minh City. You'll work on sophisticated technology that impacts how the world's top mobile games market themselves to hundreds of millions of players.

Interview Process
Our streamlined interview process consists of 3 rounds and is fully in English:
 Round 1: Initial Technical Screen (45-60 mins)
Algorithm problem-solving exercise
Technical background discussion with CTO
High-level experience overview

Round 2: Project Review (45-60 mins)

Architecture and scalability discussion

listJob.name: Front-End Developer ‚Äì 2D(SVG)/ 3D Viewer
listJob.location: Joymax Tower | 218 Nguy·ªÖn VƒÉn H∆∞·ªüng, Ph∆∞·ªùng Th·∫£o ƒêi·ªÅn, Qu·∫≠n 2, Th√†nh ph·ªë Th·ªß ƒê·ª©c, TP H·ªì Ch√≠ Minh
listJob.description:
### **About Us**
We are an industry-leading engineering software company focused on delivering cutting-edge digital plant solutions.  We are now developing an 2D/3D Web Viewer that leverages SVG and 3D files.
---
### **Job Summary**
We are seeking a talented Front-End Developer to lead the implementation of our 2D/3D Viewer. This role involves developing a robust, interactive web application that renders SVG-based diagrams, displays dynamic property data fetched via RESTful APIs. The ideal candidate is passionate about web technologies, has a keen eye for design, and is experienced in creating scalable, high-performance applications. In addition, you must be adept at leveraging modern AI tools like ChatGPT and enjoy working in an environment where GitHub Co-Pilot is provided as part of your development toolkit.
---
### **Key Responsibilities**
- **Develop and Maintain the Viewer:** 
    Build an interactive 2D/3D viewer that renders 2D(SVG) / 3D files, supports zoom, pan, and element selection, and integrates additional metadata overlays.
- **API Integration:** 
    Implement client-side communication with server-side RESTful APIs to fetch property data and manage user comments. Ensure robust error handling and data synchronization.   
- **User Interface & UX:** 
    Design and develop a clean, intuitive UI that allows users to interact with 2D(SVG)/3D elements. Collaborate with the UX/UI team to refine user interactions and ensure the best possible user experience.
- **Performance Optimization:** 
    Optimize 2D(SVG)/ 3D rendering performance and ensure smooth interactions, especially with large and complex diagrams.
- **Utilize AI Tools:** 
    Effectively use ChatGPT to assist with troubleshooting, code generation, and rapid prototyping. Leverage GitHub Co-Pilot to accelerate development and maintain high-quality code standards. 
- **Testing and Debugging:** 
    Write unit tests and participate in code reviews. Debug and resolve issues related to API integration and UI responsiveness.
- **Collaboration:** 
    Work closely with back-end developers, product managers, and designers to understand requirements and deliver a high-quality product.
listJob.jobExperience:
### **Required Qualifications**
- **Technical Skills:**
    - Proficient in HTML5, CSS3, and JavaScript (ES6+).
    - Strong experience with modern front-end frameworks (e.g., React, Angular, or Vue.js).

    - Solid understanding of RESTful API integration, asynchronous programming (e.g., Promises, async/await), and error handling.
    - Experience with state management libraries (e.g., Redux, Vuex) is a plus.
    - Proficiency in using AI-assisted development tools such as ChatGPT; familiarity with GitHub Co-Pilot is required.
- **Experience:**
    - Minimum 3 years of professional front-end development experience.
    - Prior experience developing data-intensive or visualization-heavy applications is highly desirable.
    - Familiarity with version control systems (e.g., Git) and agile development methodologies.

    - Strong communication and collaboration abilities.
    - Ability to work in a fast-paced, team-oriented environment.

- Familiarity with real-time data visualization and interactive diagramming solutions.

listJob.name: Fullstack Engineer (Mid Level) (JavaScript/TypeScript)
listJob.location: Viettel Tower, 285 CMT8, Qu·∫≠n 10, TP H·ªì Ch√≠ Minh
listJob.description:
SMG Swiss Marketplace Group (based in Switzerland) is a pioneering network of online marketplaces and a leading European digital company that simplifies people‚Äôs lives with forward-looking products. Our four business areas include Automotive, Real Estate, General Marketplaces, and Finance and Insurance.
 SMG Swiss Marketplace Group Vietnam is an innovation center of SMG Group in Vietnam. We are officially named as one of the 2023 Asia & Vietnam Best Workplaces by the Great Place to Work Institute, the world's most well-known organization for work culture assessment.
We hire the best digital talents to meet the highest demands of our users and customers in Switzerland. In return, we offer an attractive, innovative, friendly, and stimulating work environment where you can reach your full potential, achieve your goals, and celebrate your successes.
 About the role
 SMG Real Estate (a business unit of SMG Swiss Marketplace Group AG) is running the top 2 leading digital real estate classifieds platforms, which are Homegate and Immoscout24 - Switzerland's largest real estate portals, with more than 15 million visits per month and more than 100,000 listings.
We provide all users looking for a property with a transparent overview of the entire range of listings without them having to tediously visit different platforms. In addition to great products such as the mortgage or price calculator, we also offer editorial articles on topics such as housing and financing.
Join us in this exciting role as a Fullstack Engineer in our Ho Chi Minh City office in District 10. You will be part of SMG Real Estate Engineering, a remote-friendly department of 80+ engineers located in four countries (Switzerland, Serbia, Germany & Vietnam).
You contribute to our cutting-edge stack, transform our products, do lean experiments, grow with our growth, and collaborate with our best minds across the globe. We are diverse and respectful, and you will feel at home.
 Our tech stack
Our front end is implemented with Vue.js / React.js, with Typescript as the language of choice. It consists of a mix of client-side, server-side, pre-rendered, and hybrid web apps.
Our backend is written in Node.js and Typescript, following a serverless and microservices architecture in a cloud-based environment using AWS. Our main services leverage Lambda, DynamoDB, SQS, SNS, and S3, among others.
Our monitoring is done mainly through Datadog and Sentry.
Our codebase and services are documented using Backstage.
 What you will do
You will be working in a team responsible for core Search, with a great balance of front-end and back-end work.
Working with AWS cloud technologies, microservices architectures, and CI/CD practices.
Understanding requirements, designing and implementing new features for the owned services.
Reviewing code, ensuring high test coverage, and maintaining and monitoring systems.

Global Fashion Group is the leading fashion and lifestyle retail destination in LATAM, CIS, SEA and ANZ. We connect over 10,000 global, local and own brands to a market of more than one billion consumers through four established ecommerce platforms: dafiti, lamoda, ZALORA and THE ICONIC. Through an inspiring and seamless customer experience enabled by our own technology ecosystem and operational infrastructure, we are dedicated to being the #1 fashion and lifestyle destination in our markets. With 17 offices and 9 fulfilment centres across four continents, GFG proudly employs a dynamic and diverse team with deep local knowledge and expertise. In the twelve months to 31 March 2021, GFG delivered 44.5million orders to 16.7 million Active Customers.  
ABOUT THE FUNCTION
Our team are set up in Berlin, Singapore and Vietnam and we continuously develop our products using agile development practices. We have an open company culture with over 20 different nationalities operating in a booming market working on interesting projects using modern tech-stack, efficient and lean workflows. 
The Datajet team is working on a search recommendation engine that is used by GFG's regions and we are looking to roll it out to the 17 countries where we operate. As part of the team in this role as Senior Golang Engineer, you will support this goal by ensuring a relevant catalog of millions of products is available to over 50 million users across 12 countries. 
Our platform delivers the core product to power search and recommendations to our brands in growth markets, and our team's goal is to make every product in our extensive assortment discoverable.

ABOUT THE ROLE 
You will be responsible for helping our regions to find the best match between their customer needs and products.
You will build and maintain scalable Golang-centric applications by contributing to our codebase on a daily basis.
You will cover code by tests.
You will be responsible for building large concurrent applications.
You will be able to diagnose problems at any level (Client, HTTP/Network, Server, Database, OS).

listJob.description:

 Responsibilities:
‚Ä¢ Analyze requirements, specifications, and business use cases in order to create test cases and test scenarios.

listJob.jobExperience:

‚Ä¢ Experience in developing and executing test cases.
‚Ä¢ Experience performing functional, integration, smoke, regression, usability and compatibility testing as well as assisting with user acceptance test.
‚Ä¢ Comprehensive knowledge of software testing techniques and methodologies.

‚Ä¢ Strong Problem-Solving and Analytical Skills.

‚Ä¢ Certification in software testing (e.g., ISTQB) is a plus.
 Knowledge & Experience:
‚Ä¢ Degree in IT/Computer Science/Computer Engineering.
‚Ä¢ More than 5 years of experience in software testing with different types of testing.

Global Fashion Group is the leading fashion and lifestyle destination in growth markets across LATAM, SEA and ANZ. From our people to our customers and partners, we exist to empower everyone to express their true selves through fashion. Our three e-commerce platforms: Dafiti, ZALORA and THE ICONIC connect an assortment of international, local and own brands to over 800 million consumers from diverse cultures and lifestyles. As part of the Group‚Äôs vision is to be the #1 online destination for fashion & lifestyle in growth markets, we are committed to doing this responsibly by being people and planet positive across everything we do.
THE TEAM
At THE ICONIC, innovation drives us; we believe that innovation should not be sitting in a siloed team but rather be part of everyone and everything we do & deliver. Every person in tech has a voice and we find that our best products are achieved through collaboration (usually over a coffee in front of a whiteboard).
We have over 120 people in tech, not to mention 45 nationalities (and counting!) This means that our skills and experience are diverse, allowing for greater collaboration and constant learning. All of our teams are cross-functional, mission-driven and able to iterate from inception to production (DevOps mentality) without being blocked or having to ask permission from other teams. We love to move fast and validate learning using data (lucky for us our Data Science & Analytics team is also world-class!)
SCOPE OF ROLE
You will be working in an agile environment on enterprise-level, high-quality software and infrastructure to support THE ICONIC as a contributor to native mobile technologies and efforts in the online retail space.

listJob.name: Full-Stack Software Dev Expert (NodeJS, Java, Python)
listJob.location: Unit 3, Floor 11, Bitexco Financial Tower, 2 Hai Trieu Street, Ben Nghe, Qu·∫≠n 1, TP H·ªì Ch√≠ Minh
listJob.description:
Job Summary
We are looking for a highly skilled and visionary Full-Stack Software Developer Expert who comprehensively excels in software architecture and hands-on coding, expertise in backend, frontend, cloud, and mobile application development. This is a key technical role responsible for designing and developing our major software. The ideal candidate has a deep understanding of scalable architecture, cloud-native solutions, and modern software engineering best practices.
Main Responsibilities
Software Architecture
Architect and design scalable, secure, and high-availability applications, apply effective API governance, service orchestration, event-driven architecture, distributed systems, message queue and other practices for high-volume transactions processing.
Full-Stack Development
Implement high-performance backend services; implement RESTful and GraphQL APIs for seamless integrations across multiple systems and institutions, ensure backward compatibility.
Implement event-driven architectures (Kafka, RabbitMQ).
Implement authentication, authorization, and identity management.
Develop responsive and interactive UI components for web.
Develop and optimize mobile applications for iOS and Android using Flutter, React Native, or native development (Swift, Kotlin, Java).
Develop and optimize database queries, data storage performance.
Follow secure coding best practices to protect sensitive financial data.
Cloud & DevOps
Deploy and manage applications on AWS, integrate across on-premises environments.
Implement CI/CD pipelines for automated testing and deployment.
Optimize application performance and scalability with containerization (Docker, Kubernetes).
Technical Leadership
Knowledge-sharing sessions, code reviews, and technical workshops to upskill development team.
Research, and stay updated on new technological platforms, emerging technologies and recommend improvements.
listJob.jobExperience:
Strong experience and knowledge with Node.js, Java, Python, Go, or similar; API development with RESTful APIs, gRPC, GraphQL, WebSockets. Proficiency in API design principles, versioning, and rate limiting.
Strong experience in building event-driven, distributed systems with Kafka, RabbitMQ, or similar technologies.
Expertise in React, Vue.js, or Angular; mobile application management and deployment process.

listJob.description:
Since 2018, Aviron has been on a mission to transform exercise into an experience people love. Driven by our commitment to innovation, we've continuously evolved our products to deliver solutions that not only make working out fun and accessible, but aim to change the way people feel about their next workout.
 From our pioneering gamified rower to the latest cutting-edge Aviron Fit Bike, we continue to push the boundaries of what's possible in fitness, ensuring every launch brings us closer to our mission to End Boring Workouts.
 About the Role
In this role, you will play a crucial part in driving data-informed decisions across the organization. You will be responsible for collecting, cleaning, analyzing, and interpreting complex datasets to identify trends, patterns, and insights that will inform business strategy and improve performance.  This individual will report directly to the Chief Revenue Officer. 
 Responsibilities
Data Collection and Preparation: Gather data from various sources (databases, APIs, web analytics, etc.), clean, transform, and prepare it for analysis.
Data Analysis and Interpretation: Conduct in-depth analysis using statistical methods and tools to identify trends, patterns, and correlations. Interpret findings and translate them into actionable insights.
Business Intelligence: Develop and maintain business intelligence dashboards and reports to track key performance indicators (KPIs) and provide insights into business performance.
Testing Framework: Develop and maintain a robust A/B testing framework, including best practices for experiment design, sample size calculation, and statistical analysis.
Collaboration and Communication: Partner with cross-functional teams (CRM, Growth Marketing, Digital Product) to understand their data needs, provide data-driven recommendations, and communicate findings effectively.
Data Visualization and Reporting: Create clear and compelling visualizations (dashboards, reports, presentations) to communicate data insights to both technical and non-technical audiences.
Data Quality Assurance: Implement and maintain data quality checks to ensure data accuracy and reliability.

Proficient in English, excellent written and verbal communication
5+ years of experience as a Data Analyst, preferably in a fast-paced environment.
Strong proficiency in SQL and data manipulation techniques.
Experience with data visualization tools (e.g., Tableau, Power BI, Looker).
Expertise in statistical analysis and methodologies.
Excellent communication and presentation skills, with the ability to explain complex data insights to non-technical audiences.
Strong problem-solving and analytical skills.
Experience with cloud-based data warehousing solutions (e.g., Snowflake, BigQuery, Redshift) is a plus.
Experience with programming languages like Python or R is a plus.
Experience with A/B testing and experimental design is a plus.

If you‚Äôre drawn to solving hard problems and want to help design software that will make a difference in people‚Äôs lives, Skedulo is for you. Visit our to learn more about what Skedulo does and to learn more about our people and team.

Job Description

As a Senior Software Engineer, you will play a critical role in designing, developing, and delivering high-impact software solutions that drive the success of our products. You will collaborate with Product Manager, Engineer Leaders, and cross-functional teams to build innovative features that enhance user experience and deliver measurable business value.

In this role, you will be responsible for developing scalable, high-performance solutions that cater to the evolving needs of our customers. You will proactively identify and resolve challenges, leveraging collaboration with peers when necessary. You are expected to operate with minimal oversight, breaking complex problems into manageable tasks and efficiently delivering high-quality solutions.

You possess strong decision-making skills, knowing when to write code, when to refactor and when to challenge existing assumptions to ensure the best outcomes for both users and the business.
 RESPONSIBILITIES
 Day to Day Responsibilities
Write and review code from the sprint backlog, adhering to frontend guild best practices and ensuring high-quality implementation.

Technical Responsibilities
Consistently write production-ready, maintainable code that is testable, well-documented and accounts for edge cases and errors. 
Provide technical guidance and contribute to discussions and decisions that impact the team and broader product architecture. 
Set realistic commitments, prioritise tasks effectively and deliver high-quality work on time. 
Communication & Leadership Responsibilities
Effectively communicate within the team in a clear, concise manner, both in written and verbal form, across technical and non-technical topics. 
Support team members by helping resolve blockers, sharing insights, and ensuring smooth collaboration. 
Mentor junior engineers, fostering an open, respectful and supportive learning environment that encourages professional growth.

 As a Senior Full-Stack Developer at GeoComply, you will develop and maintain GeoComply products and contribute to the implementation process of features and solutions, working closely with the Development Lead, Product Manager, and QA.

 You are capable and fond of working with multiple teams across locations, possessing good communication and interpersonal skills.  You have experience working in short, agile, iterative development cycles and have a great passion for working in agile development process environments.

Understand the company's vision, goals, and strategy. Actively contribute to achieving the goals and executing the company‚Äôs strategy.

listJob.description:
At VidCruiter, our innovative approach to recruitment uses advanced technology to streamline and enhance the hiring process for companies across various industries. We are looking for a skilled Software Developer to join our team and lead the development of cutting-edge hiring solutions.
 What You‚Äôll Do:
In this significant role, you will drive key projects that help shape our digital offerings and push the boundaries of traditional recruitment practices. If you are passionate about building user-friendly technology that transforms how companies hire, VidCruiter offers a dynamic and impactful environment for your skills to thrive.
 While no two days are the same, here‚Äôs what you can expect from this role:
Develop and maintain user-centric web applications with a focus on performance and usability.
Write clean, scalable, and efficient code using JavaScript, with a strong emphasis on modern frameworks and libraries.
Collaborate with UI/UX designers to translate visual concepts into functional online experiences.
Integrate front-end applications with Ruby on Rails backend services, ensuring seamless data flow and responsiveness.
Optimize applications for maximum speed and scalability while ensuring technical feasibility of UI/UX designs.
Stay up-to-date with emerging trends and technologies in web development and apply them to enhance our applications.
Collaborate with cross-functional teams to define, design, and ship new features effectively.
listJob.jobExperience:
Bachelor‚Äôs degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or a related field.
3+ years of experience in web development with a strong understanding of JavaScript and Ruby on Rails.
Proficiency in Tailwind CSS and a basic understanding of jQuery.
Familiarity with modern front-end build pipelines and tools.
Nice to have experience with Turbo and Stimulus frameworks.
Understanding of accessibility principles, including proper ARIA tagging and tab indexing.
Experience with component-driven development using frameworks like React, Vue, or Svelte is a plus.
Familiarity with code versioning tools such as Git.
Excellent problem-solving skills and the ability to work both independently and collaboratively.
Proficient in speaking and writing English, with the ability to communicate effectively in technical and business settings.
listJob.privilege:
What‚Äôs In It For You:
Competitive salary.
Flexible working hours and remote work opportunities.
A dynamic and creative work environment.
Opportunities for professional growth and development.
Why Work at VidCruiter?
VidCruiter is a recognized Great Place to Work¬Æ. We are a strong team making a real difference by virtually connecting employers with qualified job seekers around the world. listJob.name: Senior FrontEnd Engineer (JavaScript, Angular)
listJob.location: 436 Nguyen Thi Minh Khai street, Qu·∫≠n 3, TP H·ªì Ch√≠ Minh
listJob.description:
The Position
We are looking for a talented Senior Frontend Engineer to join our Company, the position based in Ho Chi Minh city and cooperate closely with  our Expert Team based in Hungary. As part of our team, you will play a crucial role in developing cutting-edge software solutions aimed at protecting critical infrastructure from cyber threats. You will collaborate with a diverse and skilled team of engineers, security experts, and researchers to build intuitive and robust user interfaces for our cybersecurity products. This is an exciting opportunity to contribute to the security of critical infrastructure and make a meaningful impact in the cybersecurity domain. 
 What You Will be Doing
Develop responsive and interactive user interfaces for our cybersecurity software products using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript (Angular) 
Collaborate closely with product managers, designers, and backend engineers to translate user requirements and design concepts into functional frontend components and features. 
Implement frontend best practices, including modular code architecture, code reusability, performance optimization, and adherence to accessibility standards. 
Write clean, well-documented, and maintainable code following established coding standards and development methodologies. 
Participate in code reviews, provide constructive feedback. 
Work closely with QA engineers to ensure the quality, reliability, and compatibility of frontend applications across different browsers and devices. 
Collaborate with backend engineers to integrate frontend components with backend APIs, services, and data sources, ensuring seamless data flow and system interoperability. 
Stay up-to-date with emerging frontend technologies, tools, and best practices, and propose the adoption of new technologies to enhance development efficiency and product quality. 
Actively participate in Agile development processes, including sprint planning, stand-up meetings, and retrospectives, to contribute to team goals and deliver high-quality software products.
listJob.jobExperience:
What We Need from You 
At least 5 years of frontend development experience 
Working knowledge of HTML5, CSS3, CSS preprocessors (less/sass/scss), TypeScript and latest (ES6+) JavaScript standards
Experience in JavaScript frontend frameworks (such as Angular, React, Vue.js)
Good understanding of best practices of building cross-browser, device-independent interfaces and‚ÄØRESTful web services
Open to learn new technologies every day 
Strong troubleshooting and performance tuning skills 
Advance English communication for both speaking and writing
Familiarity with Git and branching models is an advantage
It‚Äôs good to have experience with Jira, Confluence  
Why you'll love working in the Team:
Stable, growing international company background with an exceptional customer group.
Work very closely with our Expert in EU
Opportunity to become familiar with the Cybersecurity space
The newest technology environment
Interview Flow:  Please be notes: during the interview flow, you expected to do the coding test in parallel. 
Hiring Manager CV Review
First: Technical Interview
Final: Executive Interview

listJob.name: Senior Infrastructure & Security Specialist
listJob.location: 235 Nguy·ªÖn VƒÉn C·ª´, Qu·∫≠n 1, TP H·ªì Ch√≠ Minh
listJob.description:
Network Administration:
Design, configure, and manage complex LAN, WAN, and wireless networks.
Perform advanced network troubleshooting and optimization to ensure maximum network performance and uptime.
Lead the implementation of advanced security measures such as VPNs, IDS/IPS, and network segmentation for enhanced protection.
Server Administration:
Oversee the installation, configuration, and maintenance of enterprise-level server hardware and operating systems (Windows, Linux).
Lead server performance monitoring and capacity planning efforts, ensuring optimal resource utilization and scalability.
Manage virtualization platforms (VMWare, Hyper-V) and implement advanced disaster recovery solutions.
Server Room, Data Center Management, Data Protection & Disaster Recovery:
Oversee physical infrastructure management, including the planning of expansions, upgrades, and relocations as necessary.
Implement and manage comprehensive data backup and disaster recovery strategies, ensuring business continuity in case of system failures or security breaches.
IT Security & Compliance:
Implement, and manage security policies to protect the IT infrastructure from evolving cybersecurity threats.
Follow up with security incident response efforts and ensure regular patching and vulnerability assessments are conducted.
Ensure compliance with industry regulations, standards, and organizational policies.
Hardware and Software Management:
Oversee the procurement, configuration, and lifecycle management of infrastructure hardware and software, including servers, storage solutions, and networking equipment.
Resolve escalated hardware and software issues and implement proactive maintenance strategies to minimize downtime.
Leadership and Mentorship:
Provide mentorship and guidance to junior IT staff, helping them develop their technical skills and grow within their roles.
Document and establish best practices, system configurations, and procedures to streamline infrastructure operations.
Advanced IT Projects:
Key role for IT infrastructure projects, coordinating with cross-functional teams and stakeholders to ensure successful implementation.
Drive the adoption of cutting-edge technologies, such as cloud platforms (AWS), for enhanced scalability and cost optimization.
Collaborate with the IT leadership team and other departments to ensure IT solutions meet organizational needs.
listJob.jobExperience:
Education: 
Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or a related field.
Experience: 
Minimum of 3 - 5 years of experience in IT infrastructure, operations, or a technical support environment, with a focus on advanced enterprise systems, with multiple sites. Working for global companies is a plus.
Expertise Skills: 
Expertise in IT systems, networking, and infrastructure components, including Active Directory, DNS, DHCP, RADIUS, Citrix, Office 365, Zabbix, Grafana, ...
Proficiency with enterprise networking protocols and hardware, including Cisco, HP, switches, Wi-Fi AP (Ruckus, Aruba), and Firewalls (Palo Alto, FortiGate).
Experience in project management.
Soft Skills:
Strong problem-solving, troubleshooting, and analytical skills.
Excellent leadership, communication, and interpersonal abilities.
listJob.privilege:
Company Product:
A multi-brand product hamper for monthly family usage (subject to change depending on the availability of our products)
- Rice (Meizan/Neptune)
- Sauces (Nam Duong soya sauces, chili sauces, mayonnaise.. )
- Grain value added (Meizan macaroni/egg noodles‚Ä¶)
Annual Leave: 12 days per year
Private Healthcare Insurance:
Bao Viet Insurance: After a working year since your first working day (around 2,800 USD/year).
Annual Health Check-up:
Provided once per year (in your 1st year we have covered with Onboarding process)
Other HR-related activities:
Will be informed to all employees every year:
Tet Dinner (right after Lunar New Year Festival)
Outing Trip
Family Day (every 2 years)
Sport Day/ Tournament (every 2 years)
Trade Union Activities
Core/Functional/Leadership Competency training plan for the whole company and team request according to annual training budget.

listJob.location: A5 Building, E- Office Park, Road, T√¢n Thu·∫≠n, ƒê. S√°ng T·∫°o, T√¢n Thu·∫≠n ƒê√¥ng, Qu·∫≠n 7, TP H·ªì Ch√≠ Minh
listJob.description:
Job Description
MiTek‚Äôs Component Manufacturing division is seeking a dynamic and passionate Software Engineer to help pioneer industry changing solutions for the residential construction industry. This position will be part of a team working on a 3D BIM solution for single or multi-family modeling, design, and estimating. Be part of a high-performing and collaborative team that is focused on innovation and engaging MiTek customers, while creating powerful software.
Role, Responsibilities & Typical Activities
‚Ä¢ Code, enhance, test, and debug 3D CAD/Engineering desktop software using C#, SQL Server, and the .NET Framework.
‚Ä¢ Contribute to large, breakthrough enhancements in our CAD/BIM platform. Efforts require refactoring existing logic, feasibility analysis, and creating new enhancements.
‚Ä¢ Collaborate with business analysts, testing, and other development teams to ensure solutions are efficient, consistent, and fulfill business needs. 
‚Ä¢ Perform design and analysis on efforts before starting development.
‚Ä¢ Author technical documents for software architecture or design as required.
‚Ä¢ Participate in design reviews, code reviews, and collaborative requirements reviews.
‚Ä¢ Apply generally accepted programming standards and techniques to ensure efficient performance and data manipulation.
‚Ä¢ Attendance during regular workhours and overtime as required.
‚Ä¢ Collaborate with multiple global teams to contribute to a large-scale project.
listJob.jobExperience:
Required Qualifications:
‚Ä¢ Bachelor of Science degree in Computer Science or related field. Additional, equivalent work experience may be substituted for the degree requirement
‚Ä¢ Experience with C# (or C++, or Java)
‚Ä¢ Knowledge of data structures and strong understanding of object-oriented principles
‚Ä¢ Comfortable digging into large, unfamiliar codebases to diagnose, debug, and resolve critical issues
‚Ä¢ Must possess excellent verbal and written communication skills in English and the ability to communicate in both technical and business terms. (English level B2 - CEFR or equivalent)
Preferred Qualifications:
‚Ä¢ Experience with .NET Framework
‚Ä¢ Experience working in an Agile development environment
‚Ä¢ Experience working developing desktop applications
‚Ä¢ Understanding of mathematical concepts involving algebra and geometry

listJob.name: [Urgent] Technical Business Analyst
listJob.location: Charmington La Pointe Officetel Apartments, 181 Cao Thang St, Qu·∫≠n 10, TP H·ªì Ch√≠ Minh
listJob.description:
About CubicStack Solutions
CubicStack Solutions is a software development company with its namesake approach of three dimensional thinking upon various stages and levels of application design and development. We maintain in-house products that are in the FinTech space while also having anchor, long-term clients around the world across Asia and Europe in the Blockchain space. CubicStack also works with Venture Capitalist firms to invest in and innovate new products and technologies.
Responsibilities
Project Ideation/Discovery/Planning
1. Works closely with the Clients or appointed representatives (e.g Product owner, client PM or BA) to understand the Business Pain points.
2. Gather, assess and analyze Business requirements needed to provide solutions to the defined business Pain points.
3. Together with the Clients, assigned Project manager and Development team, drafts/designs possible processes to meet the Clients‚Äô requirements.
4. Works closely with the assigned Project manager, Development Team and the Client to make sure that Business requirements and accurately converted to appropriate Features/Epics/tasks and within the agreed budget.
Change Management
1. Works closely with the assigned Project manager, Development Team and the Client to manage Change requests.
2. Help the assigned Project manager to manage Change requests and only accept what are critical to the original scope, otherwise, new set of Requirements gathering, and costing will be applied.
3. Help the assigned Project manager to clearly discuss to the business client the impact of the Change request to the over all project, in terms of timelines, cost and functionality.
Test
1. Assist in translating requirements and use cases into test conditions and expected results for product, user acceptance, and operational acceptance testing.
2. May act as a Tester for the Users Acceptance Test Phase.
Pre- launch
1. Assist the assigned Project manager to plan out for the roll out and system implementation.
2. Assist the assigned Project manager to prepare for the needed trainings and system onboarding, in terms of training materials and training spiels.
Post Launch/BAU
1. Assist the assigned Project Manager/Incident manager to gather feedback for users and reflecting these feedbacks via an appropriate documentation.
2. Assist the assigned Project manager and Development team to perform Triage on what Features/Epics are to be included in the next Iteration.
3. High expertise in Reports creation for Project evaluation, Project closure, Cost to revenue projections, and to whatever Project reports needed by the Management.
Adhoc Function
1. Will assist the Department head, in terms of technical writing and Documentation, in any Organizational Process Improvement endeavors.
2. Will assist the Department head, in terms of technical writing and Documentation, in any administrative endeavors.
listJob.jobExperience:
1. A Bachelor‚Äôs Degree in Management, Computer Science or any Related fields.
2. At least 5 years‚Äô experience as a Software Development Business Analyst.
3. Knowledgeable in MS 365 suite, JIRA, Vios/Lucid Chart and any Project management and work tools. 
4. Strong Organizational skill.
5. Strong Communication skill, client facing with high executive presence.

listJob.description:
Welcome to SMG Swiss Marketplace Group AG
 SMG Swiss Marketplace Group AG was founded in November 2021 by TX Group AG, Ringier AG, La MobilieÃÄre and General Atlantic. SMG Swiss Marketplace Group Vietnam is an innovation center of SMG Group in Vietnam. We are officially named as one of the 2023 Asia & Vietnam Best Workplaces by the Great Place to Work Institute, the world's most well-known organization for work culture assessment.
 We are a pioneering network of online marketplaces and cutting-edge digital company that simplifies people ºs lives with innovative products. SMG Swiss Marketplace Group Ltd. provides customers with the best tools to meet their life decision needs. The portfolio includes Real Estate (ImmoScout24, Homegate, Flatfox, , , , Publimmo, , CASASOFT, IAZI), Automotive (AutoScout24, MotoScout24), General Marketplaces (, , Ricardo) and Finance & Insurance (FinanceScout24). 
 SMG Real Estate (a business unit of SMG Swiss Marketplace Group AG) is running the top 2 leading digital real estate classifieds platforms in Switzerland (homegate.ch, immoscout24.ch). We empower everyone to make the best decisions in Swiss real estate and bring commercial real estate agencies, owners and potential tenants and buyers together.
 We count more than 15 million visits from people who use our portal and have more than 100 million page views per month.
 You will be part of SMG Real Estate Engineering, a remote-friendly department of 80+ engineers located in four countries (Switzerland, Serbia, Germany & Vietnam)
 You will belong to the Platform Engineering Team. The team is responsible for providing both the tools our development teams use to manage the lifecycle of our product and the experience of using them.
 Job Description
Contribute to our internal development platform (IDP) by designing, implementing, and maintaining internal tooling and systems.
Leverage TypeScript, AWS CDK, Serverless architecture, and event-driven microservices to create scalable and efficient solutions.
Collaborate with engineers, stakeholders, and cross-functional teams to design, implement and monitor the effectiveness of internal tooling and common standards.
Drive innovation by exploring and recommending new technologies and approaches to solve complex problems.
Identify opportunities for improving the overall developer experience and happiness.

Strong sense of ownership and accountability for the team's deliverables.

ABOUT JARVIS TECH
We aim to build Asia's number one IT solutions team. We are young and dynamic, with strong potential for growth. We create secure information environments and possess extensive experience in risk management. Our big data analysis services enable clients to understand market trends and implement adaptive strategies.
We are seeking a highly skilled and technically-oriented Technical Product Manager to join our team. In this role, you will leverage your strong technical expertise to oversee the development and delivery of software products for our clients. While you will collaborate with cross-functional teams, the emphasis will be on your technical knowledge to ensure our products meet the highest standards of quality and performance.
Key Responsibilities:
Define product vision, strategy, and roadmap with a strong focus on technical feasibility and innovation.
Collaborate with clients to understand their technical requirements and translate them into detailed product specifications.
Work closely with engineering teams to provide technical guidance and ensure alignment with product goals.
Manage the entire product lifecycle from planning to execution and delivery, with an emphasis on technical aspects.
Prioritize product features and enhancements based on technical challenges, client feedback, and market trends.
Conduct technical evaluations, including performance benchmarking and code reviews.
Develop and maintain product documentation, including technical specifications, user stories, and acceptance criteria.
Coordinate with design teams to ensure technical feasibility of user interfaces.
Monitor product performance and gather technical feedback for continuous improvement.
Communicate technical updates and progress to internal and external stakeholders.
listJob.jobExperience:
Requirements:
Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or a related field.
Minimum of 3 years of experience in product management, with a strong technical background.
Proven technical expertise in software development and architecture, including both backend and frontend technologies.
Proficiency in backend technologies: JavaScript (Node.js), Python, Go, PHP, and familiarity with database systems such as MySQL, MongoDB, or PostgreSQL.
Proficiency in frontend technologies: React, Next.js, Vue.js, jQuery, HTML, CSS.
Experience with system design, architecture, and integration.
Experience working with cross-functional teams, including engineering, design, and sales.
Excellent project management skills with a proven track record of delivering technically complex products on time and within budget.
Strong analytical and problem-solving skills.
Excellent communication and interpersonal skills, with the ability to convey technical concepts to non-technical stakeholders.
Fluent in English, both written and verbal.
As the plus:
Experience with medium/large traffic system
Understanding Networking
Strong understanding any kind of CDN Services like as: Cloudflare, Cloudfront, Akamai

Language requirements: English - listening/intermediate, speaking/intermediate, reading/advanced, writing/advanced

About the Role: We are seeking a Fresher QA Engineer with strong logical thinking skills and a solid understanding of software testing concepts, capable of defining and writing comprehensive test cases. This position offers an excellent opportunity for candidates with 6-12 months of experience in software testing, who may have limited practical exposure but demonstrate a proactive attitude and eagerness to develop their skills further.
Priority will be given to candidates with a programming background or foundational knowledge of automation testing, with the potential and ambition to transition into an Automation QA role in the future.
Key Responsibilities:
Understand and define test scope and success criteria.
Design and document detailed, high-coverage test cases.
Validate and ensure the quality and accuracy of test data.
Execute test cases, report defects, and provide actionable recommendations to enhance product quality.
Stay updated with the latest industry trends and technologies.
listJob.jobExperience:

Solid knowledge of fundamental testing concepts, software testing processes, and Scrum-Agile methodology.
Basic knowledge of algorithms.
At least 6 months of experience in a similar position
Skill

Good communication and teamwork skills.
Logical thinking and problem-solving skills.
Familiarity with tools such as Jira, MySQL, and Microsoft Office Suite.
Basic English communication skills, especially reading and writing.
Attitude
(For manual candidates) Willingness to learn and work on Automation Testing when necessary.
Detail-oriented, process-compliant.

Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or a related field
Basic knowledge of programming in C/C++, Python.

Familiarity with testing tools and techniques such as Postman, Cypress, Selenium.

 About the Role:
We are collaborating with an ASX-listed company in Australia, to revolutionize compliance management. We're building a cutting-edge platform that leverages real-time and predictive analytics to streamline compliance processes and reduce costs. As a Backend Developer, you'll be a critical player in designing, building, and maintaining the robust backend systems that power our innovative product. You'll work closely with data scientists, frontend developers, and AWS architects to deliver a high-performance, scalable, and secure platform.
 Responsibilities:
Backend Development: Design, develop, and maintain backend systems using Python, following best practices for code quality, scalability, and security.
API Design and Development: Create and maintain well-documented, secure, and scalable RESTful APIs that adhere to industry standards.
Database Design and Management: Design efficient database schemas, optimize queries, and manage both SQL (e.g., PostgreSQL) and NoSQL databases (e.g., MongoDB, DynamoDB).
AWS Services Integration: Leverage AWS services like Lambda, S3, SQS, EventBridge, and Fargate to build scalable, serverless, and event-driven architectures.
Performance Optimization: Continuously monitor and optimize backend systems for performance, scalability, and reliability.
Security: Implement robust security measures to protect sensitive data and ensure compliance with industry standards.
Monitoring and Logging: Implement comprehensive logging and monitoring systems to track system performance and troubleshoot issues.
Collaboration: Work effectively within a cross-functional team, including data scientists, frontend developers, and AWS architects.
Mentorship: Share your knowledge and expertise with junior developers and contribute to a positive team environment.
listJob.jobExperience:
4+ years of experience in backend development with a strong command of Python.
Proven expertise in designing and developing scalable, secure APIs.
Deep understanding of data structures, algorithms, and design patterns.
Strong experience with SQL and NoSQL databases (MongoDB, DynamoDB).
Hands-on experience with AWS services (Lambda, S3, SQS, EventBridge, Fargate).
Expertise in CI/CD pipelines for backend development.
Solid understanding of AWS architecture and design principles.
Ability to work independently and collaboratively in a fast-paced environment.
Intermediate English proficiency in both written and verbal communication
Good understanding of front-end development.
Additional Information:
Work location: Can Tho, Viet Nam
Working hours: 8 hours per day, from Monday to Friday
listJob.privilege:
14 days-off per year and gradually increasing by seniority
Holidays and New Year holidays according to labor law
Health insurance, Social insurance
Bonus for excellent employees
Opportunities for professional growth and development
Be part of a creative and innovative work environment
Work in a dynamic, collaborative, transparent, non-hierarchical culture
Opportunity to work with the latest technology and tools.

listJob.description:
About the Role
We‚Äôre looking for a Web3 Engineer to join our fast-growing team. In this role, you'll focus primarily on building cutting-edge decentralized applications (dApps) and smart contracts while also supporting traditional web development efforts. If you thrive in the blockchain ecosystem and love designing secure, scalable systems, we want to hear from you!
 What You‚Äôll Do
Design, develop, and deploy decentralized applications (dApps) from concept to launch.
Create, deploy, and interact with smart contracts on various blockchain networks.
Collaborate with cross-functional teams to integrate Web3 functionalities with existing systems.
Stay abreast of emerging blockchain trends, tools, and best practices.
Optimize dApp performance and security to meet evolving user demands.
Develop and maintain web applications using modern frameworks.
Write clean, efficient code for backend and frontend systems.
Assist with code reviews, testing, and quality assurance.

listJob.name: Product Owner / Business Analyst
listJob.location: 45 Nguy·ªÖn H·ªØu An, Qu·∫≠n S∆°n Tr√†, ƒê√† N·∫µng
listJob.description:
TechSoft is seeking a talented and experienced individual to join our team as a Product Owner / Business Analyst in Da Nang. In this hybrid role, you will bridge the gap between business objectives and technical execution, ensuring the successful delivery of products that meet both market demands and client needs. Your responsibilities will encompass defining product vision, managing the product backlog, and analyzing business requirements to drive product development 
You‚Äôll have at least 5 years of experience working Product Owner / Business Analyst, demonstrate good English communication skills, and have a knack for managing your time and priorities. Most of all, you thrive in a collaborative environment, you‚Äôre not afraid to learn new things, and you aim to have excellent work results. The perfect candidate will also have logical thinking as well as proactivity towards problems, passion for excellence and an open mind for learning. 
Responsibilities:
Product Vision & Strategy: 
Define and communicate the product vision and strategy, aligning with business goals and market trends. 
Develop and maintain a product roadmap that outlines future product enhancements and iterations. 
Backlog Management: 
Create, prioritize, and manage the product backlog, ensuring clarity and alignment with stakeholder expectations. 
Develop detailed user stories with clear acceptance criteria for the development team. 
Business Analysis: 
Conduct comprehensive business analysis to identify problems, opportunities, and solutions that align with business objectives. 
Document and analyze business processes, requirements, and data to inform product development. 
Stakeholder Collaboration: 
Liaise with internal and external stakeholders to gather requirements, provide updates, and ensure alignment throughout the product lifecycle. 
Maintain strong client relationships to ensure satisfaction and effective communication regarding project activities. 
Development Team Coordination: 
Work closely with the software development team to ensure a clear understanding of requirements and timely delivery of product features. 
Quality Assurance: 
Oversee system testing and User Acceptance Testing (UAT) to ensure the product meets quality standards and business requirements. 
Ensure that recommended solutions are functionally effective, technically viable, and cost-efficient. 
Continuous Improvement: 
Monitor product performance and user feedback to identify areas for improvement and drive product enhancements. 
Stay updated with industry trends and best practices to inform product development strategies.
listJob.jobExperience:
Minimum of 5 years of combined experience in Product Ownership / Business Analysis in the software industry. 
Proven track record of successfully delivering software products from conception to launch. 
Strong English communication skills (verbal and written); 
Information Technology, Computer Science, Business Administration, or a related field. 
Familiarity with UX/UI best practices. 
Strong understanding of Agile/Scrum methodologies and experience participating in Agile ceremonies. 
Proficiency in the following tools, including but not limited to Jira, Figma, and MS Office. 
Strong analytical and problem-solving skills with a proactive approach to challenges 
Familiarity with Object-Oriented Analysis (OOA) and Object-Oriented Design (OOD) principles is a plus

listJob.name: Senior Developer (JavaScript/TypeScript, Node.js)
listJob.location: 33 An Th∆∞·ª£ng 33 street, Bac My An ward, Qu·∫≠n Ng≈© H√†nh S∆°n, ƒê√† N·∫µng
listJob.description:
Description
SEADEV is a product company that delivers effective, affordable sales and digital marketing solutions to our clients. We measure our success not only in terms of profit, but also in terms of global spiritual impact. As a company, we seek to care for our team members and bring transformation to lives in our community. Over the next 10 years we are laser focused on achieving our targets of growing our business 10-fold, supporting over 500 jobs in 10 developing markets, while positively transforming the communities we work within by giving financially and volunteering our time. 
 JOB OVERVIEW
The Senior Software Developer will join the team and report directly to the Product Manager. is the primary product of Seadev over the past four years, with a mission to develop cutting-edge sales and digital marketing solutions that help Shed and Carport businesses grow in the North American market.
As the Senior Software Developer, you will play a vital role in crafting the next generation of our products, from designing and implementing new features to refining existing functionalities. Collaborating closely with cross-functional teams, you'll ensure our solutions meet top standards. With a focus on problem-solving and innovation, you'll drive our projects forward, shaping the future of ShedPro's offerings.
listJob.jobExperience:
Minimum 5 - 7 years of working experience as a software developer, software architect, or similar. 
Strong proficiency in JavaScript/TypeScript and Node.js.
Knowledge of multiple front-end (e.g. HTML/CSS, JavaScript) and server-side (e.g. PHP, Node.js) languages.
Experience with the Git version control system.
Familiar with Agile software development practices.
Solid understanding of RESTful API design principles.
Experience with ReactJS/Laravel & Wordpress.
Experience in cloud solution development with AWSs.
Experience in writing unit tests is a plus.
Understanding and experience working with 3D models or Babylon.js is a plus.
Strong verbal and written communication in English is a plus.
listJob.privilege:
Bonus: 13th Salary, Work anniversary bonus, Referral bonus.
Gifts: Birthday gifts for employees and their children, Wedding anniversary gift, Tet's gift, Baby shower, Women's day, Children's day.
Healthcare: Private Health Insurance & Annual Health Checkup.
Performance & Salary Review: Annual assessments to ensure fair and equal pay based on performance results.
>20 days off per year
Friday off in July and August: Enjoy longer weekends, recharge, and soak up the summer sun.
Learning & Development: Weekly training & inspirational talks at our Social Forum and English classes.
Vietnam Social Security: Contribution from probation period. 
Healthy Food & Snacks: FREE daily snack and Friday lunch.
Team building events and holidays: Company retreat, Family Day, Thanksgiving, Christmas, Year End party.
Sport activities: Badminton & football.

listJob.description:
About the Role
We‚Äôre looking for a Fullstack Engineer to join our fast-growing team. You'll help build web applications that are cutting-edge and scalable. If you love creating strong systems and enjoy working in a fast-paced environment, this role is for you!
 What You‚Äôll Do
Design and build high-quality web apps from start to finish.
Work with product managers, designers, and other engineers to create solutions that meet business needs.
Write clean, efficient code for both the backend and frontend.
Review code, run tests, and keep our software quality high.
Make our apps fast and ready to grow as we scale up.
Help junior developers learn and grow.
Stay up-to-date with the latest tech and tools.
Contribute to our tech plans and future direction.
Work with DevOps to streamline deployments and scaling.
Make sure our tech aligns with business goals.
Improve our systems and reduce tech debt.
listJob.jobExperience:
What We‚Äôre Looking For
5+ years of experience in fullstack development.
Strong skills in backend development using Node.js, Express, Nest.js, or similar.
Skilled in frontend development with React, Vue.js, or Angular.
Experience with databases like PostgreSQL or MongoDB.
Solid understanding of data structures and algorithms, with the ability to apply them to solve real-world problems.
Know-how with RESTful APIs and web services.
Familiar with DevOps tools like Docker, Kubernetes, and CI/CD.
Experience with cloud services (AWS, Google Cloud, Azure).
Good at making software fast and scalable.
Problem solver with a knack for tackling tough tech issues.
Great communicator who can work with both tech and non-tech teams in English.
Proven track record of delivering quality software on time.
 Bonus Points For
Experience with web3 technologies like EVM/Solidity.
Experience with serverless and microservices.
Familiar with GraphQL and real-time tech like WebSockets.
Knowledge of web security best practices.
Hands-on with TypeScript, Next.js, or Nuxt.js.
Contributions to open source or tech communities.
Familiar with Agile tools and methods (Scrum, Kanban, Jira).
Knowledge of tech compliance (GDPR, CCPA).
Experience with performance monitoring tools.
Understanding of user experience and accessibility.

In this role, you will be responsible for providing first-line technical support to ensure the smooth functioning of our company's IT infrastructure.
