This role is responsible for managing both ongoing & ad-hoc data requests and ensuring data accuracy & availability for decision-making. The ideal candidate will have strong SQL skills, experience with Power BI, and the ability to work collaboratively with cross-functional teams, including Sales, Merchant, Marketing, Product, Product Development, and Data Engineering.
Handle ongoing and ad-hoc data requests using SQL to extract, process, and analyze large datasets from various sources.
Design, build, and maintain dashboards and reports using Power BI to support business decision-making.
Provide insights and recommendations to internal stakeholders based on data analysis, ensuring reports are actionable and aligned with business goals.
Validate data accuracy, identify discrepancies, and propose solutions for data improvement.

Soft Skills:

listJob.name: Lead Product Owner
listJob.location: 102 Nguy·ªÖn ƒê√¨nh Ch√≠nh, Ph∆∞·ªùng 15, Qu·∫≠n Ph√∫ Nhu·∫≠n, TP. HCM, Qu·∫≠n 1, TP H·ªì Ch√≠ Minh
listJob.description:
I. About Campaign System & Scan It
 The Campaign system is designed to streamline reward distribution for consumers, agents, and employees through interactive activities such as games, SMS-based rewards, and invoice scanning. It enables businesses to quickly set up and launch campaigns, reducing both time and operational costs. 
A key component of the system, Scan It, leverages advanced IDP (Intelligent Document Processing) technology to extract data from purchase invoices. This allows brands to execute promotions, reward consumers efficiently, and foster post-purchase engagement. By automating data collection, Scan It ensures accurate purchase tracking, minimizes manual entry errors, and eliminates the need for physical gift stockpiling. It also optimizes costs associated with loyalty programs and promotions, such as staffing and logistical expenses. Ultimately, Scan It empowers B2B clients/brandsto enhance consumer experiences while improving operational efficiency.
 II. What you need to do 
We are looking for an experienced Lead Product Owner to drive the development of our Campaign System & AI-driven Scan It solution. This role will lead a team of product owners & business analysts and collaborate very closely with cross-functional teams to build innovative, AI-driven solutions to enable fast & effective campaign creation.
 Key responsibilities:
 Strategic planning 
Take lead in defining the product vision and strategy, aligning it with the company‚Äôs goals and market opportunities.
Stay up to date with the market demands & technology advancement to best manage & adapt the defined product roadmap. 
Team management 
Lead and mentor a team of product owners & business analysts, foster a collaborative and high-performance culture.
Set clear goals and expectations, ensuring team members have the resources and support needed to succeed. 
Promote knowledge sharing and best practices among the team to improve efficiency and innovation.
Cross-functional leadership 
Act as a bridge between Product, Engineering, Design & Sales teams to align goals & priorities 
Facilitate clear and effective communication across teams to ensure seamless product execution. 
Work closely with Sales team to understand business needs and translate them into actionable product strategies. 
Drive a culture of collaboration and shared ownership, ensuring all stakeholders are engaged throughout the product lifecycle. 
Product development oversight 
Oversee the entire product development lifecycle, from ideation to launch and continuous improvement. 
Ensure feature development aligns with user needs, business goals, and technical feasibility. 
Manage timelines, risks, and dependencies to keep development on track and within scope. 
Collaborate with engineering to balance innovation with scalability, security, and maintainability.
listJob.jobExperience:
6+ years of experience in product management, with at least 2 years in a leadership role.
Proven experience in leading and mentoring product owners/business analysts or product teams.
Strong understanding of AI technologies (OCR, Vision Transformers, etc.) and their applications in product development. 
Proven experience in marketing technology, campaign management, or automation tools. 
Excellent communication and stakeholder management skills. 
Hands-on experience with Agile methodologies (Scrum, Kanban, etc.). 
Strong analytical mindset with experience in using data to drive decision-making.

listJob.name: DevOps Engineers (AWS, Azure, Python)
listJob.location: 117 Ly Chinh Thang Street, Vo Thi Sau Ward, Qu·∫≠n 3, TP H·ªì Ch√≠ Minh
listJob.description:
iDeaLogic is an IT Staffing company specializing in software and application development. We provide technology services that digitally transform our partners and generate business value. We are a Microsoft Gold Partner and are ISO 27001:2022 certified. We offer a comprehensive range of services, including staffing and technology consulting, software engineering, and ongoing support. We fully embrace the Agile software engineering principles and use SCRUM to manage projects. Our multidisciplinary expertise enables us to deliver innovative solutions that help our partners achieve their goals.
Responsibilities:
System Monitoring & Maintenance: 
Monitor Azure/AWS environments for performance and reliability. 
Troubleshoot, resolve issues, and apply system updates and patches. 
Infrastructure Management: 
Provision and configure resources on Azure/AWS (VMs, storage, networking).
Implement security measures, access controls, and ensure compliance. 
Manage backups, disaster recovery, and encryption of data at rest and in transit.
Automation & Optimization:
Automate provisioning, configuration, and deployments using IaC tools (ARM, Terraform, CloudFormation, Ansible). 
Optimize resource usage, performance, and cost efficiency. 
Develop and manage CI/CD pipelines for Azure/AWS environments. 
Collaboration & Support
Work with development teams on application deployment and system performance. 
Provide technical guidance, troubleshoot performance, scalability, and security issues. 
Stay updated on the latest cloud features and best practices (AWS: CloudWatch, Docker, Kubernetes).
listJob.jobExperience:
Proficiency in English (verbal and written) is mandatory. 
5+ years of experience with IaC tools (Terraform, CloudFormation, Ansible). 
Strong knowledge of AWS services (Lambda, STEP, API Gateway) and Azure platform. 
AWS certifications (DevOps Engineer, Solutions Architect, SysOps Admin) and Microsoft Certified: Azure Administrator Associate. 
Proficiency in scripting languages (Python, PowerShell, Bash, C#). 
Experience with DevOps/DevSecOps practices, CI/CD pipelines, and version control. 
Expertise in containerization (Docker), orchestration (Kubernetes, EKS), and API management. 
Familiarity with monitoring/logging tools (CloudWatch, Prometheus, ELK Stack, Grafana). 
Strong problem-solving, troubleshooting, and collaboration skills. 
Nice to have geospatial concepts, 2D/3D geometry.

listJob.name: Business Analyst ‚Äì ODOO ERP
listJob.location: SGH Building, 21/4 Nguyen Thi Huynh Street, Ward 8, Qu·∫≠n Ph√∫ Nhu·∫≠n, TP H·ªì Ch√≠ Minh
listJob.description:
About the role
We are seeking a motivated individual to join our growing team, where you will engage in presales support, collaborate on requirements gathering, and analyze business processes. You will play a key role in designing ODOO ERP solutions, assisting with implementation, and providing training to end-users.
Responsibilities:
Presales Support: Collaborate with sales teams to understand client needs, conduct product demonstrations, and prepare proposals for prospective clients.
Requirements Gathering: Work closely with stakeholders to understand and document business requirements and translate them into functional specifications and user stories.
Process Analysis: Analyze current business processes and workflows to identify areas for improvement and optimization within the ERP system.
Solution Design: Develop and propose ERP solutions that align with business needs and improve operational efficiency.
Testing and Validation: Develop test plans, conduct system testing, and ensure that ERP solutions meet business requirements and quality standards.
User Training: Provide training and support to end-users to ensure they are effectively utilizing the ERP system.
Project Management: Manage project timelines, deliverables, and communicate progress to stakeholders.
Documentation: Create comprehensive documentation, including requirements specifications, process flows, user guides, and training materials.
Troubleshooting: Provide support in diagnosing and resolving issues within the ERP system.
listJob.jobExperience:
3+ years of experience with Odoo ERP systems.
Experience with business process modelling and documentation tools.
Industry-focused knowledge of Manufacturing, Human Resources, Inventory Management, or Finance is highly preferred.
Advanced in all 4 English skills (Writing/ Speaking/ Reading/ Listening).
Strong analytical and problem-solving skills.
Customer-oriented mindset with a focus on delivering high-quality solutions.
listJob.privilege:
We provide a competitive benefits package designed to support your well-being and enhance your work-life balance, including:
Attractive salary with a 13th-month bonus
Social, Health, and Unemployment Insurance on FULL Salary
15 days of Annual Leave + 3 days of Sick Leave
Premium Private Health and 24/7 Accident Insurance
Annual Company Trip, Year-End Party, and other exciting events
Thoughtful gifts for birthdays, Tet Holiday, Mid-Autumn Festival, and more
Opportunities for stable, long-term career growth

listJob.name: Lead Automation Tester
listJob.location: ., Qu·∫≠n 1, TP H·ªì Ch√≠ Minh
listJob.description:
Job Summary
We are seeking a highly skilled and experienced Lead Automation Tester to join our team, who has proper English proficiency. As the Lead Automation Tester with 3+ years experience, you will be responsible for designing, developing, and executing automated tests to ensure the functionality and quality of our front-end applications. You will also lead and mentor a team of QA engineers, ensuring the highest standards of software quality.
Key Responsibilities
Design and develop automated test scripts using tools such as Selenium, Cypress, or WebDriverIO.
Lead and mentor a team of QA engineers, providing guidance and support.
Execute automated tests and analyze results to identify defects and ensure software quality.
Collaborate with developers and QA analysts to develop effective test strategies and plans.
Maintain and update test cases and scripts to reflect changes in the application.
Conduct regression testing to ensure new code changes do not break existing functionality.
Create detailed test reports and documentation to track defects and test coverage.
Stay updated with the latest trends and technologies in automation testing.
Participate in agile development processes and ceremonies.
Troubleshoot and debug issues found during testing.
Provide feedback and recommendations to developers on software usability and functionality.
listJob.jobExperience:
Bachelor's degree in computer science, software development, or a related field.
English proficiency
3+ years experience
Previous experience as a test automation engineer.
Solid knowledge of testing methodologies covering test levels, static test, and dynamic testing. 
Manage/ deliver test execution for the new features in different testing life cycles. 
Strong at using testing frameworks and tools, at least one or more from this list: Selenium Webdriver automation framework (Java), Cypress (Javascript/ Typescript), Mobile Automation framework.
Excellent mathematical and problem-solving skills.
The technologies we use in our Quality practices are below. We don‚Äôt expect you to know all of them, but having experience with a large number of technologies is ideal: 
Experience with Java or Javascript/Typescript programming (or similar languages) 
QTest, JIRA, Confluence 
PACT, Postman, SoapUI, REST ,TestNG, Selenium, Cypress, Appium, Espresso,‚Ä¶
Highly accurate and detail-oriented.
Nice to have:
ISTQB ‚Äì Certified 
Experience in the Banking or Financial Services industry 
Exposure to AWS and cloud-native architecture
Performance: JMeter, LoadRunner, Gatling 
Experienced testing on a Microservice-based system (Restful API, Event/ Message driven, Logging)
Familiar with CI/CD process and tools: Jenkins, Docker, AWS, Azure, ‚Ä¶
listJob.privilege:
Generous compensation and benefits package
Exciting career and development opportunities
Professional and engaging working environment
We invest heavily in our people, so if you have an appetite to learn, grow and elevate others around you, this is the place for you!

listJob.location: Havana Tower - 132 Ham Nghi, Qu·∫≠n 1, TP H·ªì Ch√≠ Minh
listJob.description:
Join our team as a Backend Engineer to develop and support our innovative Electronic Know Your Customer (eKYC) solution. This project allows banks to verify customer identities online using biometrics and AI, eliminating the need for face-to-face interactions. Your role will involve integrating our eKYC system for new clients and providing ongoing support for existing clients by troubleshooting issues and updating the product as needed.
Responsibilities
Building highly scalable, highly available, fault-tolerant Web service API‚Äôs to handle millions of transactions per day:
Follow Agile and DevOps practices like CI/CD to deliver quality code at speed to market
Build software services that can integrate effortlessly and securely with banks, third party platforms and vendors 
Think out of the box, innovate, experiment, continuously improve, fail fast and learn as you go in an effort to provide simple yet effective solutions to complex problems
listJob.jobExperience:
Bachelor's degree or higher in Computer Science, Engineering, or related fields.
5+ years of software development experience and solid experience with Golang. 
Knowledge about REST/gRPC API.
Experience in designing and developing API‚Äôs and backend services on various relational and NoSQL databases as MySQL/Postgres, Redis, Elasticsearch, RocksDB, ...
Strong Database and Schema design for performance and scale.
Understanding of system design and tuning for high performance, scalability and reliability.
Experience with Microservice architect is a plus.
Experience with automated testing, CI/CD Jenkins, Docker containers, Kubernetes, caching techniques and Git is nice to have.
Strong working knowledge of data structures, algorithms, object-oriented design, cloud.

listJob.name: Senior DevOps Engineer (CI/CD, Terraform, AWS, Python)
listJob.location: 18th Floor, Peakview Tower, 36 Hoang Cau, Qu·∫≠n ƒê·ªëng ƒêa, H√† N·ªôi
listJob.description:
We are seeking a skilled DevOps Engineer to oversee the continuous integration and delivery pipelines and development environments. This role ensures smooth and efficient software delivery, enabling the development team to focus on building quality products.
 Key Responsibilities:
CI/CD Pipeline Management
Design, implement, and maintain robust CI/CD pipelines to support continuous integration, testing, and deployment.
Automate build, test, and deployment workflows using tools such as GitLab CI/CD.
Monitor, troubleshoot, and optimize pipeline performance to minimize delays and failures.
Development Environment Management
Maintain and improve development environments, ensuring they are aligned with production standards and are easily accessible to the team.
Collaboration with Development Teams
Work closely with software engineers, QA, and DevOps teams to integrate new tools and practices into the development process.
Facilitate developer onboarding by streamlining environment setup and pipeline access.
Provide guidance and training on CI/CD processes and environment best practices.
Automation and Tooling
Identify and implement automation opportunities to enhance productivity and reduce manual effort.
Evaluate, integrate, and maintain development tools such as code linters, static analysis tools, and dependency scanners.
Develop custom scripts or plugins to address team-specific requirements.
Infrastructure as Code (IaC)
Use Terraform or similar tools to provision and manage CI/CD infrastructure.
Ensure pipelines are scalable, secure, and cost-effective.
Monitoring and Reporting
Implement monitoring for pipelines and environments, ensuring early detection of issues.
Generate reports on build/test success rates, deployment frequency, and other key metrics.
listJob.jobExperience:
Required Competence:
Terraform: Proven experience with Terraform for Infrastructure as Code (IaC) implementation.
GitLab: Proficiency in managing and optimizing GitLab CI/CD pipelines.
CI/CD Process Competence: Deep understanding of CI/CD principles and best practices, including tools (e.g. Renovate), workflows, and automation strategies.
 Qualifications:
Required Skills and Experience
Bachelor‚Äôs degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering, or related field (or equivalent experience).
Strong scripting skills (e.g., Python).
Hands-on experience with containerization and orchestration tools like Docker and Kubernetes.
Knowledge of software build tools (e.g., Maven, Gradle, npm) and test frameworks.
Experience with Infrastructure as Code (IaC) tools like Terraform.
Preferred Skills
Familiarity with AWS cloud platforms.
Experience with monitoring tools like Prometheus, Grafana, or ELK Stack.
Knowledge of security best practices for CI/CD pipelines and development environments.
Key Attributes
Strong problem-solving and troubleshooting skills.
Excellent communication and collaboration abilities.
Detail-oriented with a focus on efficiency and reliability.
Passion for automation and process improvement.
listJob.privilege:
An opportunity to work with experienced software engineers worldwide at market leading, innovative Scandinavian SaaS company looking to accelerate growth.
A modern working environment with fun colleagues and challenging tasks.
A Scandinavian work culture that emphasizes creativity, innovation, and work-life balance.
A competitive compensation and benefits package, with 100% salary during the probation period.
A 13th-month salary with an annual salary review.
Flexible working hours from Monday-Friday, with no overtime.
Premium healthcare and accident insurance: the best healthcare plan cover for employees and their children.
A wellness package supports employees in staying healthy and wealthy.

listJob.description:
DevSecOps Engineer is responsible for deploying and managing security tools, ensuring seamless integration across cloud and on-premises environments. This role includes vulnerability management, incident response, compliance with industry standards, and conducting security audits to safeguard the organization's infrastructure.

About PAVE - A product of Discovery Loft
PAVE üîßüöóis an innovative automotive technology company transforming the way the world inspects vehicles. Powered by Intelligent Damage Detection capabilities, PAVE enables anyone with a smartphone to complete a guided vehicle inspection simply by taking photos of their car.
Headquartered in Toronto, our team brings deep expertise from both the automotive and technology industries, blending the best of artificial intelligence and automotive intelligence.
For more information, visit pave.ai.
 What We‚Äôd Love From You
Be open minded to things you do not know,  consistently learn  and grow the skills necessary for the job Be ready to adjust and implement new plans in a fast paced environment Be confident and responsible; responsible down to a single line of code. 
Always be working on self improvement; willing to review your progress and see how you can make it better 
Getting the job done is a priority. 
Have good sportsmanship and be competitive; we have structured the responsibilities to be somewhat like a game! 
Be respectful and helpful to others and your working environment
Treat yourself well and save the Earth.
Be motivated, creative and passionate - it will ignite the rest!

Responsibilities
Security Systems & Integration:
Deploy and configure security tools such as PAM, SIEM (Splunk), EDR/XDR/NDR, IAM, and cloud security platforms.
Integrate these systems with existing infrastructure, ensuring seamless operation across cloud and on-premises environments.
Vulnerability & Risk Management:
Perform vulnerability assessments, manage security patches, and track threat intelligence.
Prioritize vulnerabilities based on severity, ensuring remediation within SLA.∆∞\
Incident Response & Monitoring:
Contribute incident response efforts, managing the process from detection to mitigation.
Use SIEM and EDR tools for real-time security monitoring and alert management.
Develop and maintain incident response playbooks and escalate issues when necessary.
Compliance & Endpoint Security:
Ensure security systems comply with frameworks like ISO 27001, SOC2, and GDPR.
Manage endpoint security through MDM solutions, ensuring secure configurations and device management.
Security Audits & Penetration Testing:
Conduct penetration tests and security audits to assess system vulnerabilities and recommend improvements.
Apply CIS, STIGs, and other security benchmarks to infrastructure.

GEEK Up environment:

listJob.name: Card System Operations
listJob.location: C5 Building Tower, D‚ÄôCapitale Tower, 119 Tran Duy Hung, Qu·∫≠n C·∫ßu Gi·∫•y, H√† N·ªôi
listJob.description:
Job Purpose
The IT Corebanking Card System Operation is responsible for providing Card SYSTEM knowledge in the Card system operation to ensure the stability and performance of the systems.
1. To prevent the incidents & problems from happening by:
- Proactively address weaknesses, risks and problems on the Card system then have remediation plan to mitigate it to improve quality of services.
- Periodically review and assess the weaknesses, risks of the Card system.
2. Manage & hands-on incidents/problems solving activities:
- Manage the troubleshooting and directly handle the incidents & problems relating to the Card system.
- Analyze and conclude the root cause of the incidents & problems, define & implement the solutions to recover the services quickly and prevent them from repeating.
3. Co-operate with Card SYSTEM operation functions to establish and apply operation best practices, standards and frameworks into the Card SYSTEM operation of TCB:
- Train and support.
- Improve the operating processes and tools.
- Monitor & report out the compliance of the operation activities in real-life.
Key Accountabilities (1)
- Collaborate with the appropriate departments to deeply understand the Card system, as a basis for the efficient and stable operation of services.
- Define operation frameworks, standards, processes, checklists, and tools for the Card system and communicate them to Card sytem operation functions to apply into daily
operation.
- Analyze and propose improvements upon technology and standards across the organization.
- Participate in training courses to remain up-to-date and knowledgeable in terms of industry trends and emerging technologies for IT operation support.
- Provide advice, trainings, and supports to people in the Card system operation function.
- Participate as a key member in the incident response team to directly drive incident/problem handling progress and also responsible for analyzing and concluding the
root cause of the incidents and problems; define and implement the solutions to recover the services quickly and prevent them from repeating.
- Develop methodology and assessment plan to proactively address weaknesses, risks and problems on the Card system, then provide remediation plan to improve quality of services.
- Creatively and independently provide resolutions to technical problems in a productivity and quality of service manner.
- Monitor and report out the compliance of the operation activities in real-life.
- Report periodically to the Director of Infrastructure Services Excellent Center.
Key Accountabilities (2)
- Identify risks and coordinate with relevant units to propose methods to measure and minimize risks in the Card system operations.
- Ensure that team members fulfill their commitments on service quality and comply with the Bank's regulations and policies.
listJob.jobExperience:
Qualifications
- A bachelor‚Äôs degree in computer science or a related field.
- A minimum of 2 years' experience as a Card system Operator.
- Proficiency in develop and operate corebanking services.
- Analytical mindset and good problem-solving skills.
- Excellent verbal and written communication skills.
- Highly organized and responsible.
- Capable of working under pressure.
- Up-to-date with trends and developments in database administration.
- English, according to TCB's regulations in each period.

listJob.name: Senior Project Manager (Release Train Engineer)
listJob.location: ROX Tower, 54A Nguyen Chi Thanh, Lang Thuong, Qu·∫≠n ƒê·ªëng ƒêa, H√† N·ªôi
listJob.description:
By applying for the above position, you accept and agree that your personal data and any information stated in the attached curriculum vitae (CV) will be used and processed by ITViec and NAB Vietnam for recruitment purposes. The storage and processing of such information will comply with the applicable laws of Vietnam, and the policies and procedures of ITViec and NAB Vietnam regarding personal data, as amended from time to time.
Your Job Responsibilities

Release Train Engineer's (RTE) major responsibilities are to manage and coordinate delivery in line with our Domain operating model, partnering with product owners and engineering as well as all technology teams required. RTEs communicate with stakeholders, plan delivery, resolve and escalate impediments, manage finances and risk and drive relentless improvement. 
This role is also a servant leader and a coach for Agile Release Train (ART) and supports the implementation of new and better ways of working using Agile frameworks and methods 
 
YOUR JOB RESPONSIBILITIES 
Devise a delivery plan and facilitate execution across diverse set of Agile development teams to ensure strategy and execution alignment  
Management of financials including obtaining estimates and resource plans to develop a consolidated forecast, then analysing any variances cross multiple  
Reporting and communication, including keeping key stakeholders informed of overall progress against the release commitments  
Provide coaching to help resolve issues across the relevant delivery squads  
Facilitate Agile release execution and planning events, including but not limited to progressive elaboration of breaking down large units of work into epics and features in collaboration of scrum masters and their squads  
Manage dependencies across squads and remove roadblocks to drive outcomes with product owners and business stakeholders  
Escalation points for dealing with issues, risks and removing bottlenecks/impediments  
Manage and optimise the flow of value and drive relentless improvement by assessing the agility level with a focus on improvement  
Coach leaders, teams and Scrum Masters in Agile practices and mindsets and promote a collaborative team environment  
Management of release readiness including SIT coordination, release approvals and high level deployment planning  
Contribute to the creation of a strong, capable and engaged team
listJob.jobExperience:
Must have 
At least 8 years project management experience relating to major IT projects.  
Experience across Agile and adaptive delivery models and mindsets.  
Track record of strong experience operating effectively and delivering consistent results in a large complex business.  
Strong understanding of the software development lifecycle.  
Good business awareness and commercial understanding.  

Nice-to-have 
Tertiary degree in finance, Banking and IT from a recognised institution is preferred. 
Agile Certification desirable.

 PLUS SKILLS AND EXPERIENCE

listJob.privilege:
We are a diverse crowd of doers and thinkers who work 24/7 from our offices in Denmark, Sweden and Vietnam, all of us towards the same goal ‚Äì creating outstanding solutions and the best customer experience.

listJob.description:
The development of software for MFPs and related optional devices requires extensive know-how and advanced technology. Our projects are large-scale, allowing you to experience significant achievements upon completion by enhancing your skills.
Objective: Development of embedded software for MFPs and related optional devices.
Job Responsibilities: Act as a bridge engineer between our company and business partners.
Job Description:
„ÉªResponsible for developing dedicated software to control MFPs and related optional devices.
„ÉªPerform debugging and evaluation using hardware devices and simulators.
„ÉªSupport communication and coordination between our company and business partners as a bridge engineer. This includes understanding requirements and reporting progress in Japanese, explaining specifications and action plans to business partners, and providing appropriate instructions to ensure product quality. Additionally, provide accurate translations and communication, considering the local language and customs, to prevent misunderstandings.
listJob.jobExperience:

More than 3 years of experience as a bridge engineer in embedded software development, or more than 3 years of experience in managing embedded software development, or more than 5 years of experience as an embedded software engineer.

Proficiency in Japanese at N2 level or above, with fluent speaking, listening, and writing skills.
Proficiency in English, with the ability to speak, listen, and write.
Ability to actively communicate and cooperate with colleagues and supervisors.
Willingness to work for a long period (10 years or more) as a founding member of the Software Development Center.

Relevant technical certifications

listJob.name: Senior Product Owner (Agile, Scrum)
listJob.location: T·∫ßng 2, S·ªë 799 Nguy·ªÖn VƒÉn Linh, Ph∆∞·ªùng T√¢n Ph√∫, Qu·∫≠n 7, TP H·ªì Ch√≠ Minh
listJob.description:
AROBID is a rapidly expanding digital ecosystem, encompassing a B2B marketplace, TradeXpo online exhibitions, and a Good for Good platform. We‚Äòre connecting businesses and transforming B2B commerce at scale. We are seeking talented and highly motivated individuals to join our team and help us shape the future of B2B.
Job description
Lead a BA to develop a platform on an end to end basis: Research, analysis, design, validate with potential users, follow up and do acceptance tests of the products.
Requirement Analysis: Collaborate with stakeholders to gather, analyze, and clarify business requirements from clients and users.
Product Documentation: Translate business needs and stakeholders‚Äô requests into detailed PRD, Wireframing or crafting User Stories, Use Cases, Diagrams for the development team.
Stakeholder Collaboration: Engage with internal and external stakeholders to gather feedback and understand market needs, to ensure clear understanding between the development team and stakeholders by bridging communication gaps.
Validation For Testing: Work closely with the QC team to validate that product deliverable meets the business requirements, assisting in User Acceptance Testing (UAT) and ensuring quality deliverables.
Backlog Management: Create, maintain, and prioritize the product backlog in JIRA (or other Agile tools) to ensure the team works on the highest priority features.
Planning and Execution: Actively participate in sprint planning (Scrum) with Agile mindset, providing clear acceptance criteria for user stories, and ensuring the development team understands the requirements.
Product Deliverable: Ensure the product delivers a high-quality user experience by collaborating with UX/UI designers and ensuring the development team builds to specs. Have a keen mindset about quality of deliverables.
Continuous Improvement: Drive continuous improvement by analyzing performance data, gathering feedback, and identifying opportunities to enhance the product.
listJob.jobExperience:
A Bachelor‚Äòs degree in any field is welcomed.
4 to 6 years of experience in professional product development for web and mobile apps.
Standard proficiency in product design tools such as Figma, Sketch, Adobe XD, Axure RP or alternatives.
Basic understanding of functional, emotional and feasible aspects of UI design, encompassing both the big picture connect the relationships within the complexities of overall designs.
Good communication and collaboration.
Ability to work independently.
listJob.privilege:
Unique benefits:
Join a strong winning-spirit team of creating new business platforms for Vietnam and SEA.
Human centricity environment, focusing on collaboration and success.
Social insurance coverage upon signing your employment contract.
Generous leave policy: 12 annual leave days plus all Vietnamese public holidays.
13th-month salary (applicable from the probationary period).
Company-provided equipment.
Well-stocked pantry: tea, coffee, snacks, microwave, etc.
Engaging company activities: Company trips, team-building events, regular internal events (including live music performances!), and access to company-sponsored badminton courts.
Core Values:
Autonomy: Arobid have dedicated and detailed process to help makes everything simple and convenient on our platform
Responsibility: Arobid is here to support, assist, and help our users at all times of need. Arobid vow on conducting proper business decisions, valuing moral and ethics.
Open-mindedness: Arobid understands, accepts, and values feedback. Aiming to be better and accept new directions, always ready for changes and improvements when needed.
Boldness: Arobid is willing to take risks, be different, and do whatever it takes to provide the best service for our users.
Innovation: Arobid applies new technologies and new methods to help provide convenient and seamless user experience. Arobid have been and will continue to add new features and innovations.
Devotion: Arobid will always deliver above and beyond expectations, providing users with assistance whenever they need.

listJob.location: T·∫ßng 8, to√† nh√† HMC Tower, 193 ƒêinh Ti√™n Ho√†ng, Qu·∫≠n 1, Th√†nh ph·ªë H·ªì Ch√≠ Minh, Vi·ªát Nam, Qu·∫≠n 1, TP H·ªì Ch√≠ Minh
listJob.description:
Technical Vision and Strategy:
Set the technical direction for the project, including selecting appropriate technologies, frameworks, and methodologies.
Define the technical roadmap in alignment with the project goals and business requirements.
Architecture Design:
Design the overall architecture of the software solution.
Make decisions about system components, interfaces, data management, and scalability.
Ensure that the architecture meets the project's functional and non-functional requirements.
Guidance and Mentorship:
Follow all the guidelines and standards of project & company.
Provide guidance and mentorship to the development team.
Help team members solve technical challenges, improve their skills, and adhere to best practices. This includes code reviews, pair programming, and knowledge sharing sessions.
Technical Leadership:
Lead by example in terms of coding standards, quality, and best practices.
Promote a culture of technical excellence within the team and foster collaboration and innovation.
Risk Management:
Identify potential technical risks early in the project lifecycle and implementing mitigation strategies.
Involve anticipating challenges related to technology, resources, or dependencies and taking proactive measures to address them.
Communication:
Facilitate communication between technical and non-technical stakeholders.
Translate technical concepts into understandable terms for project managers, clients, and other team members.
Ensure that everyone is informed about the project's technical progress and challenges.
Accurately and timely report your output.
Project Planning and Estimation:
Collaborate with project managers and other stakeholders to plan and estimate technical tasks accurately.
Provide input on resource allocation, timelines, and dependencies based on their technical expertise.
Fulfill all the commitments by timely delivery.
Quality Assurance:
Ensure the quality of the software deliverables through effective testing strategies and quality assurance processes.
Oversee testing efforts, including unit testing, integration testing, and system testing, to verify that the software meets the specified requirements and standards.
Continuous Improvement:
Continuously evaluate and improve the development processes, tools, and practices.
Identify areas for optimization and implement changes to enhance efficiency, productivity, and quality.
Adaptability and Learning:
Keep abreast of new technologies, trends, and best practices in software development.
Encourage a culture of continuous learning and experimentation within the team to stay competitive and innovative in their approach.
listJob.jobExperience:
Proven experience (>5 years) in software development with hands-on experience in designing, developing, testing and deploying enterprise, large scale applications.
Previous strong experience (>1 year) in leading a team.
Proficient in at least 2 back-end languages.
Key member in Migration project
Ready to put your hands on to solve the problem.
Have a thorough understanding and appreciation for the Agile values and principles.
Comfortable around people, strong ability to negotiate, influence and provide feedback.
Well versed with design patterns, and proficiency in a wide range of technologies both backend and frontend.
Deep understanding of SDLC and experience in Agile delivery practices.
Have experience in developing and operating systems with many users and a lot of data
Strong understanding of API and API gateway development
Strong understanding of microservices architecture, patterns and operations.
Strongly skilled in SQL databases & NoSQL (Document db, Key-value db, Graphdb, Column db, Time Series db,‚Ä¶.).
Experience in developing and configuring cloud based applications (one of AWS, Azure, Google Cloud, etc. ) is a plus.
Fast research on new technologies, 3rd party services
Have a good knowledge of CI/CD
Ability to own one or more modules of the project.
Admit your mistakes is also an ability.
Flexible in working under changing and different work settings.
Ability to set targets and expectations for team members.
Pay high attention to detail in all work.
NICE TO HAVE
Agile Certification
PMI Certification
PMP Certification
Cloud Service, AWS, Azure, Microservices, Docker
Seminar, Sharing Knowledge

Our mission and where you fit in
At Employment Hero, we‚Äôre an ambitious bunch of people on a mission to make employment easier and more valuable for everyone.
Our world-class software is the easiest way for businesses to manage HR, payroll, employee engagement, and benefits.
Since our inception in 2014, we've had some pretty impressive growth (100% YoY), reached unicorn status in 2022, and now serve 300,000 businesses globally, with 2 million+ users on the platform. We have no plans to slow down. 
There‚Äôs never been a more exciting time to join one of the fastest-growing SaaS unicorns, so let‚Äôs see if we could be a match!
 In your role, you'll be focused on‚Ä¶
As a growing team, we need innovative and passionate Middle/Senior Backend Software Development Engineers to join our squads who will be a vital part of our engineering team, responsible for developing product features and collaborating with colleagues in design, product, and engineering. You will take ownership of writing automated tests for your production codes and work with cutting-edge technologies, focusing on tech stacks such as Ruby on Rails and ReactJS. In addition, you will have the opportunity to work on a diverse range of products and features.

English language abilities, both written and verbal - you‚Äôll be working with people across the world, including from Australia

As a Project Manager / Scrum Master at TechSoft, you care about the project team, taking projects to a successful launch for our partners and beyond. As a team player, your role is vitally important to project success.
You‚Äôll have at least 3 years of experience working Project Manager / Scrum Master, demonstrate good English communication skills, and have a knack for managing your time and priorities. Most of all, you thrive in a collaborative environment, you‚Äôre not afraid to learn new things, and you aim to have excellent work results. The perfect candidate will also have logical thinking as well as proactivity towards problems, passion for excellence and an open mind for learning.
Responsibilities
Take responsibility for coordinating and driving our team working on project assignments with our partners worldwide
Communicate and collaborate with internal and external stakeholders as needed in regards to project deliverable including managing expectations, changes, presenting and interfacing with partners
Develop project scopes and objectives, involve all relevant stakeholders and ensure technical feasibility
Measure project performance using appropriate systems, tools and techniques
Build and manage a schedule to ensure work is identified, assigned and completed on time
Identify, track, manage and resolve project issues
Identify, manage and mitigate project risks
Motivate, develop and give directions to team members
Effectively communicate status, progress, and issues to stakeholders and senior management
listJob.jobExperience:
At least 3+ years of experience in software development & 1 year of experience in this position, having full application development to deployment experience
Proven success in strategic management, leadership, planning, and organizational skills required
Good at English communication skills, both verbal and written, regardless of audience, presentation or forum
Working knowledge with AGILE development, SCRUM and Application Life-cycle Management
Good experience in managing projects through all project management processes (initiating, planning, executing, monitoring and controlling, closing)
Competent understanding and knowledge of technical aspects of web or mobile applications
Confident management of project schedules and tracking detailed task assignments
Experience managing large-scale projects and/or multiple project management
Self-motivated and highly result-oriented working style; good learning attitude, professionalism and high senses of responsibility
Information Technology or Computer Science degree or a related field

listJob.name: Senior Devops Engineer - AWS
listJob.location: CII Tower, 152 Dien Bien Phu, Ward 25, Qu·∫≠n B√¨nh Th·∫°nh, TP H·ªì Ch√≠ Minh
listJob.description:
Key Responsibilities:
1. Public Cloud Management:
Deploy, manage, and monitor cloud infrastructure on platforms like AWS Cloud.
Optimize cloud resources for cost-efficiency and scalability.
2. Infrastructure Automation (IaC):
Develop and manage infrastructure using Infrastructure as Code (IaC) tools like Terraform, CloudFormation, and Ansible.
Ensure infrastructure changes are versioned, tested, and managed effectively.
3. CI/CD Pipeline Management:
Design, implement, and maintain continuous integration/continuous deployment (CI/CD) pipelines to automate build, test, and deployment processes.
Collaborate with development teams to ensure the pipelines are integrated into the software development lifecycle.
4. Monitoring and Logging:
Implement and maintain monitoring and logging solutions using tools like Prometheus and Grafana.
Actively monitor system performance and resolve issues to maintain high availability and reliability.
5. Automation and Scripting:
Automate routine tasks and processes using scripting languages such as Python, Bash, or PowerShell.
Implement automation for deployment, scaling, and infrastructure management.
6. Collaboration and Communication:
Collaborate closely with developers, QA engineers, and IT teams to ensure smooth and efficient software deployments.
Document processes, tools, and workflows in a Wiki for knowledge sharing.
7. Troubleshooting and Problem Solving:
Respond to production issues, analyze root causes, and implement long-term fixes.
Participate in on-call rotations as needed to support 24/7 operations.
listJob.jobExperience:
Required Qualifications:
Bachelor‚Äôs degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or a related field.
7+ years of experience in DevOps, Site Reliability Engineering (SRE), or a similar role.
Proficiency in AWS services and cloud management.
Strong experience with CI/CD tools (Jenkins, GitLab CI, etc.).
Hands-on experience with IaC tools (Terraform, Ansible, CloudFormation).
Understanding of containerization and orchestration tools (Docker, Kubernetes).
Experience in monitoring and logging tools (Prometheus, Grafana, ELK).
Scripting proficiency in Python, Bash, or similar languages.
Understanding of security best practices and compliance requirements.
Knowledge of repository management and Git strategies.
Proficiency in Vietnamese and English communication.
Preferred Qualifications:
AWS certification(s).
Experience with serverless architecture and microservices.
Knowledge of networking concepts and tools.
Soft Skills:
Excellent communication and teamwork skills.
Problem-solving mindset with attention to detail.
Ability to work in a fast-paced, collaborative environment.
Strong time management and organizational skills.

listJob.location: Cach Mang Thang 8, Qu·∫≠n 10, TP H·ªì Ch√≠ Minh
listJob.description:
Our mission and where you fit in
At Employment Hero, we‚Äôre an ambitious bunch of people on a mission to make employment easier and more valuable for everyone.
 Our world-class software is the easiest way for businesses to manage HR, payroll, employee engagement, and benefits.
 Since our inception in 2014, we've had some pretty impressive growth (100% YoY), reached unicorn status in 2022, and now serve 300,000 businesses globally, with 2 million+ users on the platform. We have no plans to slow down. 
 There‚Äôs never been a more exciting time to join one of the fastest-growing SaaS unicorns, so let‚Äôs see if we could be a match!
 In your role, you'll be focused on‚Ä¶
As a growing team, we need innovative and passionate Intermediate Frontend Software Development Engineers to join our squads who will be a vital part of our engineering team, responsible for developing product features and collaborating with colleagues in design, product, and engineering. You will take ownership of writing automated tests for your production codes and work with cutting-edge technologies, focusing on tech stacks such as Ruby on Rails and ReactJS. In addition, you will have the opportunity to work on a diverse range of products and features.
As a Frontend Software Engineer, you‚Äôll be:
Develop new product lines with new critical features, using our techstack which includes ReactJS, React Native within an AWS Cloud environment using EC2 and Kubernetes.
Provide your input into our technical strategy with your squad, including participate in sprint planning
Develop code for the frontend as an end-to-end Frontend Software Development Engineer
Ensure both your colleagues and yourself are producing high quality code through testing and code reviews
Share your knowledge with your squad and mentor junior developers
Learn and collaborate with highly respected Senior Software Developers, in a high performing and supportive squad
Show your passion for working in highly complex and technically challenging development
Enhance legacy features for our award-winning HR tech platform
listJob.jobExperience:
You‚Äôre the hero we‚Äôre looking for if:
Experience in Frontend software development experience, CI/CD, web application performance tuning, ReactJS/Redux applications. In deep in fundamental understanding of Javascript/Typescript, ReactJS/Redux, Building tool such as Webpack, Rollup, ViteJS.
Strong English communication skills (both verbal & written)
Over 4 years of experience in Frontend Software Development
Demonstrated experience implementing, maintaining and deploying full-stack web technologies
Strong understanding of standard Software Engineering processes, Testing, and Agile methodology
A team player that always puts colleagues ahead of yourself and has a highly adaptable and versatile approach to work
You are passionate about learning and sharing your knowledge, and not afraid to challenge your peers, but also welcome being challenged
We have a number of positions open which would suit many skills and experiences, including being open to candidates who are willing to learn our technical stack
Experience in translating design wireframes into functioning UI components
It‚Äôll be great, but not essential, if you also have experience with:
Bachelor's degree in Computer Science of Software Engineering or an equivalent
Experience in developing highly modular mobile applications and mobile application performance tuning
Experience writing unit tests
Experience in functional programming
Experience is important, but for us, the biggest measure of success is people who can live and breathe our values. Show us what you can bring to the table, and we‚Äôll empower you to let your talents shine.
listJob.privilege:
The EH Way
The EH Way is how we describe our culture at Employment Hero and how we all operate. It is our DNA. You can read all about it on our careers page:  
In short, you‚Äôll love working with us if:
Revolutionising employment gets your heart racing.
You thrive on the flexibility (and responsibility) of a remote-first business.
Our values align, and shape how you show up every day.
You love the dynamic pace of a startup, are driven by innovation, and enjoy working with other smart people.

listJob.name: Sr. AI Product Manager - Digital ID & Payments
listJob.location: Havana Tower - 132 Ham Nghi, Qu·∫≠n 1, TP H·ªì Ch√≠ Minh
listJob.description:
Trusting Social is the leading Digital Identity & Payment Authentication service provider for the Banking & Financial sector in Vietnam, Indonesia, Philippines, and India, boasting over 30 existing clients, including banks, financial companies, and e-wallets. Our TrustVision solutions empower clients to onboard customers digitally anytime and anywhere, detect fraud, and enable secure transactions using advanced facial recognition and AI models.
 How you will make an impact in this role
As a Senior AI Product Manager in Payment Authentication & Digital Identity Product at Trusting Social, you will have the ultimate responsibility for decision-making and prioritization to drive product strategy, roadmap, and development, addressing identity trust in the financial sector in Vietnam and other Trusting Social markets. 
You will operate to deliver world-class Payment Authentication & Digital Identity solutions. You will play a key role in ideating and co-creating new features that uniquely meet the needs of Trusting Social's clients & market. You will continue not only enhancing our cutting-edge technologies to prevent the latest fraud trends (deep fake faces, face swaps, transactional frauds, etc.) while assuring the best user experience but also expanding our market-leading solutions region-wise.
If you're genuinely passionate about building world-class Payment Authentication & Digital Identity Products and never settling for second place, join us on a journey of discovery to solve problems and deliver excellence.
 What you will do
Understand market needs and customers' pain points, stay updated on market trends, create a compelling product vision, and develop a product roadmap quarterly and annually. Spearhead the success of the whole Trust Vision department‚Äôs product lines in your assigned markets.
Obsess over customers to deliver the products they need, constantly study the products to understand every aspect and fine-tune them to meet customer needs.
Deliver a world-class product with inputs from customer/client discovery, sales, and advisory teams.
Conduct assessments to identify optimal product opportunities, ensuring alignment of features with the targeted market and available technology.
Work closely with the Data Science team & Engineering team to deliver product features of the product roadmap.
Engage with clients and users to gather constant feedback and incorporate it into the product features.
Conceptualize, define, and guide research and product requirements to create exceptional user experiences.
Use data to understand product and feature performance, and suggest data-driven initiatives to improve the product and user experience.
Use data and client feedback to identify new fraud schemes. Advise clients with tailored use cases based on data and testing outcomes.
Provide expert opinions for enhancements/improvements of the product suite provided to clients.
Collaborate with Data Scientists and Engineers to ensure smooth and proper production implementation. 
Pitch or support sales in pitching and deployment for customers.
Foster the professional growth of product team members by providing ongoing development opportunities and offering timely feedback to enhance their skills and expertise when needed.
listJob.jobExperience:
Minimum 
4+ years of experience in product management along with 8+ years of overall work experience 
Experience in SaaS/B2B product development
Exceptional problem-solving skills under pressure (candidates who come from internal/external management consulting or similar, or candidates with Technical background - a degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or a related field - are strongly welcome. You don't need to know how to write any codes, you need to understand the product from a technical standpoint only)
Ability to collect and analyze data from various sources, identify key insights, spot product opportunities, and inform product decisions 
Willingness to roll up your sleeves and do whatever it takes to help your team win 
Ability to maintain a keen attention to detail, multitask, and work well under pressure; zoom in and out on a problem
Good interpersonal skills, teamwork spirit, hardworking with enthusiastic attitudes 
Strong learning capability and self-motivation to acquire new knowledge 
Extreme ownership, love the products and do whatever it takes to make the products standout
Preferred  
10+ years of experience
Proven track record in Product Management 
Experience with Banking & Financial B2B products, especially payment/ credit transfer solutions.
Knowledge of AI/Machine Learning topics 
Experience in managing KYC process or fraud risk management for customer onboarding
An MBA degree would be a plus.
Excellent candidates
Passionate about solving complex and large-scale/world-class problems, finding joy in crafting solutions that impact millions of lives or transform the world.
Excellent in problem-solving, solving problems in a well-structured, data-backed, and deeply analytical manner, combined with a touch of creativity.
Strong track records of products attest to their effectiveness in creating meaningful impacts and addressing the intended challenges.
Extreme ownership is without a doubt, working for the love of it, leading the team to help millions of lives.

listJob.description:
Platform A had developed a digital platform called which delivers car buyers‚Äô data from car dealers to partner banks for getting approved car loans. 
The B to B platform is fully developed and ready to do pilot launching with partner dealers and partner banks. After pilot launching for 2-3 months, the platform will be launched nationwide after any enhancement and/or fixing any bugs (if any). 
Partner Banks are ready to use AutoTrack and some are still working on API connection between AutoTrack and Bank systems. Want to join an innovative team where you‚Äôll constantly be inspired by your co-workers and projects?  Platform A might be the perfect team for you! We admire and reward creativity and teamwork so check out some of our career opportunities to see if there is a fit for you at our vibrant company. We‚Äôd love to hear from you!
Location: Thao Dien,  District 2, HCMC
Office hour: Monday ‚Äì Friday (9:30 AM ‚Äì 6:00 PM)
Compensation: Compensation package will be discussed in details during the interview (range of monthly salary : 45 ‚Äì 65 mm VND depends on skills and experience) 
Flexible WFH policy, flexible vacation policy (up to 15 days/year)  
Small team environment with strong self-ownership attitude
listJob.jobExperience:
We are looking for candidates for Senior Fullstack Developer positions:
As a Senior Full-stack Developer, you will be responsible for:
Analyze requirements, come up with adequate technical design and maintain technical documentation
Improve and maintain current features.
Develop new features per the business/product team specs.
Develop and improve existing system infrastructure to support better performance and productivity.
Monitoring and improving front-end performance.
Help junior developers learn and grow.

 Your skills and experience
As a Senior Full-stack Developer, you must have the following key skills:
4+ years of experience in fullstack development (Nodejs, ReactJS)
Strong in Javascript frontend technology (TypeScript, NestJS, etc.)
Current Platform Tech specs
Backend: Node JS, Nest JS framework, My SQL.
Mobile Applications: React Native 
Web frontend: React JS 
Cloud Server: AWS / Local database server and data storage
Understanding of server-side CSS.
Experience with responsive and adaptive design.
Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering, or related field.
Good English communication skills
listJob.privilege:

listJob.location: Blue Diamond Building, Y2 Hong Linh Street, Ward 15, Qu·∫≠n 10, TP H·ªì Ch√≠ Minh
listJob.description:
We are looking for an experienced React Native Developer with at least 2 years of experience in a similar position. You will be responsible for developing robust and scalable cross-platform mobile applications and delivering high-quality solutions with our team of designers and developers.
You will help create applications that take care of public's health and will be used widely in Singapore, The Phillipines and other countries. Through gamification, these applications help everyone to be active and healthy.
listJob.jobExperience:
Responsibilities
Using the React ecosystem, design and create user interface components for JavaScript-based online and mobile apps
Work in a small team with other react-native engineers, designers, QA professionals, and managers
Create app and UI components from wireframes and prototypes.
When necessary, work with native modules
For tight interfaces with both platforms ‚Äì Android and iOS ‚Äì use Native APIs
Create automated tests to check that your code is error-free and that it performs well
Enhance front-end performance by removing performance bottlenecks
Develop front-end modules with the highest level of code reusability and efficiency
Use smooth animations to create a fantastic user interface
Use third-party dependencies and APIs
Work with Redux architecture to increase website/mobile app speed
Collaborate with cross-functional teams to build apps within the time/budget constraints
Requirements & Skills
Bachelor's/degree Master's in computer science, information technology, or comparable experience
Significant expertise working with React online and mobile, as well as technologies such as Flux, Flow, Redux, and others
An extensive understanding of JavaScript, CSS, HTML, functional programming and front-end languages is required
Solid understanding of React principles such as Virtual DOM, component lifecycle, and component state
Experience on working with ReactJs (not just React Native) is a plus
A thorough grasp of the whole mobile app development process, beginning with the prototype
Understanding of type checking, unit testing, typescript, prop types, and code debugging is required
Worked with REST APIs, document request models, offline storage, and third-party libraries in the past
In-depth knowledge of web technologies such as JavaScript, HTML, and CSS
Understanding of user interface and responsive design
Proficient in a wide range of React Native applications and technologies such as Jest, Enzyme, ESLint, and others
In-depth understanding of software development methodologies, concepts, and processes
Previous experience developing big, complicated web and mobile apps
The ability to build and manage a flawless continuous integration and delivery pipeline for React Native apps
Knowledge of React Native's best practices and design aesthetics
A positive attitude and a desire to learn constantly
Stay up to speed on the latest React Native developments, technologies, and news
The ability to develop clean, well-documented code that adheres to acceptable coding principles
Please state the following in your application:
Notice period for current employment
Last drawn and expected salary
Please include your github or stackoverflow profile if there is

listJob.description:
Job Summary
ArctX Solution LLC is a global IT Solution provider Company seeking a Senior System Engineer to join our team in the Hanoi office. 
 As a Senior System Engineer, your role involves:
Install, configure, test, and maintain operating systems, application software, and system management tools across both on-premises and cloud environments (e.g., AWS, Azure, GCP).
Manage and monitor all installed systems and infrastructure to ensure smooth operation.
Implement security, backup, and redundancy strategies to safeguard data and ensure business continuity.
Proactively ensure the highest levels of systems and infrastructure availability, with a focus on minimizing downtime.
Monitor and test application performance, identify potential bottlenecks, and collaborate with development teams to implement effective solutions.
Perform cost-benefit analyses to develop cost-efficient systems that align with project budgets and business goals.
Develop, write, and maintain custom scripts to automate routine tasks, improving system efficiency and reducing manual intervention.
Participate in the design and architecture of information and operational support systems.
Collaborate with cross-functional teams to identify technical requirements and provide robust solutions.
Liaise with vendors, suppliers, and IT personnel to resolve technical issues promptly and ensure optimal system performance.
listJob.jobExperience:
Bachelor‚Äôs degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, Engineering, or a related field.
English communication proficiency is equal to a B2 level.
Minimum of 5 years of experience in systems engineering or a related field, with a proven track record in designing, implementing, and managing complex IT infrastructures.
Demonstrated experience in both on-premises and cloud environments (e.g., AWS, Azure, Google Cloud Platform).
Strong understanding of operating systems (Windows, Linux, Unix) and system management tools.
Experience with virtualization and containerization technologies (e.g., VMware, Docker, Kubernetes).
Solid understanding of networking protocols and services (e.g., TCP/IP, DNS, DHCP).
Familiarity with database management and data storage solutions.
In-depth knowledge of system security best practices and data protection regulations.
Exceptional troubleshooting abilities to diagnose and resolve complex system issues efficiently.
Experience conducting root cause analysis and implementing preventive measures
Excellent verbal and written communication skills, with the ability to convey complex technical information to both technical and non-technical stakeholders.
Excellent time-management skills.
Cross-discipline web development skills.
Goal-oriented and client-oriented approach to work.
Good analysis and database designing skills.

Additional 12 paid day-off per year (beside annual leave by law).
Occasional Gifts (birthday, women day, etc.)
Yearly learning budget.
Yearly Position Level Assessments

listJob.name: Technical Lead ‚Äì Java, Spring
listJob.location: 26 Thao Dien Street, Thao Dien, Thu Duc, HCMC, Th√†nh ph·ªë Th·ªß ƒê·ª©c, TP H·ªì Ch√≠ Minh
listJob.description:
Job Summary
 If you are a self-starter, wanting multiple opportunities to design, drive and contribute to the development of enterprise-class applications that drive planning and revenue growth, we are looking for an enthusiastic technical lead, a skilled and experienced full stack developer. The ideal candidate will be demonstrably skilled, have strong expertise in Java and Spring Boot, and hands-on experience in designing, developing, and deploying scalable enterprise applications. The candidate will play a critical role in product design and development and help mentor junior developers.
 Excellent leadership and communication skills required. Excellent analysis, design and development skills required. Solid mathematics skills required. Intermediate English skills required.
 Responsibilities
Design, develop, and maintain scalable Java-based applications.
Collaborate with team and stakeholders to analyze requirements.
Implement efficient algorithms, optimize applications, and seamlessly integrate.
Write clean, testable, and efficient code adhering to best practices.
Develop RESTful APIs and integrate third-party APIs.
Integrate APIs with SQL databases, ensuring data integrity and efficiency. 
Write unit and integration tests to ensure functionality and reliability of API endpoints.
Troubleshoot and debug applications to resolve technical issues.
Lead code reviews and provide constructive feedback to team members.
Create clear and concise documentation (docs-as-code) for code and APIs.
Ensure application security and compliance with industry and regional standards.
Ensure design and code meet the goals of applications while minimizing technical debt.
Stay updated with the latest technologies and tools in Java development and apply them to improve existing solutions.
listJob.jobExperience:
Qualifications
Bachelor‚Äôs degree in computer science, software engineering, or related field.
Seven or more years of experience in Java development, with 3 years of software engineering experience, and 2 years proven experience as technical lead.
Solid experience with design patterns, UML, working with software architectures to create detailed designs.
Knowledge of Java and J2EE/Java EE (including servlets, JSP, JSF, JDBC).
Proficiency in Java frameworks such as Spring, Spring Boot, and Hibernate.
Strong knowledge of object-oriented programming (OOP) including inheritance, interfaces, exception handling, and design patterns.
Strong understanding of Java threading, concurrency, concurrency patterns, experience building thread safe code.
Solid experience with RESTful APIs, Microservices, and Web Services and best practices.
Solid Experience with SQL and relational databases such as MySQL, PostgreSQL, or SQL Server.
Solid Experience with NoSQL databases, like MongoDB, data warehouses, and OLAP.
Experience with analytics engines and message queuing systems such as Cube, Spark and Kafka. 
Experience with UI development and front-end technologies from JavaFX to HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and React.
Experience with other components of the Spring ecosystem (e.g. Spring Data, Spring Security, Spring Cloud, etc.).
Good understanding of containerization tools Docker and Kubernetes.
Experience with IntelliJ and GIT or similar source code versioning tools and coding standards.
Solid skills in statistics, probability, and linear algebra.
Strong analytical and problem-solving skills.
Excellent communication and teamwork abilities.
Passionate leadership skills. Mentor team members. Coach team to experiment and solve technical problems in proactive and unique ways.
Experience collaborating with business, engineering, operational, and product stakeholders, spanning business requirements, functional specifications, and test plans.
Maintaining a constant focus on the applications delivering client value.
Good English language skills.
 Strongly Preferred
Proven, hands-on experience architecting complex applications using various architecture styles like Microservices, REST, Streaming, Event, Batch, etc.

Trustify Technology brings to the world its excellence in Software Development & Testing Services as well as its cutting edge solutions that can elevate the client product & service delivery. We become the trust partner in IT outsourcing by its collaborative approaches and how the cooperative steps are being natural.

Design, develop and maintain web applications using Vue.js (v2 & v3) and TypeScript.
Collaborate with backend developers and other team members to integrate APIs.
Develop reusable UI components and libraries to ensure consistency across the application.
Optimize frontend code for performance, scalability, and accessibility
Troubleshoot and debug issues in the frontend code
Ensure cross-browser compatibility and responsiveness.
Participate in code reviews and provide feedback to colleagues

Good communication skills in English (verbal & written)
Experience with Ionic Framework for mobile applications is a plus
Familiarity with App Store (Google Play, Apple App Store) deployment processes is a plus

listJob.description:
Job Purpose
The IT DBA Operation is responsible for providing Database (DBs) knowledge in the DB operation to ensure the stability and performance of the systems.
1. To prevent the incidents & problems from happening by:
‚Ä¢ Proactively address weaknesses, risks and problems on the DBs then have remediation plan to mitigate it to improve quality of services.
‚Ä¢ Periodically review and assess the weaknesses, risks of the DBs.
2. Manage & hands-on incidents/problems solving activities:
‚Ä¢ Manage the troubleshooting and directly handle the incidents & problems relating to the DBs.
‚Ä¢ Analyze and conclude the root cause of the incidents & problems, define & implement the solutions to recover the services quickly and prevent them from repeating.
3. Assess DB operation of operation team regarding to framework/checklist/runbooks & compliance to figure out need improvements:
‚Ä¢ Periodically review and assess need improvements of operation framework/checklist/runbook
documents.
‚Ä¢ Operation compliance assessment of operation teams in real-life.
Key Accountabilities (1)
- Collaborate with the appropriate departments to deeply understand the DBs, as a basis for the efficient and stable operation of services.
- Define operation frameworks, standards, processes, checklists, and tools for the DBs and communicate them to DB operation functions to apply into daily operation.
- Analyze and propose improvements upon technology and standards across the organization.
- Participate in training courses to remain up-to-date and knowledgeable in terms of industry trends and emerging technologies for IT operation support.
- Provide advice, trainings, and supports to people in the DB operation function.
- Participate as a key member in the incident response team to directly drive incident/problem handling progress and also responsible for analyzing and concluding the root cause of the incidents and problems; define and implement the solutions to recover the services quickly and prevent them from repeating.
- Develop methodology and assessment plan to proactively address weaknesses, risks and problems on the DBs, then provide remediation plan to improve quality of services.
- Creatively and independently provide resolutions to technical problems in a productivity and quality of service manner.
- Assess and report out the compliance of the operation activities in real-life.
- Report periodically to the Director of Infrastructure Services Excellent Center.
Key Accountabilities (2)
- Identify risks and coordinate with relevant units to propose methods to measure and minimize risks in the DBs operations.
- Ensure that team members fulfill their commitments on service quality and comply with the Bank's
regulations and policies.

listJob.name: Senior Data Engineer
listJob.location: 81 Cao Thang, Ward 3, Qu·∫≠n 3, TP H·ªì Ch√≠ Minh
listJob.description:
About the role
We are seeking a talented Senior Data Engineer to design, build, and maintain our robust data platform. In this role, you will be responsible for developing scalable data integration solutions that combine data from various sources including relational databases, NoSQL databases, third-party APIs, and other data sources. This platform serves as the foundation for our data-driven decision-making process, enabling the organization to make faster and more informed business decisions.
As a Senior Data Engineer, you will work closely with cross-functional teams including data analysts, product managers, business development managers, finance teams, and other business teams to understand their data needs and deliver high-quality data solutions. Your expertise will be crucial in ensuring data reliability, accessibility, and maintaining data governance standards across the organization.
 This role reports directly to the Engineering Manager.
 What you‚Äôll do
Design, implement, and maintain robust and scalable data platform architecture that ensures high availability, fault tolerance, and optimal performance.
Develop and maintain automated data pipelines to streamline data delivery processes, reducing time-to-insight for stakeholders and increasing operational efficiency.
Implement comprehensive testing strategies, including functional and unit tests, to ensure data pipeline reliability and data quality.
Drive continuous improvement initiatives by identifying and implementing process enhancements: automating manual workflows, optimizing data delivery mechanisms, and re-architecting infrastructure for enhanced scalability.
Architect and implement infrastructure optimized for data extraction, transformation, and loading from diverse data sources, leveraging AWS and GCP cloud technologies and services.
Develop sophisticated analytics solutions and data products that leverage our data platform to provide actionable business insights, focusing on key metrics such as customer acquisition, operational efficiency, and business performance.
Collaborate effectively with cross-functional teams including Executive leadership, Engineering, Product, Data, and Design teams to address technical challenges and support their data infrastructure requirements.
Ensure data security and compliance with privacy regulations and healthcare standards through proper data governance.
listJob.jobExperience:
Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Statistics, Information Systems, or related field with minimum 7 years of experience in Data Engineering.
Strong written and verbal communication skills in English.
Proven expertise in building production-grade data pipelines using GCP and/or AWS services.
Strong experience with stream processing technologies, particularly Apache Spark or Apache Beam with Google Cloud Dataflow.
Advanced proficiency in SQL and extensive experience with relational databases, including PostgreSQL and MySQL.
Demonstrated experience with Google BigQuery and data warehouse concepts.
Hands-on experience building and maintaining data lakes using Hadoop ecosystem and columnar storage formats (Parquet, ORC).
Strong programming skills in Python, Java, or Scala.
Proven track record in writing automated tests (unit tests, integration tests) to ensure code reliability.
Demonstrated ability to design and implement maintainable, robust, and flexible code following software engineering best practices.
Exceptional problem-solving and analytical capabilities.
Outstanding written and verbal communication skills with the ability to effectively collaborate with stakeholders at all levels.
You‚Äôll Stand Out Among the Others with These
Experience in implementing data governance and security best practices.
Track record of delivering scalable data solutions in fast-paced environments.
Proven ability to mentor junior engineers and contribute to the team's technical growth.
