listJob.location: Level 5 - 6, East Tower, Lumiere Riverside, 277 Vo Nguyen Giap, An Phu Ward, Thu Duc City, HCMC., Th√†nh ph·ªë Th·ªß ƒê·ª©c, TP H·ªì Ch√≠ Minh
listJob.description:
Description
Are you an innovative Business Analyst looking to make an impact in the Digital Bank domain? We want you! Join Our Team: Revolutionize Digital Banks with Cutting-Edge Technology
 Who We Are:
At TymeX, we are at the forefront of building and operating multi-country digital banks. Our mission is to revolutionize the financial services industry through technology, creating seamless and secure payment solutions that change the way people interact with money.
The Middle/Senior Business Analyst (Multi-Country Digital Bank Builder) will play a key part in the establishment and building of a new business. This business will act as a centralized hub providing digital solutions and application development across the TYME‚Äôs business. You will bring a passion for meeting the needs of individuals and businesses through a range of banking products as well as a deep understanding of the benefits that technology can bring to customers‚Äô daily lives.
 Top 5 Reasons Why We Are the Next Destination for Your Career
Innovation-Driven Environment: Work with the latest technologies including Serverless aspects of AWS Cloud, AI-augmented engineering, microservices, Java, and Python.
Impactful Work: Contribute to projects that directly influence financial inclusivity and access in emerging markets.
Collaborative Culture: Be part of a dynamic team that values collaboration, continuous learning, and personal growth.
Competitive Benefits: Enjoy a comprehensive benefits package, opportunities for professional development, and a supportive work-life balance.
Learning and Development: Access to SMART goals, technical seminars, conferences, career talks, and overseas training to accelerate your career advancement and ensure continuous growth.
Your Mission:
Ensure everybody, who are involved in building and running the product are on the same page in terms of scope of works and requirements. To do that, you'll frequently engage with several stakeholders to understand the business needs, form-up a holistic product picture then transform it into functional requirements to work backward with the product engineer.
Facilitate the solutioning process. Throughout the accomplishment of 1st mission, you will play the key role of banking knowledge keeper whereas you're going to use it to facilitate the solutioning process with product engineers. A successful mission will look like this 1) team's solution will solve the whole picture not a few aspects of it 2) cover the impacts of the solutions on other areas 3) keep the balance point between the technical difficulties and the trade-off to the business needs.
Execute the TymeGroup's multi-X strategy. It's relatively straightforward to define the requirements for a single country, it's getting headache also exciting at the same time to bring over that requirement and apply to the other countries given the localization differences. The multi-X mission requires the next level of your brain to abstract and conceptualize the requirements so that once you build for a country you will be able to replicate it for next country.
listJob.jobExperience:
Requirements
To be successful at this role you're going to need:
At least 5 years working as a hands-on business analyst dedicatedly.
Got hands-on experience in building the digital bank's features.
Proficient in English (writing, reading, speaking, and listening).
Possess well-seasoned business analyst competencies and skillset. The most important ones are Logical Thinking, Critical Thinking, Analytical Thinking and Problem Solving
listJob.privilege:
At TYME, opportunities are here for the taking. If you want to be part of our purpose and live and lead through our values, we can offer exciting development opportunities through expanded lateral roles, stretch assignments, or people leadership.

Meal and parking allowances are covered by the company.

Insurances such as Vietnamese labor law and premium health care for you and your family.

Pro-Rate and performance bonus.

Beside the tangible benefits, we promise you the opportunity to:
Work with the product teams who at the tip of their fingers the latest understanding of the digital banking sector and what they‚Äôll do to further the multi-country bank builder‚Äôs vision.
Work with a top-market BA community with regard to skillset, practices and technologies whereby the support for your professional career path will be assured.
Work with multi-national colleagues around the globe, this opportunity alone guarantees you a big competitive advantage in terms of leveling up your professional English communication.

listJob.description:
About us
A subsidiary of the FPT Group, FPT Software is known as a leading global information technology service provider headquartered in Vietnam. With over 30,000 employees working in 83 offices across 30 countries on five continents, FPT Software consistently delivers the best solutions to more than 1000 clients, including 100 Fortune 500 companies. Placing human resources as the cornerstone of its achievements, employee experience is our top priority in continually creating an innovative, open, and enjoyable work environment for every member.
 In 2023, FPT Software officially made its mark on the global billion-dollar company list. This is evidence of the talent and efforts of multiple generations of employees at FPT Software.
 Why not explore your potential and embark on a brilliant journey with us?
 Responsibilities
The Business Analyst (BA) is responsible for:
Supporting and leading any new large/complex opportunities from sales team at assessment and proposal phases.
Provide initial and comprehensive analysis direction for technical design and business requirement of new projects.
Support presentation of new solutions or services as advantages and benefits in pre-sales environment.
Work closely with customers to understand their business processes and system requirements.
Translate customer‚Äôs requirements into software requirement specifications.
Interact with the development team to make sure requirements are fully and correctly understood.
Verify the system main functionalities to make sure they meet customer‚Äôs requirements and expectations.
Provide UAT support 
Manage requirement changes

Have good Japanese command both in verbal and written communication (N2up)
Have good presentation skills.
Prefer have the following skills: Analysis concepts, MS SQL Server or Oracle, UML, Microsoft Visio or any other GUI design tools.
Very good educational background, preferably in the fields of computer science or engineering.
Have knowledge in software development life-cycle from requirement to system testing.
Proven experience as a business analyst or similar role .
Proactive, hard-working, high responsibility and commitment are mandatory character for candidate who wants to join our team.

listJob.name: Software Development Manager
listJob.location: 25-27, B4 Street, Sala Urban Area, District 2, TP H·ªì Ch√≠ Minh
listJob.description:
About STYL Solutions: 
Ride on the wave of Industry 4.0! Join STYL Solutions in the forefront of using Fintech and IoT technologies for smart city/nation transformation. Headquartered in Singapore with an R&D center in Vietnam, STYL Solutions designs, develops, and supplies hardware, software, and 
integrated solutions for applications in payment, loyalty management, location tracking, self-service operation, and telemetry. Our market segment coverage extends from financial services, retail, mass transit, and education to social services markets in Singapore and South Asia Pacific. 
Our vision is to use Fintech and IoT to create smart and efficient cities that enhance Quality of Life through convenience and healthier living. 
We are seeking an experienced and visionary Software Development Manager to lead our dynamic development team. In this role, you will provide strategic leadership, ensure the timely delivery of high-quality software solutions, and foster a culture of collaboration and innovation. Your contributions will drive excellence in software development and help position our organization as a leader in the Fintech IoT industry. 
Responsibilities: 
Your responsibilities will include, but are not limited to: 
1. Leadership and Team Development: 
Define and communicate a strategic vision for software development teams, emphasizing Fintech IoT innovations. 
Mentor team members, promoting skill enhancement and professional growth. 
Recruit and develop top talent, creating a cohesive and high-performing team. 
Foster a culture of innovation, accountability, and continuous improvement. 
2. Project and Resource Management: 
Manage the entire project lifecycle‚Äîfrom initial planning to final delivery‚Äîensuring timeliness and adherence to quality standards. 
Optimize resource allocation to maximize productivity and project outcomes. 
Identify and mitigate project risks proactively, addressing potential delays and technical challenges. 
Manage and identify good software outsource/design houses. 
3. Collaboration and Communication: 
Partner with key stakeholders to align development initiatives with business objectives and evolving industry trends. 
Foster clear communication across internal teams and with external partners. 
Work closely with Project Managers and Hardware teams to deliver secure, integrated solutions. 
4. Technical and Process Excellence: 
Implement and advocate best practices in software development, such as agile methodologies, IoT-specific protocols, and CI/CD practices. 
Promote code quality, testing standards, and continuous optimization of development processes. 
Stay informed about emerging technologies and trends in IoT and Fintech, leveraging insights to drive innovation and competitiveness. 
5. Performance and Alignment: 
Regularly evaluate team performance, providing constructive feedback and support to drive continuous improvement. 
Ensure team efforts align with organizational goals and product roadmaps, balancing short-term deliverables with long-term priorities.
listJob.jobExperience:
Here at STYL Solutions, we encourage our employees to take initiative, propose ideas, and provide them with the opportunity to dive into multiple projects. We are looking for candidates who possess the following:  
‚óè Demonstrated experience in a leadership role, managing software development teams in a fast-paced, product-driven IT environment. 
‚óè Strong foundation in engineering best practices, system architecture, and software design. 
‚óè Proven expertise in managing and delivering large-scale, complex software projects. 
‚óè Proficiency in multiple programming languages (e.g., Java, Python, JavaScript, C++), cloud technologies, microservices architecture, and modern development frameworks. 
‚óè Experience leading cross-functional teams and collaborating with product managers, designers, and stakeholders to deliver exceptional software products. 
‚óè In-depth knowledge of Agile methodologies (e.g., Scrum, Kanban) and expertise in CI/CD, DevOps, and automated testing. 
‚óè Excellent problem-solving, communication, and interpersonal skills, with the ability to lead technical discussions and influence decisions. 
‚óè Commitment to fostering a positive, collaborative, and growth-oriented team environment. 
‚óè Background in working within a product-focused company, especially with multiple product teams, is a significant advantage. 
‚óè Bachelor‚Äôs or Master‚Äôs degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or a related field.
listJob.privilege:
Benefits: 
STYL Solutions will give you the favorable conditions you need to tackle difficult problems and learn cutting-edge technologies:  
‚óè An international working environment with friendly and passionate colleagues 
‚óè Onsite opportunity to Japan, and Singapore for training and supporting customer  
‚óè Meaningful work with experienced & strong technical veterans 
‚óè Flat structure, simple processes & transparency 
In addition to providing you with professional growth, STYL Solutions is also committed to taking care of our employees, personally. As a full-time employee, you are automatically enrolled in our benefits program, which includes:  
‚óè Attractive compensation, regular assessments, and salary reviews 
‚óè Performance bonus 
‚óè 21 paid days off per year 
‚óè 1 WFH day per week* 
‚óè 100% salary & full social insurance during the probation period 
‚óè Premium health care insurance (PTI) 
‚óè Free lunch, snacks, coffee, and tea 
‚óè Special celebration on 8/3, 1/6, Xmas, Tet holiday... 
‚óè Outing/team-building activities (trip, sport, dinner...) 
*Only apply to full-time employees meeting work conscientiousness criteria and maintaining remote productivity. 
Salary: Negotiation 
Employment Type: Full-time

listJob.description:
Who We Are:
At GoSource, we are a world-class digital services company that combines innovation and technical excellence to deliver remarkable outcomes.
 What We Do:
GoSource makes exciting innovative digital products, working with modern technologies, pioneering experimental stacks, and deploying future-focused design thinking tools. We deliver value-packed outcomes for our clients.
 Why GoSource?
Our people are at the heart of what we do. We nurture talent by investing in our people, ensuring each person thrives within our powerhouse multidisciplinary teams.
We offer flexible work arrangements like working from home and part-time schedules, embracing a work-life balance that fuels both personal growth and professional excellence.
At GoSource, skills and capability speak louder than labels. We‚Äôre here for your talent and the unique perspective you bring to the team.

We are looking for enthusiastic individuals driven by curiosity, a passion for problem-solving, and a collaborative spirit.
listJob.jobExperience:
We are looking for enthusiastic individuals driven by curiosity, a passion for problem-solving, and a collaborative spirit.
 Responsibilities:
Collaborate with the team to clarify and analyze project requirements
Design and develop new processes and features, and iterate the solution by incorporating user research and business feedback
Develop, conduct code reviews with both local and distributed team members, and enforce secure coding standards
Work with cross-functional teams, mentor developers, and ensure feature alignment across teams 
Drive architectural decisions, recommend tools, and document technical requirements
Develop and execute testing strategies, implement CI/CD pipelines, and ensure systems are optimized for performance in production environments.
Resolve technical issues, drive innovation, and adopt the latest technologies
Plan, prioritize, and manage development timelines, ensuring high-quality delivery
Ensure that developed applications are well documented, tested, easy to maintain, and meet industry standards and share knowledge within the team.
Requirements:
Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering, or a relevant field
Minimum of 5 years of experience writing well-documented, clean JavaScript/TypeScript code
Minimum of 5 years of experience with React.js and Node.js
Experience with version control and source code management systems such as Git and GitHub
Good communication skills in both spoken and written English.
Desired skills:
Experienced in designing and developing full-stack modern web applications
Knowledgeable in AWS architecture patterns and services, with a solid understanding of cloud infrastructure best practices.
Nice to have:
Challenge: We seek an individual who thrives in a startup's dynamic environment and is highly motivated to drive initiatives from conception to execution
Flexibility: We look for someone who can adapt to evolving technology choices and project developments with agility
Communication skills: We require a candidate with the expertise to smoothly connect and enhance collaboration between our technical teams in Australia and Vietnam
Leadership: We need a proactive employee who can build a strong organizational framework, support team growth and professional development, and drive sustained success.

Remote working
English-speaking, professional, and innovative working environment with friendly and passionate colleagues  
Work-life balance (40 hours per week, Monday-Friday)

Competitive compensation: Attractive salary with annual salary review (Full salary in the probation period) and 13-month salary 
Comprehensive benefits: Full contributions to social, health, and unemployment insurance according to Vietnam Labor Law

listJob.name: Middle/Senior Backend Developer (NodeJS/NestJS)
listJob.location: 628A ƒê. V√µ Nguy√™n Gi√°p, An Ph√∫, Th√†nh ph·ªë Th·ªß ƒê·ª©c, TP H·ªì Ch√≠ Minh
listJob.description:
This is a full-time, on-site role for a Mid/Senior Backend Developer (NodeJS/NestJS) at Uniscore in Ho Chi Minh City. As a Backend Developer, you will be responsible for developing and maintaining the server-side of the application, collaborating with the front-end developers, and designing databases. You will also be involved in code review and troubleshooting to ensure high-quality software development.
Responsibilities:
Work directly with the Product Owner and other IT developers to clarify requirements and propose solutions.
Participate in the complete software development cycle (requirement analysis, planning, implementation, code review, testing, deployment, operation, monitoring, etc.).
Develop new features requested by the Product Owner.
Backup source code, optimize security layers, and monitor server performance to handle high user loads.
Continuously listen to user feedback to find ways to improve product quality.
Research technologies and share knowledge with colleagues.
listJob.jobExperience:
3+ years of experience in back-end development.
Expertise in JavaScript, NodeJS (ExpressJS, NestJS).
Experience in deploying NodeJS backend applications to servers.
Strong understanding of database design: SQL and NoSQL.
Familiarity with database services: PostgreSQL, MySQL, DynamoDB, Elasticsearch.
Experience with API design: GraphQL, RESTful.
Experience in integrating APIs with third-party services (Google Cloud, Firebase, Payments, etc.).
Knowledge of CI/CD and proficiency in writing unit tests.
Ability to scale an application to support millions of users.
Eager to enhance technical knowledge and explore/adopt new technologies.
Strong analytical and problem-solving skills.
Proactive, honest, and committed to self-improvement.
Profound knowledge of servers, Nginx, caching strategies, HAProxy, and Varnish Cache.
If you have any English language certificates, please attach them to your CV.
listJob.privilege:
Salary Range: $1,200 - $3,000
Work out for FREE at the 5-star Center.
Pay social insurance according to state regulations.
Participate in team building every year.
Friendly and fun working environment.

listJob.name: Middle DevOps Engineer (Linux, MongoDB, PostgreSQL)
listJob.location: 628A ƒê. V√µ Nguy√™n Gi√°p, An Ph√∫, Th√†nh ph·ªë Th·ªß ƒê·ª©c, TP H·ªì Ch√≠ Minh
listJob.description:
Responsibilities:
Implement, manage, and maintain NGINX and HAProxy for effective load balancing and reverse proxy solutions.
Configure and optimize Varnish Cache to enhance performance through efficient caching mechanisms.
Manage and optimize databases, including MongoDB, PostgreSQL, and Cassandra, ensuring data integrity and scalability.
Collaborate with development teams to deploy and integrate new software solutions within the existing infrastructure.
Utilize Cloudflare for CDN services, DNS management, and DDoS mitigation.
Oversee and optimize server environments on Ubuntu, ensuring system stability and security.
Develop automation scripts and tools to reduce manual interventions and streamline operations.
Continuously analyze and improve existing technologies and infrastructure.
listJob.jobExperience:
Bachelor‚Äôs degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or a related field.
Proven experience as a DevOps Engineer or in a similar role, with extensive knowledge of NGINX, HAProxy, and Varnish Cache.
Proficient in managing and optimizing MongoDB, PostgreSQL, and Cassandra databases.
Experienced in Cloudflare configuration and management.
Skilled in managing Linux-based infrastructures, particularly Ubuntu.
Familiar with scripting languages such as Bash, Python, or Perl.
Strong understanding of network protocols, IP networking, and security measures.
Excellent problem-solving abilities with the capacity to work under tight deadlines.
Additional Skills:
Experience with containerization technologies like Docker and orchestration with Kubernetes.
Familiarity with CI/CD pipelines and tools such as Jenkins or GitLab.
Proficiency in automation tools, including Ansible, Chef, or Puppet.
Relevant certifications (e.g., Linux, Cloudflare, MongoDB, PostgreSQL) are a plus.
listJob.privilege:

listJob.name: AI Engineer
listJob.location: 5th Floor, 19 Duy Tan, Zodiac Building, Qu·∫≠n C·∫ßu Gi·∫•y, H√† N·ªôi
listJob.description:
Company Description 
Applied AI Lab is an AI adviser and solution provider operated as part of the Verysell Group of companies. With a team of 25 professionals across sales, delivery, and operations, including 13 skilled AI/ML engineers, we have been delivering impactful AI solutions for almost 2 years both internally to the group companies and to external clients. As an NVIDIA AI Consulting Partner, we leverage NVIDIA technologies to deliver high-performance AI solutions. Applied AI Lab's commercial team, located in London, is focused on the European market. As we continue to grow, we seek a Vietnam-based AI Engineer to join our AI team
 Job Description
Solution development: Translate high-level requirements into detailed subproblems, crafting comprehensive solutions that address the overall problem. These solutions may extend beyond machine learning, provided they effectively resolve the issues.
Machine Learning model development: Own the process of model development and fine-tuning for downstream tasks, including model architecture design, optimization techniques, and especially data crawling and cleaning.
Model Deployment: Deploy ML models (or participate in the deployment process) across various environments, including cloud, on-premises, mobile, and edge devices.
Work closely with Project Managers on both external and internal tasks.
Stay fresh and update your and team's knowledge on state-of-the-arts AI methodologies and apply them to projects.
listJob.jobExperience:
Bachelor's, Master‚Äôs or PhD degree in Computer Science, Data Science, Machine Learning, or a related field, or equivalent working experience.
3+ years of experience in software development, particularly in machine learning-related projects.
Knowledge in Generative AI, including Large Language Models (LLMs) and diffusion models.
Proficiency in Python.
Extensive experience with API development using frameworks such as Flask, Django, and FastAPI.
Experience with asynchronous programming and tools like asyncio and Celery.
Proficiency with API documentation tools such as Swagger (OpenAPI) and Postman. 
Experience with MLOps and integrating machine learning models with APIs.
Hands-on experience with databases, including SQL, NoSQL, vector databases and features stores.
Working knowledge of containerisation technologies like Docker and Kubernetes.
Experience with cloud platforms like AWS, Azure, and GCP.
Good professional English communication skill.
listJob.privilege:
Benefits?
Friendly environment, brand new office.
‚óè Company events.
‚óè Free Kindergarten for staff‚Äôs kids.
‚óè 13th salary.
‚óè Lunch Allowance, free tea, coffee, milk.
‚óè 20 annual leave days in addition to Vietnamese public holidays.
‚óè Recurrent new challenges (training provided).
‚óè Work with high profile multinational companies.
‚óè Competitive Salary and career evolution based on performances.

listJob.location: The Sentry P Building - 7th Floor, 16 Nguyen Dang Giai, Thao Dien Ward, Thu Duc City, Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam, Th√†nh ph·ªë Th·ªß ƒê·ª©c, TP H·ªì Ch√≠ Minh
listJob.description:
About the job
 Founded in Switzerland in 1968, Z√ºhlke is owned by its partners and located across Europe and Asia. We are a global transformation partner, with engineering and innovation in our DNA. We're trusted to help clients envision and build their businesses for the future ‚Äì to run smarter today while adapting for tomorrow‚Äôs markets, customers, and communities. Our multidisciplinary teams specialise in tech strategy and business innovation, digital solutions and applications, and device and systems engineering. We excel in complex, regulated spaces including health and finance, connecting strategy, tech implementation, and operational services to help clients become more effective, resilient businesses.
 If you share our values and want to do the best work, for the right reasons, we can offer you the chance to do it on a global scale and play a real role in shaping our exciting journey.
 Your role
Are you a master at connecting the right people with the right projects? Do you excel at strategically aligning development goals, client needs, and team dynamics to deliver exceptional results? If you're passionate about building strong relationships and making a meaningful impact, we have the perfect opportunity for you!
As a Staffing Manager, you will take charge of our staffing operations (with a focus on APAC), ensuring optimal assignment of people to projects, while maintaining visibility of both near- and long-term supply (bench) and upcoming demand.
 How you will spend your time
Collaborate with your peers to strategically align individuals with projects, considering their goals, client requirements, team dynamics, and commercial viability. 
Work with account teams to maintain accurate and up-to-date project information, facilitating efficient project staffing and planning. 
Resolve staffing-related conflicts in the best interest of all parties, collaborate to find solutions, and drive to a resolution. 
Lead regular meetings for APAC with internal stakeholders to stay informed about the future pipeline and anticipate potential capacity or capability gaps. 
Participate in project staffing calls as needed, adapting to project sizes and scales. These calls will offer valuable insights into ongoing projects and provide a platform to address staffing challenges and opportunities. 
Foster strong relationships with Practices, working closely with candidates to identify and secure suitable project opportunities. 
Highlight skillset shortages to Practice Heads both from a short-term and long-term strategic perspective. 
Co-own and continuously improve our global staffing processes and guidelines as a member of the Global Staffing team. 
Provide guidance, training and coaching across the region for Staffing related topics (such as Insights, the Staffing Guidelines, processes, etc.) 
Foster and advocate for the importance of good quality data in the journey toward becoming a data-driven organization.
listJob.jobExperience:
What is important to us
Proven experience (5+ years) with Talent Pool, Workforce / Resource planning and Staffing management, preferably at regional level. 
Strong understanding of workforce analytics and the ability to interpret Supply / Demand (bench) data for strategic planning. 
Strong understanding of IT roles and the technical skills required for various positions 
Experience with Digital services, Agile Software Delivery and Consulting would be beneficial. 
Familiarity with client expectations in a professional services environment 
A forward-thinking mindset is crucial to align staffing efforts with long-term business goals and anticipate future staffing needs. 
A bachelor‚Äôs degree (BSc) or equivalent in a relevant field. 
Ability to thrive in ambiguous and uncertain situations, navigating diverse viewpoints to reach optimal solutions. 
Excellent communication skills in both written and spoken English and the ability to build credibility and trust with various stakeholders. 
Proactive in giving and receiving constructive feedback, capable of handling challenging discussions. 
Demonstrated personal and professional resilience with a willingness to make tough decisions. 
Maintain composure and professionalism when managing conflicting situations, prioritizing the right decisions over popularity. 
A service-oriented mindset with a strong sense of urgency and commitment to providing highly responsive service.
If you feel you don't meet all the requirements, we are still happy to get to know you, learn more about your ambitions and ideas and look forward to receiving your application!
 We welcome people from all backgrounds, regardless of their gender, personality, national origin, race, religion, colour, sexual orientation, gender identity, age, marital status, disability or veteran status.
listJob.privilege:
A career at Z√ºhlke is a constant journey of personal growth ‚Äì from learning to knowledge exchange, helping others grow to driving innovation topics and shaping the development of the company.
Committed to development: We dedicate 10% of our turnover to support employees‚Äô growth and development on skills, to fit you and Zuhlke perfectly.
Deliver meaningful work: Experience working in distributed teams within a global company with 16 offices working with regional and global clients on cross-border transformative projects.
Good work-life balance: A family-friendly workplace with the possibility to work from home, and 18 days of annual leave to support your healthy work-life balance.
Profit sharing scheme: We offer profit sharing as defined by the company‚Äôs success in the previous year in addition to your annual salary. 
Healthcare and medical benefits: Enjoy great work while having a peace of mind for what life might bring you with competitive medical benefits to support your health and well-being.
Social and employee events: Experience the unique Z√ºhlke culture of working, including annual team camps, local festive celebrations and social events with colleagues across the globe.

listJob.name: Interactive Front-End Developer
listJob.location: Viettel Tower - 285 Cach Mang Thang 8 street, Ward 12, Qu·∫≠n 10, TP H·ªì Ch√≠ Minh
listJob.description:
Overview: We are looking for a highly skilled Interactive Frontend Developer to join our interactive studio team. In this role, you will specialize in building interactive experiences such as mini-games, playable ads, and interactive microsites using React, Vue, and modern front-end frameworks. While you will have some back-end exposure, your primary focus will be on crafting engaging, high-performance front-end experiences that bridge the gap between design and development.
 How will YOU contribute to the Team?
Develop highly interactive web experiences such as mini-games, playable ads, and interactive landing pages.
Collaborate closely with designers, product managers, and engineers to bring creative concepts to life.
Work with React, Vue, and other modern front-end technologies to build visually compelling user experiences.
Optimize applications for performance, responsiveness, and scalability.
Maintain and improve existing front-end components and frameworks.
Write clean, maintainable, and well-tested code.
Implement best practices in UI/UX, animations, and browser performance optimizations.
Research and integrate emerging technologies, such as WebGL, Three.js, PixiJS, Phaser, or BabylonJS, to create cutting-edge interactive experiences.
Work within a fast-paced environment and iterate quickly based on client feedback and project requirements.
listJob.jobExperience:
Proven experience as a Front-End or Full Stack Developer with a strong front-end focus.
Proficiency in JavaScript (ES6+), HTML5, and CSS
Experience with React.js, Vue.js, or other modern front-end frameworks.
Strong understanding of interactive web development and game mechanics for browser-based experiences.
Familiarity with animation libraries and frameworks (e.g., GSAP, Three.js, PixiJS, Phaser, WebGL).
Knowledge of state management libraries (e.g., Redux, Vuex, Zustand).
Experience with RESTful APIs and WebSockets.
Understanding of performance optimization techniques, including lazy loading, caching, and asset management.
Familiarity with Git, CI/CD pipelines, and modern development workflow
Ability to troubleshoot and debug issues efficiently.
Nice to Have
  Experience with Node.js, Python (Flask, FastAPI, Django), or Go.
Exposure to backend development, database management, and cloud platforms (AWS, GCP, Firebase).
Understanding of WebAssembly, WebGPU, or other advanced web technologies.
Familiarity with Figma, Adobe Creative Suite, or other design tools to collaborate with designers.
Experience working on AdTech, gamification, or digital marketing project
Strong interest in exploring emerging technologies such as AR/VR, AI-driven interfaces, and interactive storytelling

listJob.name: Senior QA Executive (Tester, QA QC - Manual+Automation)
listJob.location: AB Tower, 76A Le Lai, Qu·∫≠n 1, TP H·ªì Ch√≠ Minh
listJob.description:
Oversee all aspects of quality assurance including establishing metrics, applying industry best practices, and developing new tools and processes to ensure quality goals are met.
Define, document, and manage the testing processes and procedures to ensure reliability and compliance with standards
Develop testing programs that address areas such as database impacts, software scenarios, regression testing, negative testing, error or bug retests, or usability.
Design and manage test plans, scenarios, scripts, or procedures.
Manage and conduct all testing processes including UAT, OAT and SAT.
Ensure that the testing environment is qualified compared to the production environment.
Create or maintain databases of known test defects.
Conduct historical analyses of test results.
Monitor program performance to ensure efficient and problem-free operations.
Identify, analyze, and document problems with program function, output, online screen, or content.
Act as key point of contact for all QA aspects of releases, providing QA services and coordinating QA resources internally and externally.
Lead and mentor QA team members, as well as manage outside contract testers.
Plan test schedules or strategies in accordance with project scope or delivery dates.
Collaborate with field staff to evaluate or diagnose problems and recommend possible solutions.
Manage Incident Management process and communicate resolutions with stakeholders.
Manage Release and Deploy process to ensure quality of the release on production environment.
Manage Service Desk team including SDA as a single point contact of user to fulfill the requests.
Collect data and provide the performance report for all related ITIL processes weekly.
Assist the Service manager in driving Service management best-practice and ITIL process standardization.
listJob.jobExperience:
1. Educational level‚Ä¢ Bachelor‚Äôs (or above) degree in the field of computer science or information systems.
2. Knowledge & Experiences
At least 5 years‚Äô experience in software development and/or systems management.
Demonstrated experience developing and executing test cases, scripts, plans and procedures to support various development methodologies.
Familiarity with entire software development life cycle and test cycles (Unit, Regression, Functional, Systems, Stress & Scale, Smoke & Sanity).
Understanding of multi-tier web application architecture and deployment.
Understanding of existing QA best practices and methodologies to design, implement and automate processes.
Having ITIL certificates or working on ITIL processes is preferred.
Prior success using a metrics-driven approach and closed-loop feedback to improve software deliverables and improve predictability and reliability of releases.
3. Technical skills
Ability to conduct and direct research into IT issues and products as required.
Proven analytical, evaluative, and problem-solving abilities.
Detailed and effective written communication skills for documenting the features tested and bugs found.
Proven automation testing, with API and web UI with various programming languages.
Proven performance and security testing, with detail scenarios definition and knowledge, evaluate system performance health. 
4. Soft skills
Good written and oral communication skills.
Ability to effectively prioritize and execute tasks in a high-pressure environment.
Detail oriented, extremely responsive, and able to prioritize many tasks.
Self-motivated, works well independently and with others.
Highly self-motivated and directed.

JOB DESCRIPTION (Your role):
You will be one of the key members in our tech team, who are responsible for the innovation and tech developments of the whole business; from a tech perspective. 
You will maintain a high standard in performance and commitment, and promote these skills among your juniors. You will contribute ideas and innovations to the business, as a master of technology.

- Write clean, functional code on the front-end and back-end 
- Design client-side and server-side architecture 
- Build reusable code and libraries for future use 
- Train & lead juniors, delegate and empower them to take the ownership (if ecessary). 
- Write well tested software to ensure quality, responsiveness and efficiency 
- Troubleshoot & solve issues 
- Collaborate with product team, to plan and launch new features 
Good to have: 
- Having experience with ExpressJS, NestJs, Graphql will be a big advantage, as it's our main web framework. 
- Familiarity with AWS services, Queue services (SQS, Kafka ‚Ä¶), Elasticsearch, Redis, MongoDB is added advantages 
- Have CI/CD experience is a plus

- 3+ years of professional software development experience.

- Have experience with Agile Process and Scrum Methodologies 
- Can lead technical support and training.

listJob.description:
We are searching for X2 Senior Backend Serverless to join our team.  This role is perfect for passionate programmers who enjoy learning about challenging projects quickly and working well with others in agile teams. You will help develop SaaS web applications and cross-platform applications, using the latest technologies in SaaS, Web3, and AI.
 Your Role:
Be part of an international team to create complex web and mobile applications and improve existing ones.
Work closely with experienced software teams from Australia and other countries on important medium to large projects.
Spend some time working on our internal projects with new technologies in AI/ML to grow your skills and knowledge.
listJob.jobExperience:
‚Ä¢ Having a degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering, Information Technology, or a similar field is helpful but not required.
‚Ä¢ At least 5 years of experience working full-time in software development is essential
‚Ä¢ Excellent skills in developing with Node.js (Full Stack) and GraphQL; Typescript and AWS Serverless (Lambda, S3, DynamoDB, EventBridge, SNS, SQS) using SAM (ideally) or CDK.
‚Ä¢ Comfortable with NoSQL and/or SQL DB's (Full Stack)
‚Ä¢ Experience with React.Js, HTML, CSS, TypeScript, and vanilla JavaScript.
‚Ä¢ Must be able to communicate well in English (speaking and writing) with team members and clients.
 Nice to Have (But Not Required):
‚Ä¢ Experience with Agile/Scrum.
‚Ä¢ Knowledge of software architecture.
‚Ä¢ Experience with CI/CD, Docker, and cloud services like AWS or Azure.
‚Ä¢ Experience with unit tests and/or TDD.
‚Ä¢ Previous work with international teams and using English for communication.
‚Ä¢ Interest or experience in AI/ML, Blockchain, Digital Identity/Verified Credentials, and/or FinTech.
 This job is a great opportunity for developers wanting to work on diverse projects and advance their careers. If you are eager to explore new technologies and contribute to exciting projects, we would love to meet you.

The storage and processing of such information will comply with the applicable laws of Vietnam, and the policies and procedures of ITViec and NAB Vietnam regarding personal data, as amended from time to time.
  YOUR JOB RESPONSIBILITIES
1. Quality Management‚ÄØ 
Accountable for all quality aspects in multiple squads or multiple sub-domains. 
Define and align with stakeholders (HO, PQEM, EM) on the testing strategy and approach.  
Participate in the strategic delivery planning of the squads and domain. 
Promote and implement Shift-Left testing and Automation first. 
Maintain and enforce testing approach, best practices, align/adapt to the global processes. 
Understanding the testing challenges/blockers, be an escalation point for quality issues and help to resolve them. 
Participate in software development process including fixing complex production code, reviewing code, and contributing to software design, if required. 
Drive the design, implementation, maintenance of automation frameworks and CI/CD integration. 
Manage all the stages of testing (ST, ST +1, SIT) and the SIT environment.  
Define, monitor and report the quality metrics.  
Manage release testing activities. review, sign-off testing results.  
2. Talent Management‚ÄØ 
Recruit and make QE hiring decision.  
Participate in planning and allocating QEs across multiple squads.  
Build a strong team culture and foster employee engagement. 
3. Performance Management‚ÄØ 
Define the QE goals based on the domain and QE center‚Äôs priorities. 
Have development/career plans and 1-1 for team members. 
Provide feedback and assess the performance on a quarter/annual basis. 
4. Capability Building‚ÄØ 
Identify gaps, organize training for upskilling the QE capabilities. 
Train and enable senior QEs to take leadership roles.  
Contribute to building cross-domain capabilities for NAB. 
5. Innovation‚ÄØ 
Drive, contribute towards innovation in QE processes/tools and domain‚Äôs innovations. 
Support the QE colleagues to stay on top of the latest testing technology trends.

Expert in testing methodologies and techniques, extensive experience with the quality engineering practices of end-to-end enterprise grade systems.

Strong programming skills in any programming language. (such as Java, JavaScript, Python)  
Expert in automation architect and framework development‚ÄØfrom scratch using specific domain testing stack. (Such as Selenium, Appium, Espresso, WDIO, Playwright, Rest Assured,  
Solid Cloud and CI/CD Experience - Knowledge of‚ÄØAWS, Azure, Docker & Kubernetes, Jenkins 
Demonstrable problem-solving and decision-making skills along with strong teamwork, collaboration & communication. 
Ability to learn and become an SME in a banking domain or subdomain (s)

listJob.name: [Hanoi] Kyber Hiring Backend Engineer (Blockchain)
listJob.location: 7th floor Web3 Tower, 15 Lane 4 Duy Tan Str., Qu·∫≠n C·∫ßu Gi·∫•y, H√† N·ªôi
listJob.description:
*** ABOUT KYBER NETWORK
Kyber Network is an industry-leading blockchain company, providing cryptocurrency liquidity for the largest companies in the DeFi (decentralized finance). The company raised US$52M in its token sale in 2017, making it one of the largest cryptocurrency-based fundraising in history.
 We are an innovative team of about 20 members, and we are willing to expand. Our team has been constantly growing since our inception in 2017 when we started trading on-chain. Our core activities revolve around trading on-chain and on centralized exchanges, monitoring trading operations from our applications, improving current systems in operational logic and technology frameworks, and designing new systems to adapt and stay ahead of market.
 Each team member is assigned with multiple trading or helper applications/services that make our trading more efficient. There is a flat structure where your ideas and questions are always heard and each of the persons responsible for an app has autonomy and deep understanding of the trading needs and logic and can proactively suggest enhancements.
 We are looking for someone who gets fascinated with the idea of diving deeper into trading, likes problems and also likes solving performance and algorithm challenges and is eager to exchange ideas in a competitive yet supportive environment aimed at personal and collective excellence. If you are driven to continuously improve and eager to contribute to a cutting-edge trading team, we would be excited to have you join us.
 Kyber Network has offices in Singapore, Hanoi, and Ho Chi Minh City:
Singapore office: 1 Upper Circular Road, #05-01 Singapore 058400
Hanoi office: 7th floor Web3 Tower, 15 Lane 4 Duy Tan Str., Cau Giay Dist., Hanoi, Vietnam
Ho Chi Minh city office: 5th floor Ree Tower, 9 Doan Van Bo Str., District 4, Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam
 *** JOB DESCRIPTION
Responsibilities:
Design and construct high-performance trading applications tailored to meet the specific needs of the trading team, emphasizing on competitive edge and speed.
Develop and enhance trading or auxiliary services to continuously optimize performance and efficiency.
Fetch and integrate data from cryptocurrency exchanges, third-party API providers, and blockchain EVM sources, with a particular focus on Ethereum and Solana.
Aggregate and utilize above data effectively to support dynamic trading strategies.
Create reusable components to streamline trading strategy development and improve overall functionality.
Suggest algorithm enhancements based on a deep understanding of application requirements.
Leverage the latest open-source technologies to ensure the adoption of cutting-edge development practices.
listJob.jobExperience:
Must have
Professional Experience: Minimum of 3 years in software development.
Demonstrated ability in building high-performance, low-latency applications.
Proficiency in data structures and algorithms.
Experience in designing and implementing highly available, scalable cloud-based systems.
Demonstrated ability to build platform services that enhance developer experiences and meet robust standards.
Proficiency in backend development with managed languages such as C++, Golang, Rust, or similar; strong preference for Golang expertise, our team‚Äôs main tech stack
Nice to have:
Database Expertise: Experience with SQL, NoSQL, and NewSQL databases.
Familiarity with Ethereum RPC.
Experience working with APIs from major crypto exchanges like Binance, OKX, Coinbase, etc.
listJob.privilege:
1- Financial Rewards
* Salary:
Salary review once per year in January
100% salary during probation period (if any) (i.e., same net salary during probation and after signing official labor contract)
* Bonus:
Working anniversary bonus (3-year, 5-year, 10-year anniversary)
Gifts for other celebrations: Lunar New Year, Mid-Autumn Festival, March 8th, June 1st, Wedding day, Childbirth
13th salary month bonus prorated based on your actual service time in the year
Potential annual bonus based on the Company‚Äôs business results and your individual performance
2- Employment Benefits
* Insurance and health care:
Government‚Äôs social/health/unemployment insurance: contributed based on fully 100% contracted salary
Company-sponsored premium health insurance package for yourself and up to 3 family members (legal spouse or children), check-up guaranteed at multiple major hospitals and clinics
Company-sponsored annual health check-up at a reputable hospital
* Standard leave policy of 12 paid working days/year, and up to additional 02 paid leave days/year on your birthday, for community activities and for childcare. Eligible to take leave during probation.
* Equipment Sponsorship: Monthly sponsorship up to USD100/month.
3- Career Development
* Opportunity to work with top talents in blockchain:
Co-founders with high reputation, first-class education and considerable experience in blockchain space
Research and engineering team members with remarkable academic background (PhDs, Masters, and Engineering bachelors from reputable universities, winning national and international top awards in Mathematics/Informatics contests)
Global advisors and partners
Global English-speaking working environment including global colleagues in Singapore, Greece, USA, Korea‚Ä¶
* Opportunity to create long-term sustainable fintech products that serve Kyber‚Äôs vision: Decentralized Economy for Everyone.
* Opportunity to work with blockchain - the technology that leads the current and future trends.
* Opportunity to attend technology/blockchain seminars internally and externally.
4- Work Environment
* Flexible working hours from Monday to Friday with provided days to work from home when needed
* Periodical team buildings and company retreats
* Multiple leisure clubs at your choice: football, table tennis, badminton, running, chess, DOTA, PES‚Ä¶
* Company-sponsored fresh fruits, snacks and drinks available daily
* Nap rooms with available blankets and pillows
5- Company Culture
* Transparency at heart, integrity in mind
* Friendly and supportive collaboration working style
* Young and funny colleagues

listJob.description:
Description
We are looking for some highly skilled and motivated Python Developers to join our dynamic team. As a Python Developer, you will be responsible for writing prompts, calling the ChatGPT interface and similar large models, and training customer data through APIs. Your expertise in programming languages and backend technologies will play a key role in shaping our products and delivering outstanding user experiences.
Responsibilities
Write prompts and calls to the ChatGPT interface and similar large models. -
Retrieve and train customer data through API.
Collaborate with cross-functional teams to identify, design and deliver high-quality software solutions. Develop and maintain powerful, scalable and efficient backend and API systems.
Write clean, easy-to-maintain and well-documented code for new and existing applications.
Identify and resolve software bugs and performance issues. 
Ensure that security and data protection measures are implemented in backend systems. 
Participate in code reviews to ensure compliance with coding standards and best practices. Collaborate with front-end developers to integrate user-oriented elements with server-side logic. Keep up to date with the latest trends and advances in backend development and contribute to the improvement of existing processes and practices.

Bachelor's degree in computer science, software engineering, or related science and engineering fields, master's or doctoral degree in related majors preferred. 
From 2-4 years of relevant work experience. 
Proficient in using Python programming language. 
Familiar with using FastAPI or Django. 
Understand SQL and NoSQL database management systems.
Have a solid understanding of RESTful APIs. 
Good problem-solving and troubleshooting skills. Good communication and collaboration skills. Able to work independently. 
Possess good English reading and writing skills, fluent English is preferred. 
Familiarity with algorithms and data structures is preferred. 
Bonus points: 
Able to monitor and optimize the performance of backend systems. Experience in using microservices in a cloud environment. 
Possess research and development capabilities.
Have experience using Golang.
Nice to have
Ability to monitor and optimize the performance of backend systems.
Experience working with microservices in the cloud environment.
Ability to perform R&D.
Experience working with Django or Fastapi, etc. Fastapi would be better.
Experience using Golong.
Can communicate in English.

" Pascalia Group is an independent software house built on a stable foundation of 35 years since its founding, with the latest technology and the opportunity and environment to take on global challenges.
Based on the concept of ambidextrous management, Pascalia, founded in 1988, and Pascalia Asia, founded in 2015, operate businesses and organizations on four axes: ‚Äúexisting business,‚Äù ‚Äúnew business,‚Äù ‚Äúdomestic‚Äù and ‚Äúoverseas‚Äù.

With a warm and welcoming corporate culture, the company creates a flat organizational structure without strict hierarchies, fostering a friendly atmosphere among personable employees. Rather than aiming for stock market listings or scale expansion through top-down decision-making, the company‚Äôs starting point is to support each engineer, allowing them to have enriching time. Practicing purpose-driven management, the Pascalia Group sincerely addresses customer challenges and continues to provide new value to society.
Currently Pascalia Group has 6 offices and 9 working location around the world (Tokyo, Tsukuba, Hai Phong, Da Nang, HCMC, Vancouver, Auckland, Vientiane and Pakse)
Thanks to the global expansion and strategic management leading speedy growth year by year, in 2021 and 2024 Pascalia Group won the SME100 Award - Top fasting moving companies in Vietnam and Asia. 
In 2023, Pascalia group has been honored with the prestigious HR Asia 2023 Best Company to Work for in Asia."

listJob.name: Senior Data Scientist
listJob.location: Vinamilk Tower, 10 Tan Trao St., Tan Phu Ward., , Qu·∫≠n 7, TP H·ªì Ch√≠ Minh
listJob.description:
About us
The Data & Technology Team within the Strategy & Innovation Office will leverage technology and data to help our business create and innovate. We are looking for a data science leader who is obsessed about bridging between data and decision-making. This role will be responsible for the build, scale and shape the direction of our business through data science & analytics. The ideal candidate is "full-stack" data powerhouse who uses data to guide decision making to ensure the best experiences. This role will report to the Data Scientist Manager .
 1. 6 Month Expectations
Support Technology and Product Management team in mapping out the data vision and future state data pipeline and architecture
Translate business questions and concerns into specific analytical questions that can be answered with available data using statistical and machine learning methods
Provide feedback to our science and engineering teams on the applicability of technical solutions from the business perspective
Solve real-world problems by getting and analyzing large amounts of data, diving deep to identify business insights and opportunities, designing simulations and experiments, developing statistical and ML models tailored to business needs, and collaborating with Scientists, Engineers, BIEs, and Product Team.
Develop statistical and analytic models to uncover insights and segmentations that drive the business forward and uncover new areas of opportunities
Apply machine learning methodologies by developing new sources, developing and testing enhancements, running computational experiments, and fine-tuning parameters for new ones
Write code (Python, Scala, SQL, etc.) to obtain, manipulate, and analyze data
2. 12+ Month Expectations
Build decision-making models and propose solutions for the business problem you define
Formalize assumptions about how our systems are expected to work, create statistical definition of the outlier, and develop methods to systematically identify outliers. Work out why such examples are outliers and define if any actions are needed.
Given anecdotes about anomalies or using automatic scripts to define anomalies, deep dive to explain why they happen, and identify fixes
Drive implementation forward while enabling the business scaling vectors
Develop scalable data pipelines to support analytics needs
Communicate verbally and in writing to business customers with various levels of technical knowledge, educating them about our research, as well as sharing insights and recommendations
Build and lead a team of data scientists and analysts to develop AI, ML and other algorithmic solutions to automate tasks and generate insights
listJob.jobExperience:
Basic Qualifications
Bachelor‚Äôs Degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or related field (Machine Learning, Mathematics and Statistics)
4+ years of experience in a leading technology role (Data Scientist)
Experience in establishing and building data architecture, pipeline, and model deployment from the ground up in ambiguous environment
Experience applying various machine learning techniques to solve complex business problems, and understanding the key parameters that affect their performance
Experience developing experimental and analytic plans for data modeling processes, use of strong baselines, and the ability to accurately determine cause and effect relationships.
Expert fluency in SQL-based data manipulation
In-depth experience using scripting languages such as R or Python for data analysis
Preferred Qualifications
Master‚Äôs Degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or related field (Statistics, Applied Math, Operations Research, Economics, or a related quantitative field with at least 5+ years of working experience as a Data Scientist).
High degree of business acumen and real world perspective to effectively plan, prioritize, and build new technologies that align with business growth
listJob.privilege:
Competitive salary and benefits on Top in VietNam.
Attractive 13th-month salary and high performance bonus in the year.
Annual performance review for salary raise and promotion.
Premium private insurance with a discount for family members.

Company trips and team buildings.
Gifts on special accession: individual /company birthday, Tet, and Holidays.
Internal activities, sport, and social clubs, gym, yoga, swimming‚Ä¶
Opportunity to train both technical and soft skills to develop your career path.

listJob.name: IT Infrastructure Team Leader (AWS, M365, SaaS)
listJob.location: 20 S√¥ng Thao, Qu·∫≠n T√¢n B√¨nh, TP H·ªì Ch√≠ Minh
listJob.description:
Job Purpose:
The Infra Team Leader leads the strategic planning, development, and management of the organization‚Äôs IT infrastructure. This role ensures infrastructure scalability, efficiency, and alignment with strategic goals. Responsibilities include guiding the technology operations team, overseeing infrastructure projects, managing daily IT operations, and ensuring security and compliance. The Infra Team Leader also handles vendor relationships, budget management, and drives continuous improvement and innovation within the IT infrastructure.
 Responsibilities:
Strategic Infrastructure Planning
Create and execute strategies to improve IT infrastructure.
Ensure infrastructure projects align with the company's strategic objectives.
Manage infrastructure architecture for scalability and efficiency.
 Team Leadership and Development
Provide leadership and guidance to the technology operations team, fostering a culture of excellence, collaboration, innovation, accountability, and continuous improvement.
Recruit, mentor, and develop technical talent, building a high-performing team capable of meeting the organization's technology needs.
Set clear goals and expectations for team members and provide regular performance evaluations. Ensuring that the team consistently meets performance objectives.
 Project and Task Management
Manage infrastructure projects from start to finish.
Ensure timely, within-scope, and budget-compliant project delivery.
Collaborate with cross-functional department and Business to meet project goals.
 IT Operations Management
Oversee day-to-day IT operations to ensure stability and efficiency.
Oversee the design, development, and maintenance of scalable and secure platforms.
Ensure high availability and optimal performance of all platform services.
Manage incident and problem resolution processes to maintain high uptime and availability of all systems to maintain business continuity.
Ensure compliance with IT policies and procedures.
Champion DevOps principles to increase the ability to deliver applications and services at high velocity, enhance reliability, and streamline workflows.
Manage the server room, ensuring the health and maintenance of network devices and servers.
Oversee all hardware, software, licenses, subscriptions, and related assets.
 Security and Compliance
Ensure the security of IT infrastructure and compliance with relevant regulations.
Conduct regular audits and risk assessments to identify and mitigate security risks.
 Vendor and Stakeholder Management
Manage relationships with technology vendors and service providers.
Negotiate contracts and ensure third-party solutions meet organizational needs.
Collaborate with senior management and other stakeholders to align IT initiatives with business goals.
Manage relationships with technology vendors and service providers.
Collaborate with the Purchasing team to negotiate contracts, costs, service levels; and ensure third-party solutions meet organizational needs.
 Budget Management
Prepare and manage the budget for IT infrastructure expenditures.
Optimize resource use and ensure cost-effective solutions.
Capable of estimating infrastructure costs to support accurate project budgeting.
 Innovation and Continuous Improvement:
Keep up-to-date with new technologies and industry trends.
Lead initiatives to continuously improve IT infrastructure performance.
Promote and implement innovative solutions to business challenges.
listJob.jobExperience:
Qualifications:
Bachelor‚Äôs degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or related field.
Minimum of 3 to 5 years‚Äô experience in IT infrastructure management, with a proven track record in leading teams and managing large-scale projects.
Strong knowledge of networks, servers, storage, virtualization, and cybersecurity technologies and best practices.
Strong knowledge of DevOps principles, CI/CD methodologies, and automation tools (e.g., Gitlab, Ansible, Terraform, Kubernetes).
Extensive experience with cloud technologies and services (AWS, M365, SaaS).
Practical experience with ITIL management principles or Information Security Management System (ISMS) and ISO27001 standards.
Experience with hybrid cloud environments and multi-cloud strategies.
Proficiency in disaster recovery planning and business continuity management.
Leadership experience, especially in mentoring and guiding less-experienced team members. Demonstrated ability to lead and manage projects involving cross-functional teams.
Excellent problem-solving skills and analytical skills, with the ability to identify and resolve complex issues.
Experience in budget management and financial analysis.
Strong communication and leadership skills, capable of motivating teams and driving change.
Fluent in English, both oral and written form.

listJob.description:
As a Java Technical Lead, you are responsible for the quality of software developments for a complex application, either in the development or the maintenance phase.
You set standards, give technical directions, and perform reviews to verify the adherence to coding standards.
Analyze legacy code in order to support the team in understanding difficult logic,
You work with architecture teams in Europe and Vietnam to understand designs and architecture directions.
As part of the software engineering team, you coach developers, help them to implement the software in line with the designs and standards, and you train them so they become independent on technical aspects.
You are hands-on and able to solve complex technical issues by yourself. You perform code reviews to validate the code written by teammates. You provide recommendations and directions for continuous improvement of the code quality (technical debt reduction, unit tests, coding standards).
You design the technical stack for development projects. Whenever necessary, you research new or emerging technologies and frameworks, give recommendations, build proofs of concept and conduct trainings.

Able to read and write technical documents in the English language.

listJob.description:
THE ROLE
We are looking for a great .NET developer who is proficient with C#. Your primary focus will be on developing back-end components, data layers and API. You will ensure that these components and the overall application are robust, scalable and easy to maintain. You will coordinate with the rest of the team working on different layers of the infrastructure. Therefore, a commitment to collaborative problem solving, sophisticated design, and quality product is important.
 Tech stack: SQL Server, Entity Framework, .NET Core, Identity Server, RESTful APIs, Amazon AWS (EC2, S3, SQS, SES, Lambda, StepFunctions, API Gateway, etc), Elasticsearch, memcache, NodeJS, React.js, Redux, Web socket.
 JOB RESPONSIBILITIES
Architect and build robust, scalable, highly available, and reliable systems
Proactively research for solutions to problems
Work closely with the client teams and product design team to iterate quickly on new features and experiments
Participate in design discussions, code reviews, and group brainstorming sessions
Deliver high-quality code following best practices for better performance, user experience, and reusability
Troubleshoot existing code bases, hunt down nasty bugs, and refactor code
listJob.jobExperience:

Bachelor‚Äòs degree in computer science or equivalent
3+ years of experience in backend development using C# or .NET Core.
Good communication in English
Nice-to-have:
Having experience working with ReactJs is a plus
Having experience working with Microservice systems is a plus
Be hardworking, passionate, and possess a can-do attitude.
Be good at critical, logical thinking, and problem-solving skills
Happy to deal with the opposite and different ideas
Be a good team player and patient person
Be a self-learner

listJob.description:
For two decades as the largest tech-based real estate marketting content creation company in the world with 1.000+ employees globally, we have made it easier to market real estate, helping realtors around the world through visionary image solutions and innovative marketing tools. 
And we are on a mission towards creating the future Esoft vision around building our future with and through AI. AI has shown to have a huge impact on our business, and it will unfold in the years to come ‚Äì We have already made some great landmarks with the utilization of AI and can¬¥t wait to get going on all the other things on our intensive roadmap. 
The Java Developer will be responsible for, but not be limited to, the following:
Working with Product Owner to clarify task requirement and proactively propose better ideas or suggestion if any.
Participating in the development including coding, testing, unit-testing and code reviewing.
Trouble shooting system issues and analyze errors for root causes and propose solution.
Deploying bug fixes and feature releases
listJob.jobExperience:
MUST HAVE
Must be experienced developer, having minimum of 5 years professional experience. A proven track record with international organizations or studying is desirable.
Proven skills in creating scalable and resilient software designs.
Ability to follow established architectural guidelines for both design and implementation.
Experienced with utilising standard design patterns.
Experienced with system integrations and APIs.
Having worked with Microservices would be an advantage.
used to working with (and enjoy) Test Automation, Scrum.
Current technologies in used include Java enterprise applications, Spring, Hibernate, REST, Amazon Webservices. The more you know the better; otherwise we can help to bridge the gaps.
Self-motivated with good team skills. Enthusiastic and interested in learning and applying new technologies.
Have the ability to communicate in English, both written and verbal is preferred
Have experience and interested working in a distributed team.
PLUS SKILLS AND EXPERIENCE
Experience with Agile Project Management; namely Scrum
Experience with Jira, Confluence
MINDSET & ATTITUDE
Be a team player, work toward the common goal of the team, is willing to support other colleagues
Eager to learn the new technologies & Machine learning approaches & systems
Have good mindset, attitude & commitment
listJob.privilege:
We are a diverse crowd of doers and thinkers who work 24/7 from our offices in Denmark, Sweden and Vietnam, all of us towards the same goal ‚Äì creating outstanding solutions and the best customer experience.
Our purpose is to make it easier to market real estate. For nearly 20 years, we have worked passionately to help realtors all over the world by delivering reliably image solutions and great marketing tools.
Joining us, you‚Äôll have an opportunity to continue building your career in an international and successful company with market-leading, innovative solutions. In every business unit and in every office around the world, Esoft has always been driven by a strong team spirit and an even stronger sense of pride. We strive to provide an interesting workplace, where people work and interact across cultures and time zones. We cherish creativity and innovation, and we invest in training and development of employees.
Also, you will join a dynamic and international environment anchored in a strong company culture that encourages and fosters creativity, innovation, respect and equality. Our values - quality, credibility, openness, innovation, care, and passion ‚Äì are based on a belief that we can make a difference ‚Äì for each other and our clients. Our award-winning CSR policy and high employee ethics are proofs that we walk the talk. 
WHAT WE OFFER
We are looking to build a long-term relationship, and you will be part of a team that is in a very exciting development phase. 
We offer a competitive salary and benefit package including an attractive incentive plan, other activities like: Team building, company trip, Year End Party‚Ä¶that fit the selected candidate‚Äôs experience and qualifications. 
Additional benefits include 13th and 14th month salary as per regulations set forth in our staff manual. Insurance contributions as regulated by the law. 
Besides fully participate in SIUIHI, we offer private health insurance including family members as per regulations set forth in our staff manual; Annual health check as well as meals (co-sharing) consumed in the company‚Äôs canteen. 
Training activities are carried out both at a corporate as well as individual level.

listJob.description:
LARION, a global software outsourcing partner with 2 decades deep industry expertise. We are a 100% Vietnam technology company specializing in turnkey solutions and building highly skilled development teams for companies of all size and types of business. Run by a team of successful entrepreneurs and dedicated technical experts - LARION is a unique symphony where we create a frictionless future for customers with passion, while maintaining full compliance with your needs and objectives.
 We are looking for a talented C++ Embedded Engineer to join the project development of digital LCD measuring instruments for various types of vehicles.
 I. What You‚Äôll Do
Design, develop, and maintain embedded software for digital LCD measuring instruments.
Develop software using C++ in an embedded Linux environment.
Work with cross-functional teams to understand customer needs and translate them into software solutions.
Develop and maintain embedded systems for optimal performance.
Work closely with hardware engineers to ensure smooth integration between software and hardware.
Conduct code reviews, debugging, and troubleshooting to ensure high-quality software delivery.
Continuously improve the development process, identifying areas for optimization and proposing improvements.
Document software designs, processes, and solutions to ensure clarity and maintainability.
listJob.jobExperience:

Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or related field (or equivalent experience).
3+ years of experience in C++ development, particularly in embedded systems or automotive software.
Proficiency in Yocto Linux for building custom Linux distributions and embedded systems.
Strong knowledge of the Qt framework for GUI development in embedded systems, including experience with Qt 6.7 and QML for dynamic user interfaces.
Experience with multi-threading, and multi-process programming.
Experience with CAN bus protocol for communication in automotive or embedded systems.
Knowledge of encryption libraries for secure communication and data handling.
Strong understanding of OOP and design patterns.
Familiarity with hardware-level development and integration.
Experience in Agile development environments.
Familiarity with Git, Jenkins, Docker.
Good English communication.

Optimize database queries to ensure system performance and scalability.
Implement and maintain RESTful APIs for frontend and third-party integrations.
Ensure security best practices are followed in API and database operations.
Frontend Development (Secondary Focus):
Build and maintain user-facing features using VueJS (Vue 2 or Vue 3).
Work closely with UI/UX designers to create reusable and scalable frontend components.
Collaboration & Best Practices:
Work closely with the product team to translate business requirements into technical solutions.
Write clean, efficient, and maintainable code following best practices.
Perform code reviews and contribute to improving development processes.
Stay updated with the latest trends in Laravel, VueJS, and related technologies.
listJob.jobExperience:

At least 2 years of experience working with Laravel in production environments.
Experience with VueJS (Vue 2 or Vue 3), including component-based development.
Proficiency in MySQL/PostgreSQL, including query optimization and database design.
Experience in building and integrating RESTful APIs.
Familiarity with Git and working in a collaborative development environment.
Bachelor's Degree (or above) in IT or related fields, with a preference for candidates from top-tier universities.
Nice to Have:
Experience with Redis, Queue Workers.
Experience with Docker, Kubernetes, CI/CD pipelines.
Experience developing SaaS-style applications and/or public APIs.

Knowledge of unit testing and automated testing frameworks.
Ability to quickly learn and adapt to new technologies.

listJob.name: Al Engineer (AWS, Python, Java)
listJob.location: Century Tower, Minh Khai, Hai Ba Trung, Qu·∫≠n Hai B√† Tr∆∞ng, H√† N·ªôi
listJob.description:
We are seeking a talented and experienced Al Engineer to join our team. The ideal candidate will have a strong background in artificial intelligence, machine learning, and cloud computing, with a specific focus on Amazon Web Services (AWS). You will work closely with cross-functional teams, designing, developing, and deploying Al solutions on the AWS platform, leveraging AWS services and tools to drive innovation and achieve business goals. The ideal candidate will have strong knowledge in Generate Al, Large Language Model and relevant software development package and framework, a keen eye for detail, and a passion for keeping up with emerging technologies.
Responsibilities
Collaborate with data & Al architect, product managers and fellow developers, define Al project requirements and objectives, create software architectures and implement for Al solutions.
Utilize AWS Services: Leverage AWS services such as Bedrock, Neptune, SageMaker, Lambda, EC2, S3, and others to build scalable and efficient Al solutions.
Participating in daily standup, sprint planning, retrospective meetings during project implementation phase.
Design and Development: Design, develop, and implement Al and machine learning models on the AWS platform. Implement coding to interface relevant SDK according to established practices.
Data Handling: Perform data preprocessing, feature engineering, and model evaluation to ensure high-performance Al models.
Deployment and Maintenance: Deploy and maintain Al models in production environments, ensuring their reliability and scalability.
Monitoring and Optimization: Monitor and optimize the performance of Al models and AWS resources.
Stay Current: Stay up-to-date with the latest trends and advancements in Al and AWS technologies.
Documentation and Reporting: Document Al solutions and processes and communicate findings and recommendations to stakeholders.
listJob.jobExperience:
Skills
Proven experience (3+ years) as an Al Engineer, with a focus on AWS cloud technologies, and experience and knowledge on Microsoft Azure Al technology is a plus.
Extensive hands-on experience with AWS services such as Amazon Bedrock, Amazon SageMaker, Amazon Redshift, Amazon EMR, Amazon Kinesis, AWS Glue, etc
Proficiency in programming languages such as Python, R, or Java, node.js, and experience with data manipulation and transformation
Strong understanding of machine learning frameworks and libraries (e.g., TensorFlow, PyTorch, Scikit-learn).
Knowledge of data preprocessing, feature engineering, and model evaluation techniques. ‚Ä¢ Experience in graph database query interface (e.g. Neo4J, Apache Gremlin)
Experience in implement projects with Gen Al Foundation Models, ML Ops, RAG, Vector Database
Knowledge of Graph RAG, LLMOps Lifecycle, vector database maintenance is a plus Knowledge of LLM Engineering (e.g. chunking, embedding, prompt management, Observability, debugging)
Good understanding of data modeling, ETL processes, data warehousing, and data governance principles.
Familiarity with DevOps practices and tools for CI/CD in AWS environments.
Excellent problem-solving skills with the ability to design and implement creative solutions for complex data challenges.
Knowledge of data governance and compliance standards.
Strong communication skills to effectively collaborate with technical and non-technical teams.
Proven ability to work independently and manage multiple priorities effectively. Experience in Kubernetes (k8s), containerise applications, CSI persistent, and deploy application in k8s environments is a plus
Education and Certification
Bachelors or associate degree in IT discipline
Certification in AWS Certified: Al Practitioner or AWS Certified: Machine Learning Engineer is added advantage.
What we need to see from you
Report to development team lead.
Confident in communicating with teammates from diverse backgrounds in English.
Work within agile team to develop and test Al platform / application / model.
Design, develop, and unit test applications in accordance with established standards.
Assist developers)/project team in analyzing and resolving technical issues.
Assist in preparing manuals, specification and other technical documentations.
Package and support deployment releases.
Developing, refining, and tuning integrations between applications.
Assisting in the collection and documentation of user's requirements, development of user stories, and estimates
listJob.privilege:
Competitive and attractive salary, commensurate with skills and experience.
Work in a dynamic, professional, and friendly environment.
Participate in training courses to enhance professional skills.
Opportunities for career advancement and development.
Participate in team-building activities and annual vacation trips.

The ideal candidate will have a good background in PHP programming, expertise in popular e-commerce platforms such as Shopify, BigCommerce, WooCommerce, Magento, and a solid understanding of web development best practices.
