 Role Description
As an Integration Engineer, you'll be responsible for implementing and maintaining mission-critical integrations between the Company's platform and their customers' manufacturing systems. Working directly with global manufacturers, you'll ensure our solutions seamlessly integrate into their production environments while meeting stringent reliability and performance requirements.
 Key Mission for this Role:
Own the integration points on the factory floor. As a startup, we have to move fast. Yet, it's essential that our customers and their factory counterparts can confidently deploy our systems to high-stakes production lines. In this role, you will write clean, performant, maintainable integration code that directly integrates the Company's platform with customer systems.
Highly organized, ability to juggle multiple priorities. Integration engineers will juggle multiple client projects simultaneously while debugging factory floor issues remotely. You'll need to work closely with the project management team to reassess priorities while ensuring we meet our customer's production schedules.
Be a helpful teammate. This isn't a solo job. You'll need to work closely with our Edge Platform & Applications team, technical project managers, and often, directly with customers. Clear, direct communication is highly valued and required.

listJob.location: T·∫ßng 2, S·ªë 799 Nguy·ªÖn VƒÉn Linh, Ph∆∞·ªùng T√¢n Ph√∫, Qu·∫≠n 7, TP H·ªì Ch√≠ Minh
listJob.description:
AROBID is a global B2B e-commerce and online trade exhibition ecosystem which brings Vietnam enterprises expanding locally and globally to meet with millions of enterprise buyers from 15 countries (China, Korea, Japan, Thailand, India, USA and EU).
Roles:
Play a key role in web and mobile development of Arobid - the new leading B2B digital ecosystem of e-commerce, global online expo and conference, data intelligence and CSR for global market
Develop platforms which are not only functional, bug-free, but also with high user experience, SEO-optimized, performance and security.
Ensure the platform capability of maintainability, reliability, and extendability of the deliverables.
Participating effectively in our Agile/SCRUM process, in software architecture design, deliverable sprints, code reviews and enhancements with the team, etc. as well as proposing new alternatives to existing tech and design solutions.
Contribute to strong engineering team culture, collaboration and high accountability.
listJob.jobExperience:
At least 5+ years in high performance and user experience web applications with NextJS or ReactJS.
Strong with SEO optimization, UX, Scalability, clean code, security 
Familiar with tools like Figma, Git,...
A big plus if experienced with complex web business or commerce platforms.
Solid grasp on good software engineering practices such as code reviews, deep focus on quality and documentation.
Knowledgeable of cyber security and data privacy.
Great team spirit and solution-oriented attitude,
listJob.privilege:
Unique benefits:
Join a strong winning-spirit team of creating new business platforms for Vietnam and SEA.
Human centricity environment, focusing on collaboration and success.
Social insurance coverage upon signing your employment contract.
Generous leave policy: 12 annual leave days plus all Vietnamese public holidays.
13th-month salary (applicable from the probationary period).
Company-provided equipment.
Well-stocked pantry: tea, coffee, snacks, microwave, etc.
Engaging company activities: Company trips, team-building events, regular internal events (including live music performances!), and access to company-sponsored badminton courts.
Core Values:
Autonomy: Arobid have dedicated and detailed process to help makes everything simple and convenient on our platform
Responsibility: Arobid is here to support, assist, and help our users at all times of need. Arobid vow on conducting proper business decisions, valuing moral and ethics.
Open-mindedness: Arobid understands, accepts, and values feedback. Aiming to be better and accept new directions, always ready for changes and improvements when needed.
Boldness: Arobid is willing to take risks, be different, and do whatever it takes to provide the best service for our users.
Innovation: Arobid applies new technologies and new methods to help provide convenient and seamless user experience. Arobid have been and will continue to add new features and innovations.
Devotion: Arobid will always deliver above and beyond expectations, providing users with assistance whenever they need.

listJob.name: DevOps Engineer (AWS, K8s, CI/CD)
listJob.location: The Grace Tower, Qu·∫≠n 7, TP H·ªì Ch√≠ Minh
listJob.description:
Want to be on the deployment, automation, and maintenance for B2B software solutions in e-commerce logistics?
Parcel Perform is looking for an amazing team member to support us in Software engineering!
 You have hands-on DevOps skills, 3+ years of experience in back-end and/or DBOps might help, you‚Äôre technically savvy and have a good grasp on coding techniques? Are you also interested in e-commerce and like to take on new challenges? Help us drive Parcel Perform‚Äôs growth and join our team! We are looking for you!
 WE NEED YOU ON OUR TEAM!
Our infrastructure team is responsible for the foundation on which other engineering teams build Parcel Perform‚Äôs suite of SaaS products. As a member of the team, you will:
  Work with other engineering teams to design, build and operate cloud-based infrastructures that meet their needs.
Design and conduct reliability tests. Carry out capacity planning. Identify performance bottlenecks and optimize systems‚Äô performance.
Manage production incidents, investigate, analyze root causes, resolve issues and build up prevention mechanisms.
Build internal tools and automation systems that improve engineering productivity, efficiency, and quality. For example efficient CI/CD pipelines, self-service observability tools, code quality checkers. Define workflows, conventions, best practices. Guide other engineers on how to use these tools effectively.
listJob.jobExperience:
We at Parcel Perform believe in innovation, energy, and resourcefulness for everything we do. We will not stop delivering an outstanding product that we can be proud of and need you to help us to inform the world. You would be a good fit if the followings describe you:
  You are curious about how complex systems work. You are eager to open up abstraction levels lower than what a typical backend engineer is comfortable with.
You keep yourself up-to-date on technical trends. You are eager to explore new technologies but are careful in evaluating their merits and tradeoffs based on sound principles rather than hearsay.
You believe that good tooling and automation systems play a crucial role in an engineering-heavy organization. You like to identify drawbacks of existing, off-the-shelf tools, and to build custom solutions to rectify their deficiencies.
You have the habit of thinking and communicating both qualitatively and quantitatively. You tend to make data-driven decisions and clearly articulate them. You value simple but well-documented solutions over clever but opaque systems.
 YOUR SKILLS AND EXPERIENCE
  3+ years of hands-on experience with cloud-based infrastructures (AWS, GCP, or Azure) either at the position of DevOps, CloudOps, Reliability Engineer, Performance Engineer, System Engineer, or Backend Developer.
Good service-oriented mindset: the system is your product, and the developers are your customers.
Ability to evaluate tradeoffs involved with various cloud services.
Comfortability writing Bash/Python for ad-hoc automation tasks. Familiarity with infrastructure-as-code practices and tools.
Fluency with common Unix's administrative tools and administration tasks.
Good grasp of common network protocols: TCP/IP, TLS, HTTP, SSH... Basic understanding of Linux‚Äôs internals. For example process scheduling, memory management, IO mechanisms.
A clear understanding of different types of storage systems, and their respective trade-offs.
Good English communication.
listJob.privilege:
We at Parcel Perform are dedicated to being a platform for growth for all our team members, regardless of function and location.
The opportunity to work in a fast-growing, super exciting, and innovative business that will revolutionize the e-commerce logistics industry. You will be the needle of success on the growth of a global product that will become a key platform behind successful e-commerce logistics worldwide.
The ability to continuously learn and develop in an international setting with you is a critical driver behind our success in achieving our mission.
An environment where everybody never stops growing and focuses on succeeding - we continuously work with you on your strengths and weaknesses across many important dimensions and look at ways for you to address them and further your development.
Your entry ticket into being part of the Parcel Perform journey, where you will work with and alongside people worldwide who share the same passion and dedication.
You will also get:
The competitive compensation package, and a preference for internal promotions.
Laptop support program.
Unlimited leave plan.
Flexible working hours, and an open environment. Work from Home is available by request.
Premium insurance and annual medical checkups.
Free lunch, free fruit, and snacks are provided.
Weekly 1-1 catch-up for career development, team bonding events, and various training programs.
Opportunities to work alongside people worldwide who share the same passion and dedication.

listJob.location: 131 Xo Viet Nghe Tinh 17 Ward, Qu·∫≠n B√¨nh Th·∫°nh, TP H·ªì Ch√≠ Minh
listJob.description:
We are looking for a full-stack web developer to join our team with NodeJS/ReactJS experience with a strong background in API design, databases, performance, scalability, security, etc.
 Location: Ho Chi Minh, Da Nang, Hanoi
 What You‚Äôll Be Doing
Working on Web and Mobile products for a diverse range of clients and industries.
Working and pair programming with other developers to build applications with Node.js and ReactJS.
Designing & implementing back-end API using Node.JS
Working with the Product Owner to convert business requirements into technical designs.
Cooperating with UI designers to implement modern minimalist designs into production.
Applying proven technologies and best practices to level up your technical skills: NestJS, Redux
Learning new languages and frameworks to improve yourself and stay current in an ever-changing environment.
listJob.jobExperience:
Must have
A minimum of 4 years of experience with backend software development is required, preferably with Node.JS.
A minimum of 3 years of experience with frontend software development is required, preferably with ReactJS or similar software such as Svelte, VueJS, or AngularJS.
Relevant knowledge of relational database systems such as MySQL, PostgreSQL, and SQL Server is required.
Experience with Extreme Programming methodologies such as Test-Driven Development, Refactoring, and Continuous Integration.
Experience with Agile Process and Scrum Methodologies.
Experience leading project teams throughout the project life cycle.
Excellent written and verbal communication skills in English.
Nice to have
Experience with serverless architecture, e.g., AWS Lambda, GCP Cloud Function, etc.
Experience with security, performance, and scalability.
Experience with NoSQL and Message Queue.
listJob.privilege:
Who We Are
CodeLink is an innovative and design-focused development agency. We focus on user-centric design and agile development to bring the product vision of our clients to life. We handle the end-to-end development of products, developing the product vision through product understanding, designing experiences through UX design, refining these flows with modern UI design, and developing products through iterative agile development.
We work with both early-stage product teams and teams with existing products from a wide range of countries and industries. We focus on modern technologies and work directly with our clients. We design using design-thinking principles on tools such as Sketch, Figma, Zeplin, and more, and develop products leveraging our tech stack of React, React Native, Rails, Python, and Node.JS.
Our Core Values
1. Take full ownership of delivery
We take ownership of our client projects and ensure that we deliver what we are in charge of to the best possible outcome.
2. Deliver our highest level of quality
We take pride in the high quality that we deliver and work at a sustainable pace to ensure we can always deliver on that quality.
3. Stay consistent in plans and processes
We keep open and transparent communication with our teammates and our client whilst following agile development practices.
4. Have empathy for all those we work with
We show empathy and respect to all those we work with to gain a deeper understanding without any judgment or assumption.
5. Continuously improve and grow
We aim high with a growth mindset and see every day as an opportunity to develop ourselves, our processes, and our products.
Top 3 Reasons To Join Us
Use cutting-edge & proven technologies
Work directly with international clients
Open environment with a focus on learning
Why You‚Äôll Love Working With Us
We work hand-in-hand with our clients to fully invest in their product development and build solutions together for their target market.
We fully invest in our team, we will help you build yourself up in any area you feel you need development, be it in English, learning a new design tool, developing your design thinking, and more. We want to make sure that you‚Äôre always learning and developing yourself whilst a part of our team.
We respect both Product and Technology equally, ensuring all of the Products we work on have features with true market potential and ensuring all of the team contribute to, understand, and believe in what they are developing.
We are very selective with our clients, we only work on awesome products we believe in and that show strong market potential.
We respect you and your personal hours, we keep a sustainable pace by working standard 8 hour days from Monday to Friday, ensuring we only plan for what we can achieve.
We are fully agile and only work with Clients who work the same, working with set sprint goals and working at our rate of velocity.
You will have ownership over your role, giving you the opportunity to experiment and try new processes to better improve your day-to-day responsibilities. We are always open to improving our processes.
Company Benefits
An open and dynamic working environment with no dress code and the freedom to be yourself.
Modern open-space office with comfortable workspace, a PS4 games room, and chill-out areas.
Salary review twice a year with opportunities for promotions and spot awards.
Yearly Training Budget up to 5 million VND per staff.
Culture of recognition with monthly rewards for those with the most kudos.
All office benefits and full salary during probation.
Flexible starting time up to 10 AM working Monday - Friday with no overtime and a long lunch break.
Two days remote every week taken on any days you choose so you can work from wherever you like.
Full Vietnamese holidays off with 12 annual leave days per year with all days not taken paid out in cash.
Yearly company trip, monthly team all-hands activities, welcome lunches for new members, the monthly budget for team celebrations.
Celebrations for special days in the year, such as Women‚Äôs Day, YEP, Christmas.
Gold level Health Insurance coverage from Bao Viet Insurance and a yearly complete Health Check.
Employee-led clubs within the company; games teams, sports teams, etc.
Buddy system, tech, and product talks, mentoring, and paid-for training for any skills you‚Äôd like to develop.
Weekly agile sessions and professional coaching.
Meal allowance, parking allowance, petrol allowance, and unlimited snacks and coffee every day.
Options for a full MAC or PC set-up are completely provided.
Where We Work
HCMC Head Office: Level 8, Vina Building, 131 Xo Viet Nghe Tinh, Ward 17, Binh Thanh District, HCMC
Hanoi Office: Ba Dinh District, Ha Noi City
Da Nang Office: Hai Chau District, Da Nang City

listJob.name: Senior DevOps Engineer (Cloud/ AWS)
listJob.location: 33/26 ƒê∆∞·ªùng s·ªë 9, Ph∆∞·ªùng An Kh√°nh, Th√†nh ph·ªë Th·ªß ƒê·ª©c, TP H·ªì Ch√≠ Minh
listJob.description:
We are seeking a skilled DevOps Engineer to join our team and play a critical role in building, managing, and maintaining our cloud infrastructure. The ideal candidate will have hands-on experience with deploying and managing scalable systems, ensuring optimal system performance, and supporting development teams in feature deployment and issue resolution. This role is focused on implementation and execution rather than design, making it ideal for someone who thrives in a hands-on, practical environment.
About PAVE - A product of Discovery Loft
PAVE üîßüöóis an innovative automotive technology company transforming the way the world inspects vehicles. Powered by Intelligent Damage Detection capabilities, PAVE enables anyone with a smartphone to complete a guided vehicle inspection simply by taking photos of their car.
Headquartered in Toronto, our team brings deep expertise from both the automotive and technology industries, blending the best of artificial intelligence and automotive intelligence.
For more information, visit pave.ai.
What We‚Äôd Love From You
Be open minded to things you do not know,  consistently learn  and grow the skills necessary for the job Be ready to adjust and implement new plans in a fast paced environment Be confident and responsible; responsible down to a single line of code. 
Always be working on self improvement; willing to review your progress and see how you can make it better 
Getting the job done is a priority. 
Have good sportsmanship and be competitive; we have structured the responsibilities to be somewhat like a game! 
Be respectful and helpful to others and your working environment
Treat yourself well and save the Earth.
Be motivated, creative and passionate - it will ignite the rest!
Responsibilities
Cloud Infrastructure Management: Build, manage, and maintain infrastructure on AWS and Google Cloud to ensure scalability, reliability, and security.
CI/CD Pipeline Implementation: Develop and manage CI/CD pipelines to streamline application deployment processes.
Deployment Support: Collaborate with development teams to deploy new features, bug fixes, and system updates efficiently and reliably.
Monitoring and Troubleshooting:
Set up and manage monitoring tools like Prometheus and Grafana to track system health and performance.
Troubleshoot and resolve system issues to ensure high availability and security.
Logging and Reporting: Implement and manage logging solutions to ensure effective incident tracking and resolution.
Domain Management: Manage and configure domains, ensuring smooth integration with infrastructure and services.
Infrastructure as Code (IaC):
Use Terraform extensively to automate infrastructure setup and management.
Maintain and update existing IaC configurations.
Security and Compliance:
Ensure infrastructure and deployments align with security best practices.
Monitor and respond to infrastructure vulnerabilities, incidents, and risks.
Assist in implementing and maintaining compliance with security standards (e.g., ISO 27001, SOC 2, GDPR).
Engage in Agile/Scrum practices and participate in sprint planning, retrospectives, and daily stand-ups
listJob.jobExperience:
Strong hands-on experience with AWS and Google Cloud platforms.
Proficient in managing Kubernetes environments.
Extensive experience with Terraform for infrastructure automation.
Proven experience in setting up and managing Prometheus, Grafana, and similar monitoring and logging tools.
Basic understanding of vulnerability scanning, logging, and monitoring tools (e.g., Snyk, ELK, Prometheus).
Knowledge of network and application security concepts, including firewalls, IAM, and secure API design.
Familiarity with CI/CD practices and tools.
Strong understanding of system troubleshooting, performance tuning, and security best practices.
Ability to collaborate with security and development teams to integrate security into the development lifecycle.
Preferred Qualifications:
Experience with logging tools like ELK Stack or CloudWatch.
Knowledge of additional Infrastructure as Code tools or monitoring solutions.
Certifications in AWS or Google Cloud are a plus.
Education: Bachelor‚Äôs degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or a related field, or equivalent practical experience.
Soft Skills:
Strong problem-solving and decision-making abilities.
Excellent communication and interpersonal skills.
High adaptability in a fast-paced, dynamic environment.
Education: Bachelor‚Äôs degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or a related field, or equivalent practical experience.

listJob.description:
Position Summary:
We are seeking an experienced Senior Tech Lead to join our dynamic team. In this critical role, you will lead a team of talented software engineers, working closely with the CTO to drive the development of secure, high-quality web applications. The ideal candidate will have a strong background in Java or Python, React, and a proven track record of leading engineering teams. Proficiency in English and Vietnamese is essential, as you will be leading cross-functional teams and collaborating with stakeholders across the company.
Responsibilities:
Lead and mentor a team of software engineers, fostering a collaborative and high-performing work environment.

Ensure the team's adherence to best practices in software development, including code quality, testing, and documentation.
Drive the full software development lifecycle, including requirements gathering, design, implementation, testing, and deployment.
Collaborate with product managers, designers, and other stakeholders to deliver innovative solutions that meet business needs.

Troubleshoot and resolve complex technical issues, ensuring the reliability, performance, and security of applications.
Stay up-to-date with emerging technologies and industry trends, recommending improvements and best practices.
Manage project timelines, track progress, and ensure the timely delivery of high-quality software.
Communicate effectively in English and Vietnamese, both verbally and in writing, with team members, stakeholders, and external partners.

Description
SEADEV is a product company that delivers effective, affordable sales and digital marketing solutions to our clients. We measure our success not only in terms of profit, but also in terms of global spiritual impact. As a company, we seek to care for our team members and bring transformation to lives in our community. Over the next 10 years we are laser focused on achieving our targets of growing our business 10-fold, supporting over 500 jobs in 10 developing markets, while positively transforming the communities we work within by giving financially and volunteering our time. 
 JOB OVERVIEW
The C# Developer will join the team and report directly to the Product Manager. is the primary product of Seadev over the past four years, with a mission to develop cutting-edge sales and digital marketing solutions that help Shed and Carport businesses grow in the North American market.
 As a C# Developer, you will be responsible for maintaining and enhancing ShedPro‚Äôs Sales and Operations Hub (Ops Hub) application. The Ops Hub is a powerful, web-based platform that enables shed businesses to receive and manage quote requests, convert them into cash sales orders or Rent-to-Own (RTO) sales contracts, oversee the production process, and assign delivery schedules.
 This in-house role involves taking over the development and maintenance of the Ops Hub from our current US based development partner, driving new feature development, and ensuring seamless performance and scalability of the software.

Experience in Web3 product development or working on decentralized applications.
Background in design systems and creating scalable UI frameworks.

Understanding of smart contracts and blockchain protocols.

listJob.name: QC Engineer (Manual + Automation, Tester, QA QC)
listJob.location: No. 53-55-57, Pho Duc Chinh street, Nguyen Thai Binh ward, Qu·∫≠n 1, TP H·ªì Ch√≠ Minh
listJob.description:
We are looking for a QC Engineer (Manual + Automation) to join the LuminSign team at DSV. As a QC Engineer, you will be part of a talented and committed community, passionate about delivering a high-quality experience for our customers.
Responsibilities
As a QC Engineer, you are responsible for:
Review documentation and requirements to determine intended functionality.
Create comprehensive test strategies and plans that cover both manual and automated tests to ensure product quality.
Create and execute manual test cases to assess performance according to product specifications.
Design and implement automation scripts using automation frameworks and tools to increase testing efficiency and coverage.
Work closely with the development team to understand product requirements and ensure that the software meets quality standards before it is deployed.
Conduct system, integration, regression, accessibility, performance, and user acceptance testing to ensure comprehensive software quality.
Support defining the user story acceptance criteria and ensuring stories meet a high level of quality.
Participate in Agile development processes, including attending scrum and sprint planning meetings, to provide feedback and insights.
listJob.jobExperience:
Good candidate for QC Engineer position should have the following qualifications:
Typically have 3+ years of experience in a software testing role, focusing on both manual web and API testing, as well as automation testing.
Understanding of Software Development Life Cycle (SDLC) and Software Testing Life Cycle (STLC).
Good English communication skills (both verbal & written), especially in the global software development environment.
Solid knowledge of testing methodologies covering test levels, static testing, and dynamic testing.
Ability to develop test plans, test cases, and testing reports.
Ability to test web applications across multiple browsers and mobile applications across different devices and operating systems.
Knowledge of API testing tools such as Postman for backend testing.
Experience with automation tools such as Cypress, Selenium, and Appium for web and mobile testing.
Ability to communicate effectively with development teams, project managers, and other stakeholders.
Collaborating with other team members and departments to ensure comprehensive testing coverage.
Ability to work in a dynamic and continuously changing environment.
Nice to have:
ISTQB Certification.
Experience in the E-signature domain.
Familiar with JavaScript (we‚Äôre using it to write e2e).

Are you an experienced software engineer with deep experience building and delivering amazing products?
Do you have high standards when it comes to code quality and user experiences? 
Are you ready to step into the remote work world? 
We are an US based startup, expanding to VN starting with building a local remote development team. Do you want to join us as an early member? 
What are we looking for ?
You need to be able to work independently on NextJS applications and use provided Figma designs. 
You need to be able to design appropriate backend in NestJS and occasionally work on React.

You will take on various tasks at an early stage startup and participate in hiring other engineers for our growing team

listJob.name: Frontend Engineer (ReactJS) - FINTECH
listJob.location: 4th Floor, Block B, Viettel Building, 285 CMT8, Ward 12, District 10, Ho Chi Minh city, Qu·∫≠n 10, TP H·ªì Ch√≠ Minh
listJob.description:
About NAVER and NAVER Vietnam:
NAVER Co., Ltd. is a global brand that provides a range of services, including the largest web search engine in South Korea, the LINE messenger app with over 200 million users worldwide, the SNOW video app, the digital comics platform NAVER WEBTOON, and more. In 2018, NAVER was recognized as the 9th most innovative company in the world by Forbes and was listed as a top 6 Future 50 company by Fortune magazine.
In 2021, NAVER's expansion in Vietnam has been aimed at tapping into the country's growing Information Technology market by initially partnering with two leading universities in Hanoi - HUST and PTIT - to expand the Global AI R&D Belt. This year, the NAVER Vietnam Development Center (NVDC) was established in Ho Chi Minh City, while another center is in the process of being set up in Hanoi. The company continues to uphold the core values of "Autonomy - Challenge - Teamwork" and is dedicated to becoming one of the strongest development centers in Asia.
Additionally, in 2022, NAVER VIETNAM has continued to expand its reach, sponsoring high-quality programming courses for students at UIT and opening a new center called the GWE Webtoon Operation Center to provide top-notch experiences for comics lovers around the world.
We are looking for the Frontend Engineer (JavaScript/ReactJS) in the Ho Chi Minh office.
listJob.jobExperience:
Your daily tasks: 
Develop NAVER Financial Services
Design and implement Frontend services
Implement SSR, CI/CD Monitoring
Co-working with Korean teams
Your background:
Background in computer science and/or engineering
Should have knowledge of advanced ReactJs
Ideally, 4+ years of work experience in frontend to serve large-scale, high-traffic projects and fintech domain
Enjoy discussions about the stability and scalability of Frontend systems;
Good understanding of asynchronous request handling partial page updates, AJAX, NodeJS, SSR
Experience in Data Structure, Algorithm, Distributed Service
Understand the importance of writing highly Maintainable Code, Clean Code
Open-minded, honest and have a positive attitude toward people
Good at communication skills in general and English skills in particular
It‚Äôs a big plus if you:
Ideally, 1+ year of technical lead experience
Have experience in development with Node.js and Next.js
listJob.privilege:
From solid welfare programs to autonomy over working time and place, we create the culture in which we work. By joining NAVER VIETNAM, you will be involved in:
A work-life balance: A-class brand new offices located in the city center with hybrid option (3 days working at the office) and workation option (2 weeks working remotely in a row); Annual leave 14 days, add 1 day to every year.
Competitive income package: Performance appraisal every year, incentive bonus... 
Learning and development opportunities: We provide an annual budget for employees to learn anything related to languages (Korean, English) and technologies & monthly budget for buying any book you want to read. 
Protecting and enhancing healthcare plan for you and your family: We provide premium health insurance for you and 2 family members, a health check every year, and premium gym membership 
Employee engagement activities: You will be involved in a fun and respectful working environment, we support a monthly budget for team engagement
Other benefits: One-off allowance for setting up working from home corner, work dedication bonus

listJob.name: Senior Front-end Developer (ReactJS, English)
listJob.location: The Emporium, 3rd Floor, 184 Le Dai Hanh, Ward 15, District 11, Ho Chi Minh city, Qu·∫≠n 11, TP H·ªì Ch√≠ Minh
listJob.description:
Job description
Frontend development: analyze requirements and implement responsive and interactive web applications using React and modern frontend technologies (e.g., Redux, Webpack, TypeScript).
Collaboration and Agile practices: collaborate with other developers to integrate applications with other systems. Participate in Agile ceremonies (sprints, stand-ups) and contribute to project planning and execution.
Code quality and best practices: write clean and maintainable code following engineering best practices (unit testing, source control, continuous integration, design patterns, etc.). Conduct code reviews and provide feedback to peers.
Performance optimization: optimize web application performance (e.g., code splitting, lazy loading, caching). Conduct performance testing and tuning to ensure fast load times and smooth interactions.
Cross-functional collaboration: collaborate with developers, testers, marketing, product management, and customers to create new solutions, facilitate feedback, and achieve design decisions.
Effort estimation: estimate the level of effort during sprint planning, contribute to the technical roadmap and continuous improvement.
Leadership: assist other team members with design challenges and coding issues; and evaluate their performance.
listJob.jobExperience:
Desired Skills and Experience
3+ years' experience in front-end development and design patterns.
Expert knowledge of React, Redux, TypeScript, JavaScript (ES6+), HTML5, and CSS3. Experience with CSS pre-processors (Sass, Less, Stylus) and post-processors (PostCSS).
Hands-on skills in caching, optimizing and securing front-end applications.
Familiar with task runners and the build process: Webpack / Gulp.
Testing practices: experience with BDD and TDD.
Experience with large SaaS applications (preferably decoupling monoliths) and microservice architecture.
Familiar with source control management: Git
Good communication in English.
Problem-solving skills.
Communication and collaboration skills: able to work independently and in a team environment.
Nice-to-have skills:
Experience in back-end development (preferably with Laravel/Symfony frameworks).
Exposure to working with JSON.
OpenAPI, and Swagger.
Exposure to DevOps practices and AWS landscape.
Exposure to one or more of Solr, Redis, or Elasticsearch.
listJob.privilege:
Attractive salary and bonuses (Annual and Performance Bonus)  
Ensure private healthcare insurance package, yearly medical check-up, support allowance...
Total 23 days of paid annual leave 
High-ownership working environment, challenging projects, on-the-job coaching, and training programs
Great-place-to-work activities (company trips, sports clubs...)
---------
Thank you for your time and enthusiasm in our career opportunities.
Please kindly note that shortlisted candidates will be contacted within 3 weeks of application. Alternatively, we will reach out to you when another suitable chance arises in the future.

Floware is a leader in building innovative software to transform the way people live, play, work, and learn. SKILLS AND EXPERIENCE     
Fundamentals in Object Oriented Programming.
At least 3 years of recent experience on iOS application development.
At least 2 years dedicated Apple Watch development.
Expert in SwiftUI and Swift.
Strong understanding of WatchKit and WatchOS APIs.

listJob.name: Penetration Tester (Security/DevSecOps)
listJob.location: 366 Nguy·ªÖn Tr√£i, Qu·∫≠n 5, TP H·ªì Ch√≠ Minh
listJob.description:
Gene Solutions is a leading company in Vietnam specializing in the research, development and application of the most advanced genetic tests, providing genetic testing services for screening, diagnosis and treatment orientation.
Over the years, Gene Solutions has continuously developed and invested in building a strong and excellent R&D team, focusing on research and application of useful technologies that have been certified in the world to bring latest genetic testing and services, with the best quality at the most affordable cost, increasing Vietnamese people's access to essential genetic tests for prevention, examination and treatment, improving the quality of medical examination and treatment, contributing to the quality of medical services and health for the community. 
RESPONSIBILITIES
The position is based in Ho Chi Minh City. The role will report to the IT Governance & Security Manager, and handle the following responsibilities:
1. Own and conduct end-to-end penetration testing for the Company's systems: 
Perform penetration testing of web/mobile applications, networks, and operating systems. 
Conduct attack exploitation using manual penetration testing (MPT) and automatic tools according to the security test plan and checklist. 
Create a security report and provide applicable recommendations based on the test performed. 
Provide summary reports that will help the board of management team understand the company's security posture. 
2. Join the Incident Response Team: 
Collaborate with other IT teams and user departments to handle information security incidents, analyze application logs, security logs, trace root causes, detect actors, propose solutions to prevent attacks, and develop best practices to enhance security systems. 
3. Participate in the projects: 
External partners for independent security assessment: propose the scope of services; understand and verify the findings in penetration testing projects; etc. 
Security solutions implementation or enhancement projects: analyze and develop security protection requirements; evaluate the proposal; validate the deliveries; etc. 
4. Self-development: 
Research and self-improve on new attack exploitation methods and appropriate security standards. 
Perform other tasks as required by the manager. 
5. Other tasks assigned by superiors.
listJob.jobExperience:
Graduated from a university or higher, majoring in Computer Science, Information Security, or a related field.
2 ‚Äì 4 years of hands-on experience in Web, API, and Mobile Penetration Testing following OWASP standards (e.g., OWASP Top 10, ASVS) and PTES guidelines. Experience in network penetration testing is an advantage.
Strong understanding of web application development and source code review (C#, PHP, JS, ...)
In-depth knowledge of penetration testing tools and common vulnerabilities.
Ability to present the security penetration testing report (in English and Vietnamese) and explain it to the technical team, while ensuring that the summary section is understandable by the business management team.
Honesty, meticulous, careful, enthusiastic and high sense of responsibility at work.
Strong Vietnamese communication skills are essential, along with proficiency in English report writing. Basic verbal communication skills in English are also required.
The candidate possessing any or some of the following expertise is a plus:
Experience in a cyber incident response team.
Ability to develop custom scripts for security testing.
International security certificates such as OSCP, HTB, eJPT etc.
Hands-on practice in environments like HackTheBox, PortSwigger labs, participation in CTFs, or contributions to bug bounty programs.
Proficent English communication skills in both written and spoken.

listJob.name: 05 Senior Data Engineer (Python, MySQL)
listJob.location: 7th floor, Fafilm Building, 6 Thai Van Lung, Ben Nghe, District 1, Qu·∫≠n 1, TP H·ªì Ch√≠ Minh
listJob.description:
Data Modeling and Metrics Development:
Develop and maintain sophisticated data models to support transactional, analytical, and predictive use cases.
Define and compute key metrics such as customer acquisition, operational efficiency, and overall business performance.
Enable stakeholders to create tailored metrics and reports for data-driven decision-making
Analytics Solutions and Data Products:
Design advanced analytics solutions leveraging the data platform to provide actionable business insights.
Build scalable and reusable data products to support cross-functional teams, including marketing, operations, and finance.
Data Mart Management:
Manage and maintain the SAS Data Mart, ensuring the integrity and security of ETL processes and underlying datasets.
Ensure high availability and performance of data marts by optimizing storage and retrieval mechanisms.
Data Quality and Governance:
Implement robust quality assurance processes to monitor and validate data accuracy, completeness, and timeliness.
Develop and enforce data governance policies to maintain high data standards.
Build metadata management systems and a centralized data catalog to enhance data accessibility.
Automation and Process Optimization:
Automate data pipeline processes to enhance operational efficiency and scalability.
Optimize the performance of data transformation and query processes to reduce latency and improve system responsiveness.
Collaboration and Continuous Improvement:
Collaborate with data scientists, business analysts, and other engineers to align technical solutions with business goals.
Stay updated with industry trends and incorporate innovative tools and methodologies into the data ecosystem.
listJob.jobExperience:
4+ years of experience in data engineering, with a strong focus on data modeling and analytics.
Advanced expertise in ETL/ELT pipeline design, data modeling, and metrics computation using tools like Apache Airflow, NiFi, or dbt.
Proficiency in modern data architectures (e.g., Data Lakehouse, Delta Lake, Apache Iceberg).
Advanced SQL skills and experience with data warehouses like BigQuery, Snowflake, or SingleStore.
Proficiency in programming languages such as Python, Java, or Golang.
Strong understanding of data quality monitoring, validation frameworks, and metadata management tools.
Experience with BI tools (e.g., Power BI, Metabase) to design actionable insights dashboards.

listJob.name: Mobile Technical Lead (iOS, Android, Kotlin, Swift)
listJob.location: Level 5 - 6, East Tower, Lumiere Riverside, 277 Vo Nguyen Giap, An Phu Ward, Thu Duc City, HCMC., Th√†nh ph·ªë Th·ªß ƒê·ª©c, TP H·ªì Ch√≠ Minh
listJob.description:
Are you an experienced Mobile Technical Lead looking for your next career move? Do you have a background in design & architecture and development of digital products? If so read on.
 The team:
You will be part of our Digital Delivery Hub who are responsible for designing, developing and maintaining some of the most interesting and innovative digital apps within the financial services space that are at the forefront of the market. Our Hub is focused on building a world class User Experience, Design and Web / Mobile Development team that can work with the business to realise an exciting digital strategy.
 The role:
We are looking for a talented Mobile Technical Lead who still does hands-on development to contribute in the development and execution of an innovative mobile banking solution in Asia. This will include the development of in-country and cross-border solutions across all facets of a mobile banking operation including customer experience and design, developing and implementing new products and services, process engineering and other functional deliverable. Risk management and technology innovation will be essential for your success.
You will be responsible for technically leading and coaching our engineers who work in cross-functional delivery teams to design and build best-of-breed mobile solutions whilst maintaining necessary support for ongoing products.
 Your duties will be to:
Collaborate with our technical leaders to establish a vision for our mobile engineering initiatives.
Design and develop cutting-edge applications for Android and iOS platforms.
Work closely with cross-functional teams to define, design, and deliver new features.
Provide coaching, guidance, and mentorship to mobile developers to facilitate their professional growth.
Work on addressing bugs and improving application performance.
Continuously research, evaluate, and implement innovative technologies to optimize development efficiency.
Participate in the planning process for software development projects, ensuring adherence to quality standards and timely delivery.
Design the architecture for new products and features.
Provide leadership and mentorship to a team of mobile developers, offering guidance and support to achieve individual objectives and deliver high-quality code.
listJob.jobExperience:
Technical Skills:
6+ years of experience in Mobile Development.
2+ years of experience as a Mobile Development Team Leader.
Proven expertise in either iOS (SwiftUI and UIKit) or Android (Kotlin) development. While proficiency in both platforms is not mandatory, it will be a plus.
Experience working on various mobile apps, preferably large-scale applications with multi-country targets.
Experience with modern mobile architecture.
Having experience in KMP(Kotlin Multiplatform) development is a big plus.
Familiarity with backend development technologies (E.g. APIs and databases)
Experience with continuous integration and continuous delivery/continuous deployment.
Experience with Modularization and code artifact management
 Soft skills:
Excellent communication and teamwork abilities.
Excellent problem-solving and analytical skills.
Strong willingness to learn new practices and technologies.
Exceptional interpersonal skills, including facilitation and negotiation.
Understanding and experience of Agile methodology.
Experience in working across several technical domains with the ability to ‚Äòdeep dive‚Äô where required and ensure correct solutions are implemented.
Ability to translate technical talk to the business.
Ability to deliver convincing presentations that provide significant insight and generate consensus and buy-in.
Experience managing and leading a development team.
listJob.privilege:
You‚Äôll love working with us if you are:
Passionate about technology.
Independent but also a good team player.
Comfortable with a high degree of ambiguity.
Focused on usability and speed.
Keen on presenting your ideas to your peers and management.
At TYME, opportunities are here for the taking. If you want to be part of our purpose and live and lead through our values, we can offer exciting development opportunities through expanded lateral roles, stretch assignments, or people leadership.
Some of our benefits:
Meal and parking allowances are covered by the company.
Full benefits and salary rank during probation.
Insurances such as Vietnamese labor law and premium health care for you and your family.
SMART goals and clear career opportunities (technical seminar, conference, and career talk) - we focus on your development.

Our team is responsible for creating a brand of new digital financial platforms and apps that are highly reliable and scalable using modern engineering practices. You will be joining a project with talented software engineers in our Digital Bank Build team who are responsible for designing, building, and maintaining the new digital banking platform and the customer channels. As part of the team, you will be responsible for implementing software features, being involved in technical designs, and writing tests to ensure the high-quality delivery of the product. listJob.description:
FuelCloud is simplifying the way people manage fuel and get the most out of their fleets. We are building the future of fueling with products that help our customer's monitor and control access to their fuel and energy. We‚Äôre growing rapidly and have big plans for the future.

We believe the most valuable thing we offer our customers is the quality of our team, and our commitment to creating a great user experience. We have beautiful office in the Sala district in Ho Chi Minh City Vietnam with our headquarters located in Hillsboro, Oregon USA.  We have a great culture that encourages career growth as well as friendships and we can‚Äôt wait to add more people to the mix!
 Job Summary
We are looking for a Senior Automation Quality Control Engineer to lead the development and execution of automated testing frameworks for mobile applications (native and Flutter) and web platforms (frontend and backend). The ideal candidate ensures commitments are realistic, understands priority and urgency, and delivers results accordingly. They proactively anticipate and communicate blockers, delays, and risks to cost or timeline before they require escalation. Strong English communication skills and an ability to manage expectations effectively within the team are critical. Knowledge of embedded systems testing is an advantage.

Key Responsibilities
Automation Development:
- Develop and maintain robust automation frameworks for mobile and web applications. 
- Understanding the embedded domain is a big plus.

Proactive Communication:

Documentation and Reporting:

listJob.description:
About the role
We are seeking a talented Data Engineer to design, build, and maintain our robust data platform. In this role, you will be responsible for developing scalable data integration solutions that combine data from various sources including relational databases, NoSQL databases, third-party APIs, and other data sources. This platform serves as the foundation for our data-driven decision-making process, enabling the organization to make faster and more informed business decisions.
As a Senior Data Engineer, you will work closely with cross-functional teams including data analysts, product managers, business development managers, finance teams, and other business teams to understand their data needs and deliver high-quality data solutions. Your expertise will be crucial in ensuring data reliability, accessibility, and maintaining data governance standards across the organization.
 This role reports directly to the Engineering Manager.
 What you‚Äôll do
Design, implement, and maintain robust and scalable data platform architecture that ensures high availability, fault tolerance, and optimal performance.
Develop and maintain automated data pipelines to streamline data delivery processes, reducing time-to-insight for stakeholders and increasing operational efficiency.
Implement comprehensive testing strategies, including functional and unit tests, to ensure data pipeline reliability and data quality.
Drive continuous improvement initiatives by identifying and implementing process enhancements: automating manual workflows, optimizing data delivery mechanisms, and re-architecting infrastructure for enhanced scalability.
Architect and implement infrastructure optimized for data extraction, transformation, and loading from diverse data sources, leveraging AWS and GCP cloud technologies and services.
Develop sophisticated analytics solutions and data products that leverage our data platform to provide actionable business insights, focusing on key metrics such as customer acquisition, operational efficiency, and business performance.
Collaborate effectively with cross-functional teams including Executive leadership, Engineering, Product, Data, and Design teams to address technical challenges and support their data infrastructure requirements.
Ensure data security and compliance with privacy regulations and healthcare standards through proper data governance.
listJob.jobExperience:
Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Statistics, Information Systems, or related field with minimum 3 years of experience in Data Engineering.
Strong written and verbal communication skills in English.
Proven expertise in building production-grade data pipelines using GCP and/or AWS services.
Strong experience with stream processing technologies, particularly Apache Spark or Apache Beam with Google Cloud Dataflow.
Advanced proficiency in SQL and extensive experience with relational databases, including PostgreSQL and MySQL.
Demonstrated experience with Google BigQuery and data warehouse concepts.
Hands-on experience building and maintaining data lakes using Hadoop ecosystem and columnar storage formats (Parquet, ORC).
Strong programming skills in Python, Java, or Scala.
Proven track record in writing automated tests (unit tests, integration tests) to ensure code reliability.
Demonstrated ability to design and implement maintainable, robust, and flexible code following software engineering best practices.
Exceptional problem-solving and analytical capabilities.
Outstanding written and verbal communication skills with the ability to effectively collaborate with stakeholders at all levels.
You‚Äôll Stand Out Among the Others with These
Experience in implementing data governance and security best practices.
Track record of delivering scalable data solutions in fast-paced environments.
Proven ability to mentor junior engineers and contribute to the team's technical growth.
Experience with data modeling and optimization techniques.
Knowledge of modern data architecture patterns and best practices.
Experience with test-driven development (TDD) and continuous integration/continuous deployment (CI/CD) practices.

About the team
The AI team at Doctor Anywhere (DA) has the responsibility to deliver the value of AI products to the users and patients across the SEA region. The team‚Äôs core mission is to innovate through AI that will simplify how health care service is offered to the patients as well as improving the patient journey experience. This team works closely with product managers, software engineers, designers, and relevant business functions to develop a deep understanding of how the products can be developed and delivered.
About the role
We‚Äôre seeking an enthusiastic and self-motivated Senior/AI Engineer to build a scalable AI/ML system that will impact millions of Doctor Anywhere‚Äôs users and patients. You enjoy working in a cross-functional environment, collaborating with product managers, software engineers, designers, data analytics, data engineers, and business stakeholders.
What you‚Äôll do in this role:
Design, develop and maintain scalable and resilient AI/ML products, e.g. recommendations system & personalization, chatbot, search, forecasting, etc. You are responsible for end-to-end machine learning product life cycle, i.e. EDA, experimentation, model development, productionisation, evaluation, automation with CI/CD pipeline, and A/B testing.
Apply technical expertise with quantitative analysis, experimentation, data mining, and the presentation of data to develop strategies for our machine learning products that serve millions of DA users and businesses.
Work with large and complex data sets to solve a wide range of challenging health care problems using different analytical, statistical, and machine learning algorithms.
Identify and measure success of machine learning product efforts through goal setting, and monitoring of key metrics to understand trends.
Identify, understand, and test opportunities and levers to improve the solutions, and drive initiatives through your insights and recommendations.
Develop & conduct best practices in the AI team.
Partner with product, engineering, analytics, business, and cross-functional teams to inform, influence, support, and execute AI initiatives.
Responsible for maintaining the health of uptime SLA of the service.

About Doctor Anywhere
Doctor Anywhere (DA) is a regional tech-enabled, omnichannel healthcare provider delivering care to 2.5 million users across 6 countries in Southeast Asia. Founded in 2017 with a mission to make healthcare simple, accessible, and efficient for all, DA leverages technology to enable individuals towards preventive, long-term health via holistic offerings including our telehealth app, physical clinics and pharmacies, mental wellness, specialist consults, and also an online health & wellness marketplace for supplements, healthy snacks, home-based health screening and vaccinations.
DA‚Äôs goal is to build a regional digital healthcare ecosystem, advanced by the 3,000 GPs and specialists within our regional network, over 1,000 corporate organisations, and 25 regional insurers we work with. Grounded in our motto ‚ÄúKeep Going, Keep Growing‚Äù, our team strives towards excellence, with innovation and collaboration at our core, and values diversity in perspectives brought by every member.  4. Policy and Process Development:

Work with cross-functional teams to integrate compliance practices into operational processes. 
Provide recommendations for process improvements to strengthen IT controls. 
 5. Training and Awareness:

Promote a culture of compliance and continuous improvement across the organization.

listJob.description:
About IT Risk Assurance:
Our focus is on creating effective and efficient design for the most important business, security and compliance processes for our clients. We touch on aspects of application security and areas prone to fraud and financial misstatement, and
streamline processes that are part of our clients‚Äô core businesses so they can get higher returns on key. Using innovative and proprietary technologies, we help to bridge the gap between business stakeholders, compliance functions and IT teams to assist their understanding of how to embrace new ways of working, while limiting their financial and operational risk profiles. We use knowledge of financial system design, risk mitigation, business process design, data integrity, security and use of data analytics.
 Responsibilities:
‚Ä¢ Perform IT audits for systems that generate financial statements and IT security assessments
‚Ä¢ Work with a range of ERP and IS/IT system environments such as SAP, Oracle, Dynamics and other infrastructures such as Unix/Windows operating systems, Oracle/SQL databases and Cisco/Juniper/Checkpoint firewall systems
‚Ä¢ Apply digital solutions and technology such as Alteryx, SQL, ACL, RPA and Python etc.
‚Ä¢ Support Managers in delivering IT audit assignments against established methodologies, frameworks and global best practices
‚Ä¢ Support Managers in delivering ERP project implementation and controls optimisation assignments, in designing and delivering digital solutions to solve client or audit challenges, and in delivering IT or cybersecurity control reviews‚Ä¢ Support
Managers in developing businesses, including in the preparation of proposals for tender
‚Ä¢ Participate in projects on IT controls and risk management advisory
‚Ä¢ Develop and model data analytics or computer assisted audit techniques (CAATs) to solve client problems and help Managers to drive changes in the delivery of the firm‚Äôs assurance and advisory services
 What you can gain working in IT Risk Assurance:
A career within PwC Vietnam‚Äôs Information Technology Risk Assurance Services will provide you with the opportunity to develop and apply technologies that help clients to enhance efficiencies, get higher returns on investment and mitigate risks.
listJob.jobExperience:
Requirements:
‚Ä¢ Experience in IT controls, or risk management, accounting or business processes, or system implementation, or IT project assurance
‚Ä¢ Experience in ERP reviews, audits or implementation or advisory roles in areas such as SAP, Oracle, JDE, Dynamics or Peoplesoft will be an advantage
‚Ä¢ Intermediate coding experiences or use of data technology such as SQL, Alteryx, Celonis, Power BI or Python will be an advantage
‚Ä¢ Good interpersonal skills and reasonable command of English and Vietnamese languages

Join our Cloud Consulting Services team, which is responsible for supporting the app teams in automating and streamlining the provisioning of Iaas, Paas and Database services across Azure, AWS. We embrace an Agile mindset, fostering a culture of collaboration, adaptability, and continuous improvement. As part of this role, you will work within Scrum practices, play a key part in risk, and change management processes to deliver high-quality cloud solutions efficiently and effectively. Our goal is providing a seamless multi-cloud experience, enabling the application teams to adopt cloud technologies efficiently while ensuring compliance with internal policies and industry standards
 Key Responsibilities
Cloud Infrastructure Development:
Design, develop, provision, and maintain cloud resources using Infrastructure as Code (IaC) tools (e.g., Terraform)
Ensure automated infrastructure provisioning for Azure, AWS Environments complies with NAB standards and security controls.
Performance regular patching, update, and security assessments on current project.
Database Services Management:
Provision and maintain cloud-based database services such as Azure SQL, PostgreSQL DB Flexi, AWS RDS‚Ä¶
Perform regular security assessments and updates on database services
Collaborate with database administrators to implement best practices for performance, security, and scalability
Selecting appropriate tools for data migration and migrating data between database systems
Agile and Scrum Practices:
Participate in Scrum ceremonies, including sprint planning, daily stand-ups, sprint reviews, and retrospectives
Foster and Agile mindset within the team, encouraging continuous learning and iterative delivery
Collaborate with the Scrum Master and Engineer Manager to ensure project timelines, goals and deliverables are met.
Risk and Chang management:
Identify, assess, and manage risks associated with cloud Infrastructure and database operations
Proactively plan and implement changes to cloud environments, minimizing disruptions and ensuring business continuity
Maintain documentation and communication channels to track and address change impacts effectively
Security and Compliance:
Conduct Security reviews and vulnerability assessment for cloud resources, including database
Ensure compliance with corporate policies and regulatory requirements for cloud-hosted resources and data
Operational Excellence:
Monitor, Patch, and resolve defect in IaC environments
Create documentation and processes for effective management of cloud and database resources
Collaborate across teams to align cloud infrastructure with business goals and IT strategies
Innovation and Collaboration:
Keep pace with emerging cloud technologies and market trends
Work closely with cross-functional stakeholders to integrate security, networking, and architecture requirements into the service delivery lifecycle

Experience with database platform like Azure SQL, PostgreSQL Flexi, AWS RDS, or similar services
Familiarity with Linux operating systems and their administration
Strong awareness of hardware systems, including servers, storage and networking, DNS devices / services.

listJob.privilege:
At Thoughtworks, we believe technology can be a powerful force for good. That's why our purpose is to create an extraordinary impact on the world through our culture and technology excellence. This isn't just a slogan, it's the core principle guiding every decision we make. 
 We achieve this through a relentless pursuit of excellence and a culture built around these five core values:
  Be an awesome partner for clients and their ambitious missions: We believe in building strong, collaborative relationships with our clients, helping them achieve their most ambitious goals.
  Revolutionize the technology industry: We're constantly pushing boundaries and innovating, aiming to make a lasting impact on the entire tech landscape.
  Amplify positive social change and advocate for an equitable tech future: Technology should be a force for good. We actively promote positive social change and fight for an inclusive and equitable tech industry.
  Foster a vibrant community of diverse and passionate technologists: Our diverse and passionate teams are our greatest asset. We foster a collaborative and inclusive environment where everyone feels valued and empowered to thrive.
  Achieve enduring commercial success and sustained growth: A healthy and sustainable business allows us to continuously invest in our people, technology and social impact initiatives.
This commitment to our purpose is matched by a commitment to our people. As Thoughtworkers, you'll be empowered to focus on what you do best ‚Äì creating positive change through technology ‚Äì because we offer a comprehensive benefits package designed to support your well-being and career development.

Here's how we support our team:
  Health & wellness: Health insurance for employees and their immediate family, mental health support and annual check-ups.
  Work-life balance: Flexible work arrangements on a hybrid work model, maternity/paternity leave, sabbatical leave.
  Financial security: Competitive salaries, referral bonuses, and laptop buyback programs.
  Professional growth: Training allowances and personal development budgets.
  Technology & equipment: Top-tier MacBooks and allowances for work-from-home setups.
  Connectivity: Monthly communications allowance to stay connected at home and on the go.
  Fun & camaraderie: We organize engaging social activities like running clubs, nature outings, annual events and monthly Town Halls to foster connections and a positive work environment. 
Ready to break free from the ordinary and achieve the extraordinary? Explore our open roles!

Responsibilities of QC Leader:
Lead and mentor development team members including QC team member regarding QA activities, guiding the project team to ensure successful and high-quality product deployments. 
Develop a comprehensive QA strategy for the project that addresses all critical quality characteristics, prioritizing automation over manual testing to enhance efficiency and minimize defects. (= To CO-ORDINATE with QC Team member to define/tailoring software development process, Quality control Process to ensure high quality product base on Quantitative quality Standars ( ISO,CMM ))

Generate new ideas and contribute to the development and growth of the QA department.

Detail Tasks of QC Leader:
<Team building and development>
You need to set The QC team's goals from the company's goals.
You need to lead team members to achieve the goals of QC team.
You need to guide members to set goals and to achieve their goals.
<Quality & Process>
You need to take leakage statistics for all projects in the company.
You need to analyze data for metrics (Bug rate, Testing effort, Leakage...) and show trends.
You need to discuss and propose improvement solutions.
<Automation testing>
You need to plan to deploy Automation testing application.
You need to manage and guide the QC team to achieve the goal of implementing Automation testing.
<Management>
You need to plan the skill-development activities for the team (Technical & Softskill).
You need to consider the activities to increase team motivation and mutual connection between team members.

Location ‚Äì Vietnam, Ho Chi Minh City
Technology stack ‚Äì Java background
  Meet your team
The Sustainability Growth Unit delivers solutions to help customers running their business in a sustainable way. To increase the engineering capacity for one of the key Sustainability applications, an ESG Reporting Tool called Sustainability Control Tower, we are hiring for a new team in Vietnam. To lead this new team, we are looking for a motivated manager with strong technical background.  
 What you‚Äôll do
You will be responsible for your development team‚Äôs success. You will manage a high performing, agile engineering team by supporting the team members in their daily work and career development. You will set clear goals for the team members and coach them to ensure they collaborate to achieve these and the overarching unit goals.
  For this you will need to collaborate closely with Product Management and UX Designers as part of an Empowered Product Team. To ensure the solutions work end-to-end, you will also collaborate cross-levels in the Engineering unit to ensure we drive customer value consistently and strategically. You will ensure all developed features comply with our software development process, relevant product standards, regulations, and legal requirements. 
  Accountable for the technical realization and quality of the team outcomes within the capacity of the team

listJob.description:
As a DevOps Engineer at Amplifi & Impact, you will design, build, and automate cloud infrastructure to support agile teams while also covering key system administration tasks. You'll lead CI/CD pipeline implementation, manage source code repositories, and ensure high availability and security for cloud-based applications. Additionally, you'll oversee internal systems such as Google Workspace and Jira. Collaborating with cross-functional teams, you'll provide production support, optimize infrastructure, and drive continuous improvement in DevOps practices. This role demands strong technical skills, problem-solving abilities, and a proactive approach to innovation.
 Responsibilities
Working with agile teams to build, manage and automate cloud infrastructure across different projects.
Lead and support our development squads to design, implement and maintain their CI/CD pipeline and environments 
Manage source code repositories
Design, build, support and improve company wide DevOps methodologies and tools
Provide technical support for production environments
Provide after-hours support for Infrastructure related emergencies as well occasional weekend maintenance.
Manage and Support Internal Systems
listJob.jobExperience:
Excellent working knowledge and experience with AWS , Microsoft Azure, GCP. 
Strong linux and network administration skills
Experience building cloud infrastructure for high availability and high traffic applications.
Manage source code repositories using Github and Bitbucket
Experience with CI/CD tools such as GitHub Actions, Bitbucket Pipelines, CircleCI, Jenkins AWS CodePipeline
Manage and monitor AWS, Microsoft Azure, GCP cloud resources 
Understanding of Infrastructure as code and experience with either Terraform or Cloud formation.
Lead root-cause analysis and resolution for errors in production environments.
Automation and scripting experience in at least 1 scripting language
Web application server administration experience.
Experience with containerization technologies (Docker) and orchestration platforms (Kubernetes, EKS, GKE, AKS)
Understanding of cloud security principles and tools. 
Experience working in an agile team using Jira or similar agile tools
It‚Äôs an advantage if you have experience with any of the following
Accreditations with either AWS or GCP
Experience with Microservice and Serverless architectures.
Experience with monitoring tools like New Relic or Datadog
Administering Atlassian Suite
Administering GSuite Environments
Systems automation and configuration management with chef, puppet, or ansible
Azure experience
Experience with CMS like Magento or Wordpress
listJob.privilege:
At Amplifi & Impact, we recognise your expertise and the choices you have in your career path. Here‚Äôs why we believe you‚Äôll love being part of our team:
Ownership and Autonomy: We trust you to take charge of your work, giving you the autonomy to innovate and the ownership to see your projects through from conception to completion.

listJob.description:
ABOUT THE ROLE
As a Senior Frontend Developer at Esoft Systems, you will be responsible for designing, developing, and implementing user interface components using React. In this critical role, you will be the central decision-maker for all frontend technology choices, ensuring that our applications are robust, scalable, and user-friendly. You will collaborate closely with our backend developers, and product managers to deliver top-tier solutions.
 KEY RESPONSIBILITIES
Lead the design and development of complex web applications using React.
Make critical decisions on frontend technology stack, frameworks, and tools to ensure optimal performance and maintainability.
Collaborate with cross-functional teams to define, design, and deliver new features.
Optimize applications for maximum speed and scalability.
Develop and enforce best practices for frontend development, including coding standards, testing, and documentation.
Stay up-to-date with the latest industry trends and technologies to ensure Esoft Systems remains at the forefront of frontend development.
listJob.jobExperience:
REQUIREMENTS
Fluent in verbal and written English
Equivalent to at least 3-5 years of professional experience as a frontend developer, working with React.
Strong experience with state management libraries (e.g., Redux, NgRx).
Proficient in modern build tools and package managers (e.g., Webpack, Babel, npm, yarn).
Familiarity with RESTful APIs and integration with backend services.
Excellent problem-solving skills and attention to detail.
Strong communication and collaboration skills.
Ability to work in a fast-paced, agile environment.
PREFERRED QUALIFICATIONS
Experience with TypeScript.
Knowledge of responsive design principles and mobile-first development.
Experience with testing frameworks and tools (e.g., Jest, Cypress).
Previous experience in a leadership or mentoring role.
MINDSET & ATTITUDE
Be a team player, work toward the common goal of the team, is willing to support other colleagues
Eager to learn the new technologies
Have good mindset, attitude & commitment
listJob.privilege:
We are a diverse crowd of doers and thinkers who work 24/7 from our offices in Denmark, Sweden and Vietnam, all of us towards the same goal ‚Äì creating outstanding solutions and the best customer experience.
Our purpose is to make it easier to market real estate. For nearly 20 years, we have worked passionately to help realtors all over the world by delivering reliably image solutions and great marketing tools.
Joining us, you‚Äôll have an opportunity to continue building your career in an international and successful company with market-leading, innovative solutions. In every business unit and in every office around the world, Esoft has always been driven by a strong team spirit and an even stronger sense of pride. We strive to provide an interesting workplace, where people work and interact across cultures and time zones. We cherish creativity and innovation, and we invest in training and development of employees.
Also, you will join a dynamic and international environment anchored in a strong company culture that encourages and fosters creativity, innovation, respect and equality. Our values - quality, credibility, openness, innovation, care, and passion ‚Äì are based on a belief that we can make a difference ‚Äì for each other and our clients. Our award-winning CSR policy and high employee ethics are proofs that we walk the talk. 
WHAT WE OFFER
We are looking to build a long-term relationship, and you will be part of a team that is in a very exciting development phase. 
We offer a competitive salary and benefit package including an attractive incentive plan, other activities like: Team building, company trip, Year End Party‚Ä¶that fit the selected candidate‚Äôs experience and qualifications. 
Additional benefits include 13th and 14th month salary as per regulations set forth in our staff manual. Insurance contributions as regulated by the law. 
Besides fully participate in SIUIHI, we offer private health insurance including family members as per regulations set forth in our staff manual; Annual health check as well as meals (co-sharing) consumed in the company‚Äôs canteen. 
Training activities are carried out both at a corporate as well as individual level.

listJob.location: The Hallmark, 15 Tran Bach Dang, Thu Thiem Ward, Th√†nh ph·ªë Th·ªß ƒê·ª©c, TP H·ªì Ch√≠ Minh
listJob.description:
By applying for the above position, you accept and agree that your personal data and any information stated in the attached curriculum vitae (CV) will be used and processed by ITViec and NAB Vietnam for recruitment purposes. The storage and processing of such information will comply with the applicable laws of Vietnam, and the policies and procedures of ITViec and NAB Vietnam regarding personal data, as amended from time to time.
 ABOUT THE JOB:
The team revolutionises and enhances the end-to-end payment acceptance experience for our customers and colleagues and delivers a digitised self-service experience along with the latest product innovations, all supported by market leading back-office systems and processes. NAB Merchant Service aims to offer convenient and secure customer payment and merchant solutions to help your business take payments online. Our mission is to lead the market by providing a simple, digital, and integrated ecosystem that can meet all a merchant or health provider's banking needs.
 YOUR MAIN RESPONSIBILITIES:
Design large scale systems, interacting with other internal large-scale systems.
Manage & execute the design, development and testing of customer / colleague and technology features and in line with service priorities.
Lead brainstorming sessions to develop potential solutions for business needs, ideas or problems.
Present potential solutions to various stakeholders.
Ensure tech stacks and frameworks being proposed are aligned with architectural direction.
Define, create and present detailed Solution Design documentation to a diverse group of stakeholders (Architect forum, Design forum, Squad members...).
Design solutions around risks, privacy, governance, compliance, etc.
Collaborate with the software engineering teams and project stakeholders to continually deliver customer value.
 WORKING RELATIONSHIPS WITHIN THE ROLE
Solutions Design Lead (frequent) -clarification of issues, referral for guidance, escalation of problems, review of work
Architect (frequent) -clarification of requirements and issues, referral for guidance, mutual collaboration, sharing of experience and knowledge
Applications Specialist (frequent) -clarification of requirements, mutual collaboration to ensure that outcomes are in line with business unit requirements, sharing of experience and knowledge
Solution Design Colleagues (frequent) -mutual collaboration, sharing of experience and knowledge across teams, peer review and coaching
Programmers (frequent) -collaborate to develop detailed system design in line with business requirements
Project Managers (frequent) -assist in the definition of project scoping
listJob.jobExperience:
Must have:
Experience of 6+ years in application design and 12+ years in the Technology industry.
Strong stakeholder management and communication skills
Deep understanding of microservices architecture including designing and architecting microservices in large scale systems and complex environments
Understanding of DevOps including the knowledge of testing automation, AWS/Azure Cloud, APIs and microservices
Solid experience in designing and developing RESTful APIs and microservices-based system, Event-Driven Architecture (Kafka)
Experience with Java (Spring boot, Spring Data, Java 8 &11,...) or .NET and nice-to-have JavaScript/Typescript (NodeJS, ReactJS,...)
Experience on working with containerised application and container orchestration (e.g. Docker, K8s...)
Understanding CI/CD and its related tools (e.g. Harness, Jenkins...)
Strong understanding of Application Security
Experience in service integration, SDLC
Experience on applying MS Architecture Patterns (e.g. BFF, API Gateway, Circuit breaker, Saga,...)
 Nice to have:
Knowledge and experience in the Banking domain
Solid experience in Agile development environment
AWS certification / Azure certification

 Your Job Responsibilities
Lead the technical direction-setting for key business outcomes‚ÄØ 
Deliver an end-to-end technical outcome across one or more banking domains. They identify service impacts. They understand how new and existing target states will be consumed to deliver and initiative. They work to shape and sequence initiative features on service backlogs. 
Provide technical direction and consultation to the architecture team, across the technology lifecycle, creating and maintaining the Target State Architecture for each capability within the domain and mapping all components to the assest management system.

This is a vital role where you will design and lead the development of powerful integration solutions across digital banking, ensuring our systems communicate seamlessly and efficiently.
