Lead Solution Design: Architect, design, and implement integration solutions, ensuring they are scalable, secure, and high-performing. Collaborate with stakeholders to understand requirements and translate them into effective technical solutions.
Define Integration Strategy: Develop and execute a comprehensive integration strategy that aligns with our business goals and technology roadmap.
Oversee Platform Management: Manage the integration platform, including monitoring, troubleshooting, and optimizing performance. Ensure systems run smoothly and securely at all times.
Ensure Security & Compliance: Maintain compliance with industry standards and regulations, implementing security measures to protect data integrity and privacy.

listJob.description:
Role Summary
Modec is an industry-leading company with over 6,000 employees from 25 countries, undertaking multi-billion-dollar projects. As a member of our Digital and Analytics global team, you'll leverage cutting-edge technology to support these projects, deliver value to our client and drive transformative change across our business.
You'll help develop interconnected applications on an enterprise data platform to solve complex issues in project management, engineering, construction, and business processes like finance, HR, procurement, and operations.
Our solutions include search engines, 3D simulations, digital twin technology, IoT, data engineering, and data analytics. You will also have the opportunity to work with advanced AI technologies such as computer vision and generative AI. This variety ensures you will constantly face new and exciting challenges!
You'll report to Software Engineer Team Lead.
  Responsibilities 
Balance your responsibilities between engineering leadership‚Äîleading a team of up to 10 developers‚Äîand hands-on coding, dedicating approximately 60-80% of your time to actual coding.
Candidates with exceptional engineering experience who do not wish to be in a managerial position may also apply, stating their intent clearly.
Work with the Product Owner on product roadmap and release plan. 
Promote a high-performance culture with emphasis on technical excellence, collaboration, and accountability. 
Split and manage development tasks among team members effectively .
Design robust, scalable, and secure architectures and write clean, high-quality, maintainable code. 
Lead development activities, including code reviews, software testing, and debugging. 
Continuously improve development processes, tools, and methodologies while implementing DevOps best practices.
listJob.jobExperience:
Requirement
8+ years of professional software development experience, with at least 2 years in a leadership position. 
Proven team-leading experience, where you act as a manager, top developer, and mentor/coach.
T-shaped developer with a broad knowledge of various technologies and specialization in either backend or frontend development.
Having a background in data processing or ML/AI is a strong advantage.
An interest and ability to solve very difficult technical problems is a strong advantage.
Strong analytical and creative problem-solving skills.
Excellent written and oral communication skills in English.
Capable of thinking outside the box and eager to try new solutions, willing to challenge the status quo.
Experience developing complex enterprise software applications spanning multiple organizations and business units.
Experience with cloud platforms (e.g., AWS, Azure, or Google Cloud) and containerization technologies (e.g., Docker, Kubernetes).
We welcome candidates with experience in any programming language; our tech stack includes Python, React.js, and Azure.
Nice to have
Start‚Äêup experience.
listJob.privilege:
Join a diverse team of 30+ brilliant Software Engineers, Product Owners, UI/UX Designers, Data Engineers and Data Scientists. 
Experience a culture where communication and teamwork are paramount; everyone's voice is heard and valued. 
Benefit from our high standards in software engineering practices, including CI/CD, Infrastructure as Code, Sentry, linting, code reviews, unit tests, and end-to-end testing. 
Work alongside our top-notch software engineers, pushing yourself to the next level: we only hire the best developers we can find! 
Enjoy a rare opportunity to be part of a "start-up" tech team within a large, stable multinational company, experiencing the best of both worlds!

listJob.location: Vinhomes Central Park, Qu·∫≠n B√¨nh Th·∫°nh, TP H·ªì Ch√≠ Minh
listJob.description:
At EATLAB, we envision a future in which restaurants are no longer limited by their lack of resources and given the access to opportunity. We envision a future where workforces are enhanced by AI. The AI we built will leave no one (with efforts) behind. We seek to provide easy access to powerful AI technology, enabling SMEs to become fully self-sufficient and reap the rewards of their hard work. 
We're looking for an experienced AI/ML engineer who has developed, productionized and maintained AI applications. You should only apply if you have a strong background in some or all of the following areas : mathematics, computer science, statistics, data science, and programming. Most of the data we handle are numerical and images.  
What You‚Äôll Be Doing
Communicate with our product team (product designer, full-stack engineer, and data engineer) to analyze, apply existing AI/ML models, develop new AI/ML models and integrate them into existing systems within the specified timeline,
Obtain and prepare datasets for training and fine-tuning, 
You can expect to be developing and refining the system along with our weekly launch
Optimize inference performance for production deployment,
Deploy, monitor, and maintain scalable and resilient AI/ML products,
Convert AI/ML models into APIs and create documentations so that other developers can use them,
Communicate any issues, and ongoing work status to team members during our daily standup meetings,
Conduct exploratory data analysis, experimentation, model development, productionization, evaluation, automation with CI/CD pipeline, and A/B testing,
Hire, train, and mentor other AI engineers to scale up the team in the future.
listJob.jobExperience:
Must Have‚Äôs 
Has worked at an early stage startup 
Ability to communicate in English professionally 
Experience of 2+ years in AI/Machine Learning roles.
Has delivered an end-to-end ML applications.
Experience in Machine Learning algorithms & libraries like Tensorflow, Pytorch, Keras, Scikit, Pandas.
Experience in MLOps platform e.g. MLflow, or Kubeflow.
Good hands-on experience in git, building CI/CD pipelines.
A commitment and drive for quality, technical excellence and results
Critical thinking
Nice to Have‚Äôs 
Strong analytical skills and proven experience working with complex & large data. 
Hands-on experience in SQL, noSQL, SQL, and vector database systems.
Hands-on experience in the following AI topics: forecasting, computer vision, LLM, and/or optimization methods.

listJob.name: Senior/Lead Java Back-end Developer
listJob.location: 9-11 Dong Da street, Ward 2, Qu·∫≠n T√¢n B√¨nh, TP H·ªì Ch√≠ Minh
listJob.description:
Development is the largest discipline at Endava. Our developers design, build, and release software products in multiple programming languages, frameworks, and libraries. Always collaborating with cross-functional project teams, our developers are adaptable problem-solvers with a client-oriented mindset.  
 As a Senior/Lead Java Developer at Endava, you are responsible for implementing and delivering high-quality software products using Agile Scrum methodology. As a part of a global project, you can contribute your technical expertise and experience in order to the project succeed.
 Responsibilities:
Designs, estimates, and implements technical solutions for medium/high complexity applications.
Participates actively in all phases of the application development lifecycle.
Collaborates with various project stakeholders to provide support for clarifying requirements, processes, architecture, and priorities.
Recommends and promotes IT industry standards, tools, and practices (DevOps, etc.) to achieve well-engineered software products.
Proposes improvements and escalates risks/issues related to development activities.
Participates in the review of the work done by development team members.
Learns and applies new technologies, practices, and tools as appropriate to the project.
Participates in internal and external tech communities, events, etc.
Shares experience and knowledge gained from projects.
listJob.jobExperience:
At least 6 years of experience in Java Back-end development.
Strong understanding of different common programming paradigms (OOP, Functional, etc.).
Strong familiarity with design/architectural patterns and clean code principles (e.g., SOLID, GoF, MVVM).
Proficient in relevant programming languages, frameworks, and tools such as Java, IntelliJ IDEA, Spring, Hibernate, Maven, Gradle. Nice to have: Kotlin.
Practical experience in platform-specific database systems and SQL.
Good understanding of version control systems like Git or similar.
Solid experience with testing and mocking frameworks.
Familiar with common communication protocols and standards such as HTTP, REST, JSON, TCP/IP, and others.
Experience with Agile methodologies (e.g., SCRUM, KANBAN).
Knowledge of CI/CD tools and practices.
Good problem-solving skills and analytical thinking.
Excellent communication and teamwork abilities.
Upper English proficiency.
This position also open for candidates who are living at other provinces/cities and want to relocate to HCM city

listJob.location: T√≤a vƒÉn ph√≤ng Symphony, Vinhomes Riverside, Q. Long Bi√™n, H√† N·ªôi, Qu·∫≠n Long Bi√™n, H√† N·ªôi
listJob.description:
We are seeking a talented and detail-oriented Frontend Engineer (Web and Mobile) to create exceptional user interfaces and experiences for our car rental, car sharing, and automotive marketplace platforms. You will work on building responsive web applications and intuitive mobile apps, ensuring a seamless user journey across all devices.
Key Responsibilities
Frontend Development
Develop responsive, high-performance web applications using modern JavaScript frameworks like ReactJS or VueJs.
Build cross-platform mobile applications using React Native, Flutter, or similar frameworks.
Collaborate with designers to translate UI/UX designs into functional and visually appealing interfaces. 
Integration and Collaboration Engineer
Integrate with backend APIs, ensuring efficient and secure data exchange.
Work closely with backend engineers, designers, and product managers to deliver end-to-end solutions.
Ensure applications are compatible across multiple browsers and devices.
Optimization and Performance
Optimize web and mobile applications for speed, scalability, and performance.
Implement best practices for accessibility, responsiveness, and usability.
Use tools and techniques like lazy loading, code splitting, and performance monitoring to enhance application performance.
Code Quality and Maintenance
Write clean, maintainable, and well-documented code.
Conduct code reviews to uphold quality and identify improvements.
Troubleshoot and debug issues across web and mobile platforms.
listJob.jobExperience:
Required Qualifications
Bachelor‚Äôs degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering, or a related field.
3+ years of experience in frontend development for web and mobile platforms.
Proficiency in JavaScript, TypeScript, HTML5, and CSS3.
Experience with frontend frameworks such as ReactJS (web) and React Native (mobile).
Familiarity with state management libraries like Redux, MobX, or Context API.
Strong understanding of RESTful APIs and integration with backend services.
Knowledge of version control systems like Git.
Preferred Skills
Experience with testing frameworks such as Jest, Mocha, or Cypress.
Familiarity with design tools like Figma, Sketch, or Adobe XD.
Knowledge of Progressive Web Apps (PWA) and hybrid app development.
Experience with CI/CD pipelines for web and mobile deployments.
Understanding of performance optimization techniques for web and mobile apps.
Key Competencies
Strong problem-solving and debugging skills.
Excellent communication and collaboration abilities.
Passion for creating exceptional user experiences.
Ability to adapt to a fast-paced, agile development environment.
listJob.privilege:
A chance to be part of a dynamic and innovative team working on green and sustainable solutions.
Competitive salary and benefits.
Collaboration with industry leaders and access to Vingroup‚Äôs diverse ecosystem.

listJob.description:
Our company is seeking full time Team Leader with experience leading teams and building .Net applications. 
 This position will be ideally suited to a person with experience developing commercial software who enjoys building high performing teams with the ability to work with .Net technology including WinForms and web services. 
 You are expected to possess modern software development life cycle knowledge, management and leadership skills and excellent communication skills in both verbal and written English to liaise with stakeholders. 
 Responsibilities:
 Team Management:
Lead, mentor, and inspire a team of .Net developers, fostering a collaborative and high-performing environment.
Assign tasks, set priorities, and ensure timely delivery of projects while maintaining high standards of quality.
Conduct regular performance evaluations, provide constructive feedback, and support the professional growth of team members.
 Project Oversight:
Oversee the entire software development lifecycle, from requirements gathering to deployment, ensuring adherence to project timelines and milestones.
Collaborate with product managers, designers, and other stakeholders to define project scope, objectives, and technical requirements.
Monitor project progress, identify potential risks, and implement effective mitigation strategies to ensure successful project completion.
 Technical Leadership:
Provide technical guidance and expertise to team members, assisting with complex problem-solving and architectural decisions.
Conduct code reviews, enforce coding standards, and promote a culture of continuous improvement and innovation.
 Communication and Collaboration:
Foster open communication and collaboration within the team and across departments, ensuring alignment with organizational goals and objectives.
Act as a liaison between technical and non-technical stakeholders, facilitating effective communication and understanding of project requirements.
Represent the team in meetings, presentations, and discussions, articulating technical concepts in a clear and concise manner.
listJob.jobExperience:
Requirements:
Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or related field
Proven experience as a team lead or manager in a .Net development environment.
Strong skills in .Net, WinForms and MS SQLServer.
In-depth knowledge of software development methodologies, tools, and best practices.
Excellent leadership, communication, and interpersonal skills, with the ability to motivate and inspire team members.
Demonstrated ability to manage multiple projects simultaneously, prioritize tasks, and adapt to changing priorit
Excellent English language skills (written and verbal communication)
 Additional attribute (Preferred not required):
Working experience in ERP type systems, Accounting or Retail POS systems etc.
Experience with Cloud Services (AWS, Azure, GCP etc.)

listJob.description:
At MapLovin, we‚Äôre all about helping businesses‚Äîwhether they‚Äôre small local shops, growing SMEs, or big corporations‚Äîmake the most of their digital presence on mapping platforms like Google and Apple Maps. Our goal is to create smart, user-friendly tools that improve visibility, boost engagement, and drive business growth.
We‚Äôre looking for a Full Stack Developer who‚Äôs not only tech-savvy but also independent, data-driven, and eager to explore new places‚Äîbecause this role might take you on the road from time to time. If you‚Äôre passionate about building impactful solutions and love working with APIs, we‚Äôd love to have you on board.
What You‚Äôll Be Doing
1. API Integration & Development:
Build and integrate tools with Google Maps, Apple Maps, and ChatGPT APIs to help businesses enhance their online presence.
Work with RESTful and GraphQL APIs to collect, analyze, and optimize location data.
Ensure smooth, secure, and scalable API interactions
2. Front-End Development:
Develop responsive, user-friendly interfaces using frameworks like React, Angular, or Vue.js.
Work closely with the design team to turn ideas into great-looking, intuitive web applications.
Optimize performance for seamless user experiences.
3. Back-End Development:
Create and maintain scalable back-end systems with Node.js, Python, or other back-end technologies.
Manage databases (SQL/NoSQL) to store and process location-based data securely.
Set up authentication, authorization, and data validation.
4. Deployment & Cloud Management:
Deploy and manage applications on cloud services like AWS, GCP, or Azure.
Implement CI/CD pipelines for faster and smoother releases.
Monitor system performance and troubleshoot issues proactively.
5. Collaboration & Data-Driven Decisions:
Work independently while staying in sync with product and business goals.
Analyze data to help refine products and create meaningful insights for our customers.
Stay on top of industry trends and suggest improvements.
listJob.jobExperience:
Tech Skills:
Experience with front-end frameworks (React, Angular, Vue.js).
Solid back-end development skills (Node.js, Python, etc.).
Familiarity with Google Maps, Apple Maps, and ChatGPT APIs.
Knowledge of cloud platforms like AWS, GCP, or Azure.
Strong database skills (PostgreSQL, MongoDB, Firebase, etc.).
Experience with Git version control and DevOps tools (Docker, Kubernetes).
Understanding of authentication systems (OAuth, JWT).
Soft Skills:
Ability to work independently and take ownership of projects.
Great communication skills‚Äîyou‚Äôll be working with data and explaining it to others.
Passion for travel‚Äîthis role might take you to different places to test and implement solutions.
Curiosity and eagerness to learn new technologies.
Nice to Have:
Experience with geospatial data processing and analytics.
Familiarity with AI-driven solutions and automation.
Previous experience working with businesses to improve digital presence.
Agile development experience (Scrum, Kanban).
listJob.privilege:

listJob.location: Long Tower, 101-103 Nguyen Cuu Van, Binh Thanh Dist., HCMC, Qu·∫≠n B√¨nh Th·∫°nh, TP H·ªì Ch√≠ Minh
listJob.description:
As a Senior Full-stack Developer, you will be responsible for the following tasks:
Collaborate with finance and actuarial teams to understand business problems and build new cloud-based architecture and solutions.
Design and develop scalable and efficient web applications to ensure functionality and accuracy.
Implement backend services on the AWS platform and integrate with different storage solutions.
Develop Proof-of-Concept prototypes to demonstrate new business ideas.
Perform performance tuning and cost optimization on frontend and backend solutions.
Work closely with Group Enterprise Architecture, Group Cloud, and business teams to develop full stack applications.
Collaborate with cross-functional teams to understand problems, requirements, and feedback, ensuring solutions align with business objectives.
listJob.jobExperience:
At least 4+ years of experience in building large-scale software applications, preferably in the finance and insurance industry.
Hands-on experience in full stack development on AWS, preferably with AWS native services.
Proficiency in front-end technologies, including JavaScript, CSS3, HTML5, and third-party libraries such as React.js and Next.js.
Strong knowledge of server-side programming languages including Node.js, Express.
Experience with SQL and NoSQL DBMS technologies, including DynamoDB, MongoDB, and MySQL, as well as caching solutions like Redis and Elastic Cache.
Knowledge of AWS Amplify and AppSync is preferred.
Familiarity with CI/CD processes using the AWS Code Family is preferred

listJob.name: [Senior/Middle] Back-end NodeJS Developer (SQL/DevOps)
listJob.location: Pho Quang, Qu·∫≠n T√¢n B√¨nh, TP H·ªì Ch√≠ Minh
listJob.description:
Job Highlights
Be part of the PropTech
Be part of change, Be part of the solution
Exposure to International standards and cutting-edge technologies
Company Introduction
iCondo Vietnam is a leading provider of property management technology and solutions in the proptech industry based in Singapore with a development office in Ho Chi Minh City. iCondo Vietnam provides property management solutions to clients in Singapore, Australia, and Indonesia. We are expanding rapidly and are seeking passionate and experienced Back-end NodeJS Developers to join our robust fully-stacked IT Team.
Being part of the iCondo Vietnam team is very much like being part of a family. Your contributions are valued and will effect change. You will be nurtured and exposed to our dynamic, process-oriented, creative culture as we seek to explore software and hardware solutions to continually improve and deliver the highest quality level of service to our clients. You will also be exposed to various iCondo team members in Singapore, Australia and Indonesia. At iCondo Vietnam, be prepared to explore, experiment to push boundaries to continually exceed expectations and to cater to the different needs in each market.
Salary Range: Negotiation
Job Description
Design and write with the cutting edge NodeJS to improve the availability, scalability, latency, and efficiency of back-end's range of services;
Work with the engineering team to explore and create new design/architectures geared towards scale and performance;
Engage in service capacity and demand planning, software performance analysis, tuning and optimization;
Work closely with infrastructure team in building and scaling back-end services as well as performing root cause analysis investigations;
Debug and modify complex, production software.

About the team
Our Technology team is the backbone of our business. The team is responsible for building a reliable, scalable and compatible platform for our product and services. Our Engineering team consists of talented and passionate engineers that focus on Full Stack (Back-end & Front-end), Mobile, QA across the regions and work closely with Data, Infrastructure & Security, Product team and with the cross functional team to continuously improve and scale our products forward.
About the role
You work on a modern technology stack (Java, mySQL, Docker, Kubernetes) to build the next-generation healthcare services that serve 2.5 million patients across Singapore, Indonesia, Malaysia, Thailand, Vietnam, and Philippines. As Software Engineer II, you will be responsible for end-to-end feature development and deployment. You will contribute to all aspects of the SDLC ‚Äî architecture, design, implementation, code reviews, testing, and production on-call support. The ideal candidate has strong ownership, good communication skills, enjoy working in highly collaborative and fast paced environments.
Collaborate with cross-functional teams to define, design, and ship new features.
Continuously discover, evaluate, and implement new technologies to maximize engineering efficiency.
Ensure the performance, quality, and responsiveness of applications.
Write clean, maintainable, and performant code.
Define practical technical solutions that consider the time-sensitivity of projects, as well as their business and system requirements.
Assist with estimating work efforts required for each phase of a project.
Keep up-to-date with latest industry and technology trends.
listJob.jobExperience:
Qualifications
Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or related technical field
3+ years of experience as a backend software developer, with a strong focus on Java. Experience with Spring Boot framework, a plus.
Excellent problem solving and debugging skills.
Strong understanding of software development principles, data structures, and algorithms.
Knowledge of software development best practices, e.g. version control, CI/CD pipeline, IaC, automated testing principles
Strong written and verbal communication skills with experience creating clear and concise technical documentation for complex systems.
Owner‚Äôs mindset - you‚Äôre eager to get out of your comfort zone and take on any challenge that moves the business forward -- regardless of whether it‚Äôs part of the ‚Äújob description‚Äù.
Continuously learn new things - we‚Äôre not done growing and exploring uncharted territories is part of the fun!
Passion for Doctor Anywhere‚Äôs mission to improve health outcomes for all patients by making quality healthcare accessible and affordable to everyone.
Preferred Qualifications (not required, but will make you stand out from the crowd):
Experience developing in a distributed systems architecture.
Familiarity with containerization and orchestration technologies e.g. Docker, Kubernetes
Familiarity with healthcare data standards such as FHIR, HL7
About DA
Doctor Anywhere was founded in 2017 with a mission to make healthcare simple, accessible, and efficient for all by leveraging technology to enable patients to own their long-term health. Our holistic offering covers mobile tele-medicine consultations with GPs, specialists, and mental health providers, in-person care at physical clinics and pharmacies, and an online health and wellness marketplace for supplements, healthy snacks, and home-based health screening and vaccinations.
DA continues to expand its digital healthcare ecosystem, advanced by the 3,000 GPs and specialists within our network, 1,000 corporate partners, and 25 regional insurers we work with. Grounded by our motto ‚ÄúKeep Going, Keep Growing‚Äù, every team member works to get better every day. Diversity of perspective is the core of why we are able to out-innovate our competition. Join us in transforming Southeast Asia‚Äôs healthcare future!

listJob.description:
JOB SUMMARY
In this role, you will play a crucial part in oversee and manage the application support team and ensure the smooth operation of critical business applications.

JOB DUTIES 

Team Leadership and Management 
Lead, mentor, and motivate a team of application support analysts, providing guidance, performance feedback, and professional development opportunities.
Define and allocate team resources effectively to achieve departmental goals and service level agreements (SLAs).
Conduct regular team meetings, and one-on-one coaching sessions.
Foster a collaborative and positive team environment conducive to high performance.
Operational Support
Ensure timely and effective resolution of application incidents, service requests, and problems.
Manage the incident, problem, and change management processes related to applications.
Monitor application performance and availability, proactively identifying and resolving potential issues.
Develop and maintain comprehensive application documentation, knowledge base articles, and troubleshooting guides.
Implement and enforce standard operating procedures (SOPs) for application support.
Monitor and evaluate testing quality to ensure delivery quality
Ensure adherence to ITIL best practices and relevant industry standards.
Quality Assurance and Testing
Work with developers to ensure their solution design can satisfy user stories and acceptance criteria
Ensure acceptance criteria and any other test conditions are met before concluding a story is complete
Ensure that clear testing plans have been documented and executed before releasing software
Work with the development team to ensure automated testing is baked into the solution
Identify and document system deficiencies and recommended solutions
Stakeholder Engagement
Collaborate with other IT teams (e.g., development, infrastructure, security) to ensure seamless integration and support of applications.
Communicate effectively with business stakeholders about application status, incidents, and planned maintenance.
Manage escalation paths and ensure timely communication of critical issues to relevant stakeholders.
Disaster Recovery & Business Continuity and Documentation
Participate in the development and maintenance of disaster recovery and business continuity plans for critical applications.
Assist with testing and validation of recovery procedures.
Ensure compliance with organizational policies, security standards, and regulatory requirements.
Maintain comprehensive documentation, including application configurations, incident logs, and support procedures.

listJob.description:
Money Forward Vietnam (MFV) is at the forefront of financial technology, actively engaged in a global framework. With a portfolio of over 50 services spanning B2C, B2B, and B2B2C sectors, we aim to address financial challenges for a diverse audience. As part of the Money Forward Group, a rapidly transitioning global tech leader, MFV offers a unique opportunity to enhance your engineering capabilities through focused investment and global exposure.
 As we embark on a major project in enterprise-level accounting solutions, developed collaboratively by our teams in Vietnam and Japan, we recognize the pivotal role of a QA/QC Lead. listJob.description:
Akila is looking for a Senior Backend Engineer with ambition, creativity and a passion for sustainability and technology. Our team is involved in a wide variety of technologies, like digital twin, microservice, big data. This role will be critical as a Java expert to develop RESTful APIs serving our customer. The candidate should be comfortable working in a fast-moving startup environment where speed, hard work and fresh thinking are critical to success.
  Collaborate with team to analyze product needs and propose technical solutions. 
Follow agile process and ensure delivery independently on schedule with good quality. 
Compose technical documents regularly. 
Communicate with Product Manager for requirements. 
Track and analyze product issues, conduct trouble shooting and bug fixing.
listJob.jobExperience:
Bachelor‚Äôs degree in Computer Science or equivalent is required and Master‚Äôs degree is preferred. 
3+ years backend development experience is preferred. 
Solid understanding of CS fundamentals and JDK 11+, Spring boot 3.x is a must. 
Knowledge and skill required: RESTful API, Microservice architecture, Distributed transaction, and Code management (GitHub/JIRA‚Ä¶.) 
Knowledge and experience preferred: Spring Cloud, Spring Security, MySQL, Redis, Spark, Kafka, MQTT, CICD and Docker 
Knowledge and experience in IoT data collection, procession and analytics is a plus. 
Familiar with open-source libraries. 
Proactive & Plan-Do-Check-Act attitude with good capabilities of problem solving. 
Prioritization, excellent attention to details and follow through design and able to work independently. 
Adaptable, resilient, and positive attitude. Flexible and agile with understandings of the relevant market and new platform solutions. 
Good English communication.

listJob.name: Product Owner (Middle)
listJob.location: Floor 5 - Jabes 1 Building, 244 C·ªëng Qu·ª≥nh, Ph·∫°m Ng≈© L√£o Ward, Qu·∫≠n 1, TP H·ªì Ch√≠ Minh
listJob.description:
As a Product Owner of Gearment, you must focus on the data to make decisions in building the UI/UX for every function, to create the plan for releasing and timeline of the product. You  will be responsible for working with stakeholders to understand their vision,managing the product features and priorities, breaking down features into product specifications, and working with the engineering team to understand and implement the scope.  
1. User-Centric:  
-  Understand the needs of warehouse managers, logistics coordinators, and end-users  
through interviews, observations, and data analysis. 
-  Define key performance metrics to enhance processes like order accuracy, pick and  
pack times, and inventory turnover.  
2. Product Vision and Strategy: 
- Articulate the product vision and strategic goals, aligning with broader supply chain objectives.  
Drive innovations in automation, space management, and integration with ERP and WMS systems, while ensuring compliance and scalability.  
3. Stakeholder Management: 
- Engage with stakeholders to gather feedback, prioritize features, and communicate product developments impacting operational efficiency.  
4. Project & Backlog Management: 
-  Manage the product backlog to address warehousing pain points and write user stories  
that clearly define requirements.  Monitor development sprints and provide updates to stakeholders on progress.  
5. Communication and Collaboration: 
- Facilitate effective communication between warehouse operations and development teams to ensure software solutions meet real 
world needs.  
6. Decision Making: 
- Make informed decisions on product features, leveraging data driven insights related to efficiency and cost-effectiveness.  
7. Quality Assurance:  
- Define acceptance criteria and quality standards for warehousing features, focusing on system performance and user experience.  
Review development outputs for usability and reliability in warehouse operations.  
8. Continuous Improvement: 
- Analyze KPIs to drive ongoing improvements in  
warehousing processes, iterating on the product based on user feedback and operational data.
listJob.jobExperience:
3-5 years' experience in same the position Product Owner
Strong problem-solving abilities and strategic thinking.
Leadership: Proven ability to lead cross-functional teams and resolve conflicts.
Innovation and creativity

listJob.name: Senior & Principal Automation/Performance Test (Java)
listJob.location: 11th Floor, ROX Tower, No 54A Nguyen Chi Thanh, Lang Thuong Ward, Qu·∫≠n ƒê·ªëng ƒêa, H√† N·ªôi
listJob.description:
About Money Forward Vietnam: 
Money Forward Vietnam (MFV) is at the forefront of financial technology, actively engaged in a global framework. With a portfolio of over 50 services spanning B2C, B2B, and B2B2C sectors, we aim to address financial challenges for a diverse audience. As part of the Money Forward Group, a rapidly transitioning global tech leader, MFV offers a unique opportunity to enhance your engineering capabilities through focused investment and global exposure.
 About the team: 
As we embark on a major project in enterprise-level accounting solutions, developed collaboratively by our teams in Vietnam and Japan, we recognize the pivotal role of a QA/QC Lead. We are seeking a candidate with solid testing and interpersonal skills to join our English-speaking team at Money Forward Vietnam. This is an opportunity to contribute to the enhancement of our company's products, which are currently serving millions of users. This position offers the opportunity to work with a partner team in Japan and supervise several QA members based in Vietnam and Japan.
 Your responsibilities: 
*** Performance Test Lead: 
Lead the development and execution of performance testing strategies and plans for various projects.
Define and document performance testing objectives, scope, and deliverables.
Design and execute load, stress, scalability, endurance, and performance regression tests.
Create and maintain performance test scripts using industry-standard tools (e.g., JMeter, LoadRunner, Gatling, or similar).
Analyze and interpret test results to identify bottlenecks and performance issues.
Identify performance bottlenecks in both client and server-side applications, including database queries, APIs, and network latency.
Collaborate with developers and infrastructure teams to optimize code and configuration for better performance.
Provide detailed, clear, and concise performance testing reports, including root cause analysis, recommendations, and impact assessments.
Work closely with development, QA, and DevOps teams to integrate performance testing into the CI/CD pipeline.
Present performance test results and insights to leadership and non-technical stakeholders, ensuring actionable feedback.
*** Automation Test Lead: 
Lead and mentor QA team members, guiding the project team to ensure successful and high-quality product deployments.
Develop a comprehensive QA strategy for the project that addresses all critical quality characteristics, prioritizing automation over manual testing to enhance efficiency and minimize defects.
Continuously improve quality processes and activities by implementing early testing practices, including Shift-left testing, across the team and project.
Analyze product requirements and design documents, contributing expertise to ensure comprehensive and accurate documentation.
Assist the development team in implementing mutation testing tools to enhance unit test quality, and provide visualization of results using graphical tools.
Design test cases based on a deep understanding of requirements and effective testing techniques.
Conduct essential testing activities from task initiation to delivery, tracking and managing defects as they arise.
Review and provide feedback on team members' test cases to ensure thorough and consistent test coverage.
Continuously improve workflows and share best practices across the team.
Generate new ideas and contribute to the development and growth of the QA department.
Provide support, conduct reviews, and offer necessary training to team members.
listJob.jobExperience:
*** Performance Test Lead: 
Having 7+ years in performance testing, with 2+ years in a lead role.
Strong experience with performance testing tools (JMeter, LoadRunner, Gatling).
Proficient in scripting (Java, Python) for test automation.
Solid understanding of web technologies, APIs, and databases.
Excellent leadership, communication, and analytical skills.
Good English ability at work 
Great interest in testing, open minded and able to self-motivated
*** Automation Test Lead: 
Having 7+ years of experience in web testing
Good English communication and documentation skills
Solid skills and knowledge of testing processes and techniques
Experience in test automation with any frameworks, any programming languages
Experience in API testing with Postman, Playwright or other tools
Experience in working in cross functional or agile teams
Experience in working with CI/CD, integrating automation, performance to CI/CD
Familiar with issue and test management tools like Jira, TestRail,...
Familiar with CI/CD tools like Sonaque, Jenkins, jmeter, K6, Grafana
Great interest in testing, open minded and able to self-motivated
Experience in performance testing or security testing is a plus
Experience in mutation testing is a plus
ISTQB or equivalent testing certificate is a plus.

listJob.description:
Meet your team 
The Sustainability Growth Unit is at the forefront of creating solutions that empower businesses to operate sustainably and make a positive impact on the world.
To further strengthen our capabilities and meet the growing demand for sustainability-driven innovations, we are expanding our engineering capacity in Vietnam. We are building a talented new team to support the development of one of our flagship applications: the Sustainability Control Tower (SCT), an advanced ESG (Environmental, Social, and Governance) reporting tool that helps businesses manage and achieve their sustainability goals.
Are you a tech enthusiast looking to make an impact? Do you want to use your skills to build software that helps businesses and the planet thrive together? Join us as Senior Developer and become part of our journey to create cutting-edge sustainability solutions that drive real-world change!
Together, we can create a more sustainable future!
 What you‚Äôll do 
As a Senior Developer for the Sustainability Control Tower you will help to develop various new features for a professional SaaS business application.
The initial focus will be on the underlying data model and data collection capabilities (including workflow), but over time span over all aspects of the application.

We are looking for a passionate Senior Developer with a strong background in data models and data integration. As Developer you will:
Implement modern cloud business applications which will help customers to transition into the future of sustainable businesses
Work together with the other colleagues in your team in an agile process
Thrive for engineering excellence for the Sustainability Control Tower cloud offering

  The work will be hands-on including development tasks and setting up systems/tenants to explore integration options.

Conceptual and structured working style with a strong sense for prioritization
Self-motivated individual with a positive can-do attitude and innovator mindset 
Solid technical knowledge on cloud native software development, including hands-on software engineering experience, ideally in the JavaScript / node.js environment
7+ years of experience acting as a software engineer
Fluent in spoken and written English
 Optional skills 
Experience with workflow and data collection software
Knowledge in the sustainability domain, especially in ESG reporting and related regulations
Experience with related SAP solutions and technologies, such as SAP BTP, CAP, OData, SAP UI5, Fiori Elements and SAP Build Process Automation

listJob.location: 122-124, ƒê. B2, An L·ª£i ƒê√¥ng, Qu·∫≠n 2, Sala, HCMC, Kh√°c, TP H·ªì Ch√≠ Minh
listJob.description:
We're looking for exceptionally talented front-end web developers specialized in Angular/Typescript/RxJS and Tailwind CSS to help build the next version of our popular learning, collaboration and fund management SaaS platform. 
 You‚Äôll be part of a fast growing, cross-functional team based in Vietnam and Singapore that‚Äôs responsible for the full software development life cycle, from conception to deployment.
 You'll work closely with back-end developers, and interact directly with customers to understand how they're using the product and help identify requirements for new features and ways we can optimise existing features. You'll be responsible for maintaining high code quality and helping ensure we achieve our goals.
 If you're a fast learner, strong technical skills, motivated by user happiness, have a good sense of UX design and ready for a challenge then we‚Äôd like to meet you.
 Responsibilities
Implement new features from scratch using Angular v17-v19 (Signals), Tailwind CSS and our Rest APIs and enhance existing features
Integrate with 3rd Party APIs like OpenAI, Google Calendar, Stripe and more
Research the latest developments with Angular and front-end development and present ideas on how we can incorporate the latest technology into our products to the team 
Enhance existing features to improve performance and security
Bug fixes
Attend customer meetings to understand how they're using the platform and identify ways in which we can improve
listJob.jobExperience:
We'd love to hear from you if you meet these requirements:
  2.5+ Years experience building applications using Angular as your primary framework with TailWind CSS
Excellent communication and logic skills
You should be motivated by happy users, have a good sense of UI and UX design, confident and ambitious  
Note: Experience with real-time APIs like SignalR or SocketIO a bonus
listJob.privilege:
We're focused on building products that customers love using, and to do that we need to make sure you love working at Avnon so that you can focus and do your best work - so you'll have a high quality work environment, excellent management and a clear understanding of what your job needs to focus on.
We'll support you with training, growth opportunities, trips to our office in Singapore and exposure to the latest technologies and interesting challenges.

listJob.name: Mobile Developer (Flutter, Dart, English)
listJob.location: 81 Xu√¢n Di·ªáu, Qu·∫£ng An, T√¢y H·ªì, H√† N·ªôi, Qu·∫≠n T√¢y H·ªì, H√† N·ªôi
listJob.description:
As a Mobile Developer in our engineering team, you will focus on the development and optimization of the front-end experience for our food ordering platform. Your primary responsibility will be crafting intuitive and responsive mobile applications that connect restaurants with their customers. Collaborating closely with back-end developers and designers, you will ensure a seamless and visually engaging user interface that aligns with our mission to empower restaurants and enhance the dining experience. This role is ideal for those passionate about mobile technology and delivering polished, user-focused solutions. 
Job Functions
Software Development
Develop, and maintain our restaurant management and delivery web applications using Flutter, ensuring seamless functionality across both iOS and Android platforms.
Utilize Riverpod for efficient and scalable state management, ensuring maintainable and testable codebases.
Integrate mobile applications with both the company‚Äôs backend services (using RESTful API) and Firebase services to ensure robust functionality and performance.
Collaborate with UX/UI designers to implement intuitive and engaging user interfaces that enhance the overall user experience.
Identify and resolve performance bottlenecks, ensuring smooth and responsive application performance.
Conduct thorough code reviews, provide constructive feedback, and mentor junior developers to foster a culture of continuous improvement and technical excellence.
Conduct thorough code reviews, provide constructive feedback, and mentor junior developers to foster a culture of continuous improvement and technical excellence.
Work closely with cross-functional teams, including product managers, UX/UI designers, and customer support, to deliver high-quality features and solutions that meet the needs of restaurant owners and customers.
Implement automated testing strategies, including unit, widget, and integration tests, to ensure the reliability and stability of mobile applications.
Stay up-to-date with emerging technologies and industry trends, especially those relevant to the restaurant and delivery sectors, recommending and implementing improvements to enhance development processes and product quality.
listJob.jobExperience:
Required:
Bachelor‚Äôs degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or a related field, or equivalent practical experience.
3-7 years of professional experience in mobile development.
Strong communication skills in English, both written and spoken.
Proven experience with Flutter and Dart, including building and deploying applications to both iOS and Android platforms.
Strong proficiency in using Riverpod for state management in Flutter applications.
Hands-on experience with Firebase services, including Authentication, Firestore, Cloud Functions, Cloud Messaging, and Analytics.
Familiarity with architectural patterns such as MVVM, Clean Architecture, or similar.
Experience integrating mobile applications with RESTful APIs and real-time data services. Strong fit with our company values and working culture.
Skills in profiling and optimizing mobile applications for performance and re Ability to translate UI/UX designs into high-quality, responsive, and user-friendly interfaces.
Strong fit with our company values and working culture.
Strong critical thinking, problem solving, communications, project management, teamwork and mentoring skills.
Orientation to detail and committed to delivery high quality code.
Preferred:
Prior work experience with restaurant management systems or delivery platforms.
Basic understanding of backend technologies and the ability to collaborate effectively with backend developers.
Familiarity with mobile DevOps practices, including automated builds, testing, and deployment. Experience with continuous integration and continuous deployment pipelines for mobile applications.
Knowledge of mobile application security best practices and data protection.
Experience with internationalization and localization of mobile applications.
Experience with tools for monitoring and analyzing mobile app performance and user behavior.
Familiarity with Figma for collaboration with designers.
Passion for food!
listJob.privilege:
Competitive salary and performance-based incentives.
18 days of paid time off per year.
Holiday pay.
Professional development opportunities.
Annual company trip.
Private health insurance.

listJob.name: Senior Full Stack Developer (Python/Django/JavaScript)
listJob.location: 81 Xu√¢n Di·ªáu, Qu·∫£ng An, T√¢y H·ªì, H√† N·ªôi, Qu·∫≠n T√¢y H·ªì, H√† N·ªôi
listJob.description:
Anh Beo is seeking a full-time candidate to fill a Senior Full Stack Developer role. Anh Beo is an exciting food ordering platform designed to connect food lovers with restaurants that are passionate about their offerings. We‚Äôre committed to helping restaurants showcase their food while creating a seamless and enjoyable experience for end users. If you‚Äôre excited about food and helping restaurants succeed, we want to meet you!
As a Senior Full Stack Developer in our engineering team, you will play a pivotal role in building and maintaining our innovative food ordering platform. You will work across the entire tech stack, from designing and developing efficient back-end systems to crafting intuitive and engaging user interfaces. Your work will directly support our mission of empowering restaurants and enhancing the dining experience for users. This is a dynamic role that requires problem-solving, collaboration, and a passion for delivering high-quality software solutions.
Job Functions
Software Development
Develop, and maintain our restaurant management and delivery web applications using Python for the backend and TypeScript (React) for the frontend.
Design the architecture of scalable, reliable, and maintainable systems, ensuring best practices in code quality, performance, and security.
Utilize RabbitMQ and Celery for handling asynchronous tasks, ensuring decoupled and efficient processing within the application. Implement Redis for caching, fast data access, session management, and lightweight pub/sub scenarios to enhance application performance and user experience.
Develop real-time features using technologies like WebSockets or Server-Sent Events (SSE).
Collaborate with DevOps teams to manage containerization using Docker, orchestrate deployments, and ensure seamless operation on cloud platforms.
Apply DDD principles to structure and organize code, promoting a modular monolith architecture that aligns with the complexities of workflows.
Integrate secure and reliable payment gateways to handle transactions, refunds, and financial reporting
Conduct thorough code reviews, provide constructive feedback, and mentor junior developers to foster a culture of continuous improvement and technical excellence.
Work closely with cross-functional teams, including product managers, UX/UI designers, and customer support, to deliver high-quality features and solutions that meet the needs of restaurant owners and customers.
Stay up-to-date with emerging technologies and industry trends, especially those relevant to the restaurant and delivery sectors, recommending and implementing improvements to enhance development processes and product quality.
listJob.jobExperience:
Employee Skills, Experience, and Attributes
Required:
Bachelor‚Äôs degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or a related field, or equivalent practical experience.
5 years of professional experience in full-stack development.
Strong communication skills in English, both written and spoken.
Proven experience with Python Restful API frameworks, preferably FastAPI or Django.
Strong proficiency in React and modern JavaScript (ES6+) development.
Understanding of database design and optimization for high-traffic applications - SQL (PostgreSQL) and ORM
Expertise in RabbitMQ, Celery, Redis, Websocket, SSE, Docker and cloud computing platforms
Familiarity with DDD, modular monolith architectures, RESTful API design, and integration with third-party services, such as payment gateways and map services.
Strong fit with our company values and working culture.
Strong critical thinking, problem solving, communications, project management, teamwork and mentoring skills.
Orientation to detail and committed to delivery high quality code.
Preferred:
Prior work experience with restaurant management systems or delivery platforms.
Familiarity with CI/CD pipelines, testing best practices (unit testing, end-to-end testing, test-driven development), pytest and hypothesis (for Python), Jest and React Testing Library, and Cypress or Selenium for end-to-end testing.
Experience with message brokers or caching solutions.
Familiarity with web performance optimization.
Passion for food!
listJob.privilege:
Competitive salary and performance-based incentives.
18 days of paid time off per year.
Holiday pay.
Professional development opportunities.
Annual company trip.
Private health insurance.

You will be responsible for support the end-to-end delivery of the Engineering Teams in Vietnam, as well managing the release of multiple team‚Äôs features to production. 
To ideal candidate is someone that thrives at managing complex stakeholder relationships and programs involving many engineering teams onshore and offshore. You will work closely with senior technology leads, product owners and other project managers in Vietnam and Australia.
 YOUR JOB RESPONSBILITIES

Liaise with onshore/offshore engineering teams, business and IT partners on release scheduling and communication of process.
Ensure the release of features to production comply to NAB risk frameworks and educate the Vietnam engineering team in the use of the risk tools and framework.
Ability to create and maintain relationships with wide range of stakeholders in Australia (e.g. Product Manager, Delivery Owner)
Communicate effectively across all levels of the organisation.
Support the Vietnam engineering teams in their communication to onshore teams and stakeholders

listJob.location: Viettel Complex Building, 285 Cach Mang Thang 8 Street, District 10, HCMC, Qu·∫≠n 10, TP H·ªì Ch√≠ Minh
listJob.description:
Founded in 2016, Katalon is the leading provider of a modern, comprehensive quality management platform. Katalon Platform enables quality assurance, DevOps, and software teams of any size to deliver world-class customer experiences faster, easier, and more efficiently.
Since its first launch, Katalon has experienced tremendous growth, serving more than 30,000 teams around the globe, many of which are in the Fortune Global 500, such as PwC, KPMG, Abbott, etc. Katalon is recognized as a top automation tool by prestigious review sites, such as G2, Gartner, Capterra, and IT Central Station. 
 Job Summary
Join Katalon as a Mid/Senior Support Engineer, where you'll play a vital role in delivering exceptional customer experiences by resolving technical challenges and collaborating with engineering teams to enhance our cutting-edge automation platform.

Your Key Responsibilities
Collaborate with Product and Engineering teams to diagnose and resolve customer-reported technical issues.
Investigate logs, troubleshoot API calls, and propose effective workarounds while ensuring SLA adherence.

listJob.description:
About Breadstack:
At Breadstack, we empower dispensaries with a cutting-edge platform designed to boost sales, enhance online presence, and streamline operations. Our all-in-one solution seamlessly integrates inventory, order management, payment, shipping, delivery, and eCommerce. With real-time data protection, dynamic coupons, and advanced fulfillment options, we help dispensaries thrive in a competitive market. Join us in building the future of commerce.
Position Overview: 
As a Technical Project Manager, you will oversee the launch of new clients, including the development of their new websites and ensuring seamless integration with our SaaS platform. This role requires a combination of project coordination and account management skills. You will collaborate closely with designers, developers, and the Implementation Specialist to manage project timelines, coordinate tasks, and ensure a successful website launch that drives client conversion and engagement.
While the Implementation Specialist focuses on configuring and promoting adoption of our integrated SaaS platform, you will be responsible for coordinating and executing the entire project. Additionally, you will serve as the primary point of contact for clients, managing their expectations and ensuring their needs are met throughout the project lifecycle. By leveraging tools such as Jira for task management and Confluence for documentation, you will keep projects organized, on track, and foster strong client relationships.
Key Responsibilities: 
Lead and manage multiple projects simultaneously, ensuring adherence to project timelines and budgets. 
Communicate effectively with stakeholders at all levels, providing updates on project status and addressing any concerns. 
Supervise project teams, providing direction and support to ensure successful execution of project tasks. 
Develop detailed project plans, track dependencies, and identify critical paths. 
Use Jira and Confluence for task management and documentation to keep projects organized and on track. 
Manage requirements effectively throughout the project lifecycle, ensuring alignment with stakeholder needs. 
Conduct regular risk assessments and develop mitigation strategies to address potential challenges. 
Prepare detailed project documentation, including plans, reports, and presentations for stakeholders. 
Work closely with the business development team to define and scope new client engagements, strengthening client relationships.
Contribute to refining project management practices within Breadstack Technologies.

listJob.description:
***We are looking for a candidate who is part solution architect and part leader of our engineering team.***
  The Opportunity
Join us at Amplifi & Impact to lead the engineering frontier of AI-driven solutions. This pivotal role offers the chance to shape the technological landscape of our innovative products, directly impacting the digital customer experience across various industries. If you‚Äôre a visionary leader passionate about leveraging AI to solve realworld problems, this is the place for you.
 The Role
As the Head of Engineering at Amplifi & Impact, you will lead our engineering division, blending strategic technical leadership with hands-on solution design. Reporting directly to the Delivery Director, this hybrid role requires you to be a visionary leader who is technically proficient and strategically minded. You‚Äôll play a critical role in steering our technology strategy and delivery. This is a highly collaborative, clientfacing role, requiring direct engagement with clients with our Product and Customer Experience leaders to ensure alignment and deliver impactful solutions 
 Key Responsibilities
1. Leading Solution Design and Delivery
‚óã Collaborate closely with sales, commercial, Product, and Customer Experience teams to craft compelling proposals and accurate estimations.
‚óã Oversee the implementation of projects, ensuring solutions deliver true value to clients and align with business objectives and integrated product and CX strategies.
‚óã Act as the primary architectural lead on projects, enhancing client engagement and growth through strategic recommendations that drive value.
2. Engineering Team Leadership
‚óã Oversee the engineering team to ensure top performance, outstanding delivery quality, and a robust engineering culture.
‚óã Mentor and develop the team in advanced engineering practices and drive recruitment to build a strong AI capability.
‚óã Manage performance, fostering an environment of rapid discovery and learning aligned with our strategic objectives.
3. Building AI Engineering Capability
‚óã Expand our AI engineering capabilities to deliver market-leading solutions, staying at the forefront of AI technology and modern engineering techniques.
‚óã Lead the integration of AI into our broader engineering practice, ensuring a cohesive approach to innovation and problem-solving.
‚óã Create space to constantly innovate, learn and evolve with the speed of new and changing technologies.
listJob.jobExperience:
As our ideal candidate for the Head of Engineering, you are:
‚óè Experienced in Leadership: Proven track record in leading solution design for large-scale technology projects.
‚óè Technically Proficient: Experience in AI technologies (Agentic RAG, Agentic AI architecture, AWS Bedrock, Langchain, ML Ops), system architecture, and solution design. Show a keen interest and curiosity in new tools and technologies.
‚óè A Collaborative Influencer: Builds trust and alignment across multiple Scrum teams, guiding technical and architectural decisions through influence rather than authority.
‚óè Strategically Minded: Sharp business acumen with the ability to align engineering strategies with broader business goals.
‚óè A Strong Communicator: You have excellent communication skills in both Vietnamese and English, capable of conveying complex technical ideas clearly and effectively to diverse audiences, ensuring alignment and understanding across all levels of the organization
listJob.privilege:
Joining Amplifi & Impact means becoming part of a pioneering team dedicated to pushing the boundaries of AI and technology. We offer:
‚óè Leadership and innovation: Drive cutting-edge projects and make decisions that matter.
‚óè Professional growth: Opportunities to grow within the company and lead pioneering projects in AI and digital transformation.

 About Amplifi & Impact
Amplifi & Impact is a leader in AI-driven customer experience solutions, innovating at the intersection of technology and creativity. Founded in 2015, we have partnered with some of the world‚Äôs largest companies to create engaging, innovative, and successful customer-facing technologies. Our headquarters are based in the UK, with a significant technology expertise and delivery capability centred in Hanoi, Vietnam. Additionally, we maintain a strong commercial footprint across the Asia-Pacific region, reflecting our global reach and commitment to delivering exceptional solutions worldwide.
 In our commitment to staying at the forefront of technology, we utilise a range of modern and cutting-edge technologies to drive our solutions. Our typical tech stacks include:

Cloud & API Services:

listJob.description:
By applying for the above position, you accept and agree that your personal data and any information stated in the attached curriculum vitae (CV) will be used and processed by ITViec and NAB Vietnam for recruitment purposes. The storage and processing of such information will comply with the applicable laws of Vietnam, and the policies and procedures of ITViec and NAB Vietnam regarding personal data, as amended from time to time.
 ABOUT THE JOB
As an Engineer Manager, you will be accountable for the leadership of one or more engineering scrum teams to plan, deliver and support service features that deliver customer value and/or mature service capability. The position is also accountable for executing the people leader fundamentals in line with NAB Policies, driving a learning-based culture with an ability to set and gain agreement for realistic and stretching objectives for the team.
 YOUR JOB RESPONSIBILITIES
Manage multi-Agile teams‚ÄØto deliver on engineering standards, sprint backlogs, and plans, engineers‚Äô responsibilities and performance management, code quality, adherence to development, and testing guardrails.
Manage milestones, deliverables, risks, and dependencies of the engineering teams.
Educate the engineering teams and ensure the release of features to production comply with NAB risk management frameworks.
Ability to create and maintain relationships with a wide range of stakeholders.
Be the voice of reason between speed and quality.
Evangelist of the T-shaped working model; coach engineers to be T-shaped, versatile, and take responsibility outside their core disciplines.
Line management (1:1 meeting, personal development & training plan, career path, probation reviews, and performance reviews);
Coach teams in applying Scrum and DevOps.
Be responsible for continuous improvement of the teams.
Lead initiatives for implementing efficient‚ÄØdevelopment and delivery processes.
Drive a learning-based culture with an ability to set and gain agreement for realistic and stretching objectives for the team.
 Technical environment:
Microservices architecture system
Programming - Java, JavaScript, MV* patterns, Nodejs, ReactJS (including Redux)
Databases ‚Äì Postgres, MongoDB
DevOps ‚Äì Jenkins, Artifactory, SonarQube, GitHub, CloudFormation
Cloud: Multi-Cloud, AWS (Lambda, Postgres, S3, API Gateway, CLI, SNS/SQS), Azure
listJob.jobExperience:
YOUR SKILL AND EXPERIENCE
Must have:
10+ years‚ÄØworking experience in Software Development;‚ÄØ5+ years‚Äô experience in leading cross-functional Agile teams.
Solid understanding of Software Quality, DevOps environments
Excellent experience in SDLC methodologies ‚Äì Scrum, Kanban, Waterfall
Proven ability to manage and deliver complex technology projects involving multiple engineering teams both onshore and offshore.
Real-world experience with large-scale Agile adoption, not just theoretical knowledge.
Strong stakeholder management experience.
Proven people leadership, team building, motivation, and coaching skills
Experience in managing code and change management processes.
Experience with IT Service Management (e.g., Release Management) and experience with using Service Now or similar.
Strong ability to communicate at both strategic and operational level internally and externally, making effective decisions balancing business and stakeholder needs.
Fluent English skills
 Nice to have:
Agile ‚Äì Certified Scrum Master (preferred)
Experience in the Banking or Financial Services industry; (preferred)

listJob.name: Senior Business Analyst
listJob.location: 9-11 Dong Da street, Ward 2, Qu·∫≠n T√¢n B√¨nh, TP H·ªì Ch√≠ Minh
listJob.description:
Analysis teams identify client needs, analyze processes, and propose solutions to align with strategic goals. While fostering efficiency and ensuring organizational success through systematic approaches, they also mediate between clients and engineering teams to ensure project clarity. 
 As a Senior Business Analyst at Endava, you will be challenged to work alongside passionate individuals, who always strive to continuously improve and who share the same vision on what "done" work signifies. You will be a member of a team that interacts frequently with the client and the team members. You will work in an agile environment, close to the business and to the development team(s) and help them focus on delivering value to the customers.
 Responsibilities: 
Establishing and building relationship with the client's stakeholder through deep understanding business domain and consultancy.
Gathering and analyzing business requirements.
Providing solution directions and recommendations based on the client's needs, environment specifics and industry trends.
Creating and keeping up to date product backlog (creating user stories and acceptance criteria from the product vision and epics).
Working closely with engineering team and ensuring that user stories are implemented in line with the product vision and timelines.
Understanding the market reasoning behind given requirement and ensuring that development team deliver it according to global business goals and feature specifics.
Closely observing industry trends in the area of application design and proposing new solutions to the client processes and the product.
listJob.jobExperience:
6+ years of relevant experience.
Experience as product owner and/or business analyst in the Agile environment, defining business requirements and creating user stories.
Demonstrated Leadership skills and team management.
Demonstrable ability to translate business needs into solution requirements and define those in a written format that allows engineering teams to align behind the product vision.
Knowledge and experience of software development planning techniques, including Agile Scrum.
Understand all standard tools and methodologies concerning Business Analysis including processes, artifacts, and tools.
Strong analytical skills, systematic approach and self-reliant.
Ability to measure and report on the effectiveness of product iterations.
Excellent analytical and problem-solving skills, with a keen eye for detail and the ability to identify process inefficiencies and areas for improvement in diverse markets.
Strong project management skills, capable of handling multiple tasks simultaneously while meeting deadlines in various time zones.
Collaborative mindset with excellent interpersonal skills, promoting effective teamwork and relationship-building across cultures.
Adaptable and proactive, with a willingness to embrace new technologies and approaches to drive innovation and efficiency.

listJob.description:
Perform development activities to build new and maintain existing WEB-based software systems using Java Frameworks, Front-end frameworks and databases.
Responsibilities
Participate in developing web applications, new modules, features from beginning till end in the functional system (It can be Full-Stack from Frontend to Backend services and databases depends on skills and experiences).
Participate in analyzing requirements, design architecture, perform coding, unit tests, testing and technical documentation in line with user & system requirements to deliver source code, documents and test scripts that meet client‚Äôs needs and meet the release milestone.
Perform bugs fixing, maintaining, enhancement existing WEB application modules.
Assist Team Leads, Managers in reporting project status and deliverable estimations.
Perform code review and supports colleagues.
Conduct training & coaching team members in software engineering development if required.
Supports team leads on maintaining development environments if required to make sure smooth development.
Perform 3rd level support in and after office hours if needed to ensure fastest possible recovery to service.
listJob.jobExperience:
Skills & Qualifications:
Software development skills using Java, ReactJS are required.
Good problem-solving skills.
Communication skills: Intermediate-level English (especially reading and writing).
Ability to work independently, proactive problem solver.
Knowledge & Experience:
Have at least 3-years experience in web development using Java 17 and Spring Boot/ Spring Framework
Experience with RESTful Web Service with Spring/Spring Boot 
Have at least 2-years experience in web development using ReactJS and related libraries e.g. Redux, Webpack, Babel, Gulp, Sass, Axios
Experience coding multi-threaded Java applications
Experience in MySQL with stored procedures, SQL and index
Experience in application performance troubleshooting
Understand OOP concepts and design patterns
Able to perform code review and give suggestions on solutions and designs
Experience in Junit and Jet
PLUS points:
Well design and develop web application with a large number of concurrent users and with high performance requirement is a BIG PLUS.
Experience with Java 21 is a PLUS
Experience/Knowledge on any of Redis, Elasticsearch is a PLUS

listJob.name: Sr Project Coordinator/ Mid Project Manager (English)
listJob.location: 324 L√™ VƒÉn S·ªπ, Ph∆∞·ªùng 2, T√¢n B√¨nh, Qu·∫≠n T√¢n B√¨nh, TP H·ªì Ch√≠ Minh
listJob.description:
Job Description: 
We are seeking an experienced and results-driven Sr Project Coordinator/ Mid Project Manager with at least 3-5 years of experience to join our dynamic team. In this role, you will be responsible for overseeing the successful implementation of projects, ensuring they are delivered within scope, timeline, and budget. 
The ideal candidate will have a strong background in project management, excellent communication skills, and a proven ability to work with cross-functional teams. This is an exciting opportunity to contribute to the growth and success of our product, SimpleMDG, by driving the successful execution of implementation projects.
Responsibilities:
Project Planning: Collaborate with stakeholders to define project objectives, scope, and deliverables. Develop detailed project plans, including timelines, resource requirements, and risk mitigation strategies.
Project Execution: Lead cross-functional project teams in executing project plans. Monitor project progress, identify and resolve issues, and ensure adherence to project milestones and deadlines.
Stakeholder Management: Establish and maintain effective relationships with internal and external stakeholders. Communicate project updates, risks, and issues in a clear and timely manner. Address stakeholder concerns and manage expectations throughout the project lifecycle.
Resource Management: Allocate and manage project resources efficiently, ensuring optimal utilization. Collaborate with team members and functional managers to secure necessary resources for project activities.
Risk Management: Identify project risks and develop risk mitigation strategies. Proactively monitor and manage risks throughout the project lifecycle, implementing contingency plans as needed.
Quality Assurance: Develop and implement quality assurance processes to ensure project deliverables meet established standards. Conduct regular project reviews and audits to identify areas for improvement and ensure project success.
Reporting and Documentation: Prepare and present project status reports to stakeholders, providing updates on project progress, milestones, risks, and issues. Maintain accurate and up-to-date project documentation, including project plans, schedules, and change requests.
Continuous Improvement: Identify process improvement opportunities and implement best practices to enhance project management methodologies and drive efficiency.
listJob.jobExperience:
Strong fluency in English is a must, Japanese is a plus
The ability to work in the evening or early morning base on the project
Education: Bachelor's Degree in business administration, information technology, or equivalent experience
Experience: Minimum of 3 years of experience in project management, with a focus on implementing projects. Demonstrated experience managing projects through the entire project lifecycle. In absence of years of experience, certifications or past work may be used to show the level of experience needed to perform at this level.
Project Management Skills: Strong project management skills with a proven ability to deliver projects on time, within budget, and according to scope. Proficient in project management methodologies, tools, and techniques.
Leadership and Communication: Excellent leadership abilities with the capacity to motivate and inspire project teams. Exceptional communication skills, both verbal and written, with the ability to effectively communicate with stakeholders at all levels.
Quality Assurance: Develop and implement quality assurance processes to ensure project deliverables meet established standards. Conduct regular project reviews and audits to identify areas for improvement and ensure project success.
Problem-Solving: Strong analytical and problem-solving skills, with the ability to identify issues, develop solutions, and make informed decisions.
Professionalism: Maintain a high level of professionalism in all interactions, both internally and externally. This includes exhibiting punctuality, meeting deadlines, and dressing appropriately.
Agile Learning: Demonstrate a willingness to learn new skills and adapt to changing project requirements. Be comfortable working in a fast-paced environment and embrace continuous improvement.
Technical Knowledge: Familiarity with project management software, collaboration tools, Microsoft Office Suite and Atlassian tools.
Industry Knowledge: Basic knowledge of the industry or domain relevant to the organization's projects is preferred.

listJob.name: Middle/ Senior Business Analyst (English)
listJob.location: 324 L√™ VƒÉn S·ªπ, Ph∆∞·ªùng 2, T√¢n B√¨nh, Qu·∫≠n T√¢n B√¨nh, TP H·ªì Ch√≠ Minh
listJob.description:
Are you a strategic and results-oriented Business Analyst with a passion for understanding and exceeding customer expectations? 
Our dynamic SimpleMDG consultant team in Ho Chi Minh City is expanding and seeking a highly motivated Mid-Level Business Analyst to join our ranks. In this role, you'll play a pivotal role in bridging the gap between customer needs and innovative product development.
Responsibilities:
Cultivate strong customer relationships: Serve as the primary point of contact, actively listening to understand customer needs, challenges, and business objectives. Foster trust and transparent communication throughout the entire project lifecycle.
Elicitate and document comprehensive requirements: Conduct in-depth interviews and workshops to uncover the true essence of customer requirements. Translate those needs into clear, concise, and customer-centric functional specifications, ensuring flawless project execution.
Champion effective stakeholder communication: Maintain clear and consistent communication with all stakeholders, including project managers, development teams, and senior management. Proactively share project status, identify potential risks, and propose solutions, fostering a collaborative and transparent environment.
Process Improvement: Continuously evaluate and improve processes to ensure that the delivery of customer requirements is efficient and effective.
Assists with functional and product testing.
Act as advanced support agent to support Customer Support team to resolve escalated technical issues.
listJob.jobExperience:
The ability to work in the evening or early morning base on the project
Over 3 years of experience working in the software development environment. In absence of years of experience, certifications or past work may be used to show the level of experience needed to perform at this level.
Exceptional analytical and problem-solving skills will allow you to dissect complex customer needs and translate them into actionable roadmaps for successful product development.
Strong written and verbal communication skills are essential for conveying complex information clearly and concisely to diverse audiences. Fluency in English is a must, with fluency in Japanese or German a valuable asset.
Proven ability to influence stakeholders through clear communication, data-driven insights, and persuasive presentations.
Experience with user story creation is highly desirable, allowing you to translate customer needs into actionable steps for the development team.
Proficiency in Atlassian tools (Jira, Confluence) is a plus, but your eagerness to learn and adapt is paramount.
Bachelor's Degree in business administration, information technology, or equivalent experience
